# language_name:        Ono
# Closest ISO 639-3:    ons
# year_short:           1991
# year_long:            Not available
# title:                Waom Yesu Wane Sigi Maep Don<br>The New Testament in the Ono Language of Papua New Guinea
# URL:                  http://bible.cloud/bible/content/texts/ONSPNG/index.html
# copyright_short:      © 1991 The Bible Society of Papua New Guinea

You may share, copy, distribute, transmit, and extract portions or quotations from this work , provided that you include the above copyright information: You must give Attribution to the work .You do not sell this work for a profit .You do not make any derivative works that change any of the actual words or punctuation of the Scriptures . 40001001	Iwa yemo ŋei wakone sari mageu Yesu Kristo wakonge , eŋe Dawit wane qerakine , eŋe Abraham wane qerakine .
40001002	Abraham eŋe Isak magaine , Isak eŋe Yakop magaine , Yakop eŋe Yuda eŋineso ŋolekoune eŋane magaene ,
40001003	Yuda eŋe Pereze so Zera erane magaetne , ( nagaetne Tama ) , Pereze eŋe Hezoron magaine , Hezoron eŋe Ram magaine ,
40001004	Ram eŋe Aminadap magaine , Aminadap eŋe Nason magaine , Nason eŋe Salmon magaine ,
40001005	Salmon eŋe Boaz magaine , ( nagaine Rahab , ) Boaz eŋe Obet magaine , ( nagaine Ruti ) , Obet eŋe Yese magaine ,
40001006	Yese eŋe ŋei waom Dawit magaine , Dawit eŋe Solomon magaine ( nagaine Uria wane ŋanomine ) .
40001007	Solomon eŋe Rehoboam magaine , Rehoboam eŋe Abaeza magaine , Abaeza eŋe Asa magaine ,
40001008	Asa eŋe Yehosapat magaine , Yehosapat eŋe Yoram magaine , Yoram eŋe Uzia magaine ,
40001009	Uzia eŋe Yotam magaine , Yotam eŋe Ahaz magaine , Ahaz eŋe Hezekia magaine ,
40001010	Hezekia eŋe Manase magaine , Manase eŋe Amon magaine , Amon eŋe Yosia magaine ,
40001011	Yosia eŋe Yekonia eŋine so ŋolekoune eŋane magaene , naso yewao Israel ŋei ŋerep ebu peik one more Babilon kepeo ari warekoi .
40001012	Ŋei ŋerep Babilon kepeo ebu arikoi , ea wane ŋadino , Yekonia eŋe Sealtiel magaine , Sealtiel eŋe Zerubabel magaine ,
40001013	Zerubabel eŋe Abiudu magaine , Abiudu eŋe Eliakim magaine , Eliakim eŋe Azor magaine ,
40001014	Azor eŋe Zadok magaine , Zadok eŋe Akim magaine , Akim eŋe Eliud magaine ,
40001015	Eliud eŋe Eleazar magaine , Eleazar eŋe Matan magaine , Matan eŋe Yakop magaine ,
40001016	Yakop eŋe Yosep magaine , Maria wane ŋaone , Maria eŋe Yesu nagaine , Yesu eŋe Kristo orake .
40001017	Abraham wano ŋine wakon sari mageu , Dawit wakonge eŋane tegoene 14 . Dawit wano ŋine wakone sari mageu , ebu peikone Babilon kepeo arikoi , eŋane tegoene 14ka okanmaike . Eso ea ŋine sari mage Mesia wakonge , tegoene 14ka .
40001018	Yesu Kristo eŋe numa iwa yale oken wakonge . Nagaine Maria eŋe Yosep wane biŋek rau geke , ŋo ere meteetne mi au au , yaupka ge more , Maria eŋe kake , medep mane mayakane Asu Koboboineŋo urata maki , ŋatkeke ea mayake .
40001019	Eŋe Yosep wane biŋek rakoi , ŋei yewa eŋe mitirop geki paki , kine kine maineka okane geke . Ŋo eŋe siluŋ Maria ŋei eŋane kaitko donine didiwo rawakongi , gamu kutno wayakane mi detke , eso eŋe sanka eŋane biŋek rakoi , ea kitasiakane wetkeke .
40001020	Eŋe yale wetke gegeki , Waom wane aŋelo maneŋo kulu kuluo wakonka more olale rake , “ Yosep , Dawit wane qerakine , Maria ŋanomŋone makenane misuk kaetganiake , eamo Asu Koboboineŋo urata maki medep ŋatkemaike .
40001021	Eŋe medep baŋ ŋei mayake , paki ge baŋ eŋetine Yesu orakene , onoka wane oŋo baŋ ŋei ŋerewekoune borikineeno ŋine makokoniake . ”
40001022	Masi iwa korop wakonge , yemo Waomŋo propet eŋane wetino motki don ra sari geke , ea wane wele wakoniakane yale wakonge .
40001023	“ Ŋerep natewen mane , ŋei mi makeŋo baŋ medep ŋatkeake , paki medep mane ŋei mayake , eso eŋe baŋ eŋetine Imanuel orakei , ” kine iwa yale , “ Anutu eŋe ŋenerop gemaike . ”
40001024	Eso Yosep eŋe kuluo ŋine wieki paki , Waom wane aŋeloŋo daleo okaniakane olatke , ea wane rokop okane more , ŋanomine Maria make .
40001025	Ŋo eŋe ŋao ŋanom gege ea mi geuk paki , Maria eŋe medepine make , pakiso , Yosepŋo eŋetine Yesu orake .
40002001	Yesu eŋe Betlehem matko , Yudia kepeo wakonge , nasoine Herot eŋe ŋei waom geke , yewao ŋei natne serekin dapot one more , kineene detone gegekoi , edo kepe sasaino ŋine Yerusalem matko sarikoi .
40002002	Paki qesone rakoi , “ Medep musele wakonmaike , Yuda ŋei eŋane ŋei waom ea diawa ? Ŋene eŋane serekinine kepe sasainoken sa waki kene , eso ŋene ea wane bakomine kitokenane sarimaine . ”
40002003	Ŋei waom Herot eŋe don ea dere more qiseke , so Yerusalem matko ŋine ŋei ŋerep natne eŋe yaleka dere qisekoi .
40002004	Paki Herot eŋe Pris suaine so ra rokop don numa kito ebo ebon ŋei edoraki , sari wekuoka qeturageu qeson one rake , “ Mesia eŋe mat diao wakoniake ? ”
40002005	Eŋe olale rakoi , “ Betlehem matko , Yuda kepeo , Propet eŋe iwa yale qeke ,
40002006	‘ Betlehem matko , Yuda wane kepe , ge Yuda ware ware eŋane keuo ŋine ketkele midaka , ŋinano ŋine ŋetne mane baŋ sariake , oŋo naŋane ŋei ŋerewekopne Israel baŋ alakane sikan oniake . ’ ”
40002007	Eso Herot eŋe kepe sasaino ŋine ŋei sarikoi , eŋe edoraki ariu sanka lewage , naso diawao serekinba wakonge desiakane qesononge .
40002008	Pakiso iwa yale edaneso biraongi Betlehem matko arikoi , “ Ariu paki , bororom kauluke medep ea zuaŋkakei , eso kau pakiso na nolatpi dere , so na yaleka maine ari more bakomine kitokale . ”
40002009	Don iwa edangi , so yeropka arikoi , numao ariu paki serekin kakoi , serekinba kepe sasaino wakongi kakoi , serekin weku yewaka kakoi . Serekin eaŋo alakangi , so eŋe kama kama sari mage medep pake , ea wane kutno doŋ mane metke .
40002010	Eŋe Serekin kau paki , wetene peseki , oi bakom suaine okangoi !
40002011	Eŋe mat koto wau paki , so Yesu medep so nagaine Maria otkoi . Eŋe wawetene qeu paki , umi qe more bakomine kitokoi , pakiso , kiteene makoke bakom okankakei wane kine kine ma sarikoi , ea mangoi , gol , eki kelokine qoune simile , so kelok qoune simile ea mangoi .
40002012	Pakiso Anutuŋo kulu kuluo Herot wano koso mi zinge arikei wane girem edange . Eso eŋe zinge more , numa maneoka mateno arikoi .
40002013	Eŋe ariu , so Waom wane aŋelo maneŋo kulu kuluo Yosep wakonka more olale rake , “ Wienom paki , medep so nagaine epunom Ezipt kepeo ariu paki , ea ge mageu , noŋo rawe dere so baŋ sarikei , Herot eŋe baŋ zuage medep qeki seukeakane ramaike . ”
40002014	Yale olatki , so Yosep eŋe wie more , medep so nagaine epuki , so mat qelige goigo Ezipt kepeo arikoi .
40002015	Ari ea ge mageu , Herot seukke . Yale okangi , so don mane Waomŋo propet mane wane wetno motki don rake , ea wane wele wakonge . Don iwa yale rake , “ Na medepne orawe , Ezipt kepeo ŋine wie sarike . ”
40002016	Herot eŋe iwa yale detke , kepe sasaino ŋine ŋei lobo sarikoi , eŋe na isinangoi yale detki paki , sotine zok osike , paki eŋe don motki kawali ŋei eŋe Betlehem matko so mat osop osop pa arike , eao medep ŋei komaene etke ( 2 ) so eŋane bane medep abubu korop engu warekoi , eŋe ŋei lobo kepe sasaino ŋine sari serekinba wakonge , ea wane nasoine olatkoi , ea detki paki , ea wane kop okange .
40002017	Numa iwa okanbi Propet Yeremaiaŋo don mane rake , ea wane wele yewa wakonge ,
40002018	“ Rama matko ukat wakongi detmami , nem kuasuruk so aro uŋalan wakonmaike . Rakelŋo qerakkoune Yuda wane tego eŋane ra more arokmaike , eŋe arokmaike , so baŋ mi mau kopkeake , onoka wane eŋe korop seuseuneka . ”
40002019	Herot seukki , ŋadino Waom wane aŋelo maneŋo kulu kuluo Yosep Ezipt eao wakonkake ,
40002020	Paki olale rake , “ Ge wienom paki , medep eŋine so nagaine epunom , koso zinge more , Israel kepeo ariu , onoka wane medep qekei wane rakoi , ŋei ea mo seukkoi . ”
40002021	Yale olatkiso , Yosep eŋe wieki paki , medep eŋine so nagaine epuki , so koso zinge Israel kepeo arikoi .
40002022	Ari detki , Arkelaus eŋe magaine Herot wane tungo Yuda kepeo ŋei waom geke , pakiso Yosep eŋe Betlehem matko geakane kaetkake . Aŋeloŋo koso manerop kulu kuluo wakone more olatki , so eŋe ea ŋine wie koso Galili kepeo arikoi .
40002023	Pakiso , matine maki paki , mat mane eŋetne Nazaret eao gekoi , eŋe yale okangi , propet edo don mane rakoi , ea wane wele wakonge , “ Ŋei ŋererop korop eŋe baŋ raikei , ‘ Eŋe Nazaret welaine . ’ ”
40003001	Naso Yewao Yohane doku tau tau eŋe sari more , Yuda kepe yaup papaino kieke miti edane geke .
40003002	Paki rake , “ Borikine ŋine ŋadek kau paki , wetŋine maingeu , onoka wane qeli gege togon wane Ŋei Waom mo osop sarimaike ! ”
40003003	Yohane weku eŋane propet Isaiaŋo don iwa yale rake , “ Ŋei mane kepe yaup papaino bokamaike , ‘ Waom wane numa ma wesakeu , eŋe sariakane numa makoboe birakau ! ’ ”
40003004	Yohane takotine kamel zouneŋo mamaine ma geke , eŋe waroine osom solaineŋo mamaine , eaŋo kebaŋino ramu geke , so ŋaraine yemo sila so begok zubaine , ea ne geke .
40003005	Ŋei ŋerep eŋano sari warekoi , yemo Yerusalem matkoŋine , Yuda kepeo ŋine korop , so Yordan Doku loli lolik mat pa arike , ea ŋine .
40003006	Eŋe borikineene ra wakone qeligeu , Yordan Dokuo tauonge .
40003007	Yohane eŋe Parisi ŋei so Sadusi ŋei tego loutneŋo doku tau oniakane sariu , ongi paki edane rake , “ Ŋine koma qotkoinane dokoine , maŋo ŋidangi Anutu wane busu ŋado sariakane okanmaike , ea kakakka more ŋadekka ariu rap ?
40003008	Wetŋine maingeu paki , tanik manik maine okane mau , eaŋo baŋ borikine ŋine ŋadek kamami , ea wane welewa eamo sikan ŋoniake .
40003009	So wetŋineŋo iwa yale maine mi wetke rakei , ‘ Abraham eŋe ŋenane ŋaboze . ’ Na ŋidanmaile , yemo Anutu eŋe maine wesi iwaŋo maki paki , eaŋo Abraham wane ŋabokoune tego mane koso maine ebuki wakongei !
40003010	Naka mo eki ŋodino kitatki ketkei wane eweke pamaike , eki korop wele maine mi qekei , yemo baŋ kitatki ketpi biraongi , gerepko wau ezoyake .
40003011	Na dokurop tau ŋunmaile , eaŋo kine iwa yale sikan ŋonmaike , yemo ŋine wetŋine maingekoi , ŋo ŋei mane naŋane ŋadeno baŋ sarike , eŋe yemo zonomine togogole , eŋe naŋane zonom yuan kamaike , na ŋei maine mida , noŋo eŋane kie tabine maine tewekkalane rokop midakaka , oŋo yemo baŋ Asu Koboboine so gerep weneŋ tauŋuniake .
40003012	Eŋe wano wanok urata ma gemaike , kito wanok maki wele eŋineka , eŋe witine wele baŋ peikki urumino wayake , ŋo solaine eamo gerep koma komaine midaine banine ze papaine , eao qakki ezowareake . ”
40003013	Naso yewao Yesu eŋe Galili kepeo ŋine Yordan dokuo arike , paki Yohane wano sarike , oŋo doku taukayakane .
40003014	Ŋo Yohaneŋo yemo wetinane kine ra qelaŋaniakane wetne maingeakane liwekka rake , “ Goŋo na yemo maine taunanikene , ŋo siluŋ noŋo ge tau ganikalane naŋano sarimaine me ? ”
40003015	Pakiso Yesuŋo mainge olale rake , “ Yeine qeligenom paki , noŋo ramaile yale iwa okannom , numa iwa yale , ea yemo ŋere maine Anutuŋo detmaike , ea wane kop okanikete . ”
40003016	Eso Yohane eŋe Yesu wane don dere , so eaka doku taukake . Taukaki , Yesu eŋe dokuo ŋine saki saki , eaka qeli aŋaŋge manmaike , pakiso eŋe kaki , Anutu wane Asuŋo naŋi baluse yale okan ketki paki , Yesu eŋine kutno kitoke .
40003017	Eso qeliwo ŋine don mane iwa yale raki ketke , “ Iwa eŋe nae Gipon maepne , na eŋane zok manerop similenan okanmaike . ”
40004001	Pakiso Asuŋo Yesu iwenka kepe yaup papaino arike , Satanŋo liwek kayakane .
40004002	Yesu eŋe yewa kaiwe 40 so ruo 40 ŋaraine midaine ge mage , ŋarainane seukke .
40004003	Eso Satanŋo eŋano lotke more rake , “ Ge Anutu wane Gipole gemaineo , yemo ranom , wesi iwaŋo qeinge more bret okangep . ”
40004004	Yesuŋo mainge olatke , “ Anutu wane papiaŋo iwa yale ramaike , ‘ Ŋeiŋo ŋara waneka maine mi geulukeake , Anutu wane piwo ŋine don kine kine sari okanmaike , ea detluke more , yemo geulukeake . ’ ”
40004005	Pakiso , Satanŋo Yesu iwenka mat suaine kobekine , Yerusalem , ea ari more , Bakom Urum wane bakine wetika weti , ea birakaki okorake .
40004006	Pakiso olale rake , “ Ge Anutu wane Gipole gemaineo , yemo goŋomka iwa ŋine sontake kepo ketnom , onoka wane Anutu wane papiaŋo iwa yale ramaike , ‘ Anutu eŋe baŋ aŋelokoune geŋane ra more edaniake , eŋe baŋ meteeneŋo geu wiekei , paki kieŋone wesiŋo mane mi kitasiake . ’ ”
40004007	Yesuŋo mainge olatke , “ Ŋo Anutu wane papiaŋo yaleka iwa yale ramaike , ‘ Ge Waomŋone Anutu liwe liweko misuk birakakene . ’ ”
40004008	Pakiso Satanŋo Yesu bonaga kiro qatqale yewao iwenka wa more ŋei ŋerep magune magune so kepe baŋem ea wane simile kine kine suaine zok manerop pamaike , ea sikanka wareke .
40004009	Paki olale rake , “ Ge wawetŋone qem paki , bakomne kitokene , yemo na yeye kine kine iwa korop baŋ ginwarekale . ”
40004010	Rakiso Yesu mainge olatke , “ Satan , ge masikane arinom ! Anutu wane papiaŋo iwa yale ramaike , ‘ Waomŋone Anutu eŋe weku meŋenka more qelitine qekene . ’ ”
40004011	Yale rakiso Satanŋo qeliŋka arike , pakiso aŋelo edo sari , so Yesu kito qesiŋ okankakoi .
40004012	Yohane mulap urumgo birakau , Yesu eŋe kisiine detki paki , wie more Galili kepeo arike .
40004013	Eŋe Nazaret matko mi geke , eŋe qelige ari Kaperneam matko geke . Mat yewa eŋe Galili doku namuŋ wazaino , Zebulun so Naptali erane kepe saiwo metke .
40004014	Yale okangimo propet Isaiaŋo don mane rake , ea wane wele wakonge , don iwa yale ,
40004015	“ Zebulun wane kepe , so Naptali wane kepe , doku namuŋgo oken pamamik , Yordan nat parom , Galili qelaŋ ŋei ŋerep eŋane kepe !
40004016	Ŋei ŋerep panaman koto gemami , eŋe baŋ qelaŋan kakapa suaine mane kakei , ŋei ŋerep seu seu kepe wane panaman qekatno gemami , kuteno kiwa baŋ qelaŋaniake . ”
40004017	Naso yewao Yesuŋo kieke , donine iwa yale edange , “ Borikine ŋine korop qelige ŋadekka wareu , onoka wane qeli gege togon nasoine mo bomilemaike ! ”
40004018	Yesu eŋe Galili doku namuŋ meuno ariki paki , tatiŋon etke otke , ere zawon mama ŋei , Simon , eŋetine mane Petoro , so ŋole Andrea , ere doku namugo kamagaŋo zawon ebu okorakoik .
40004019	Yesuŋo etane rake , “ Sariuk , narop ari more noŋo ŋei ebu ebu daleo ebukeik , ea wane kine kito ŋipongale . ”
40004020	Raki , so eaka kamaga etne qelige , so eŋerop arikoik .
40004021	Eŋe ari ari more , koso tatiŋon etke maratotke , Yakop so Yohane , Zebedi wane gipoletkine . Ere seki etne koto magaetne Zebedirop mere kamagaene maulukkoi , pakiso Yesuŋo etorake .
40004022	Etoraki , so eaka seki so magaetne qelige , so Yesurop weneŋ arikoi .
40004023	Yesu eŋe Galili kepe loli lolik ari more , Yuda lewa lewaŋ urumeno waki paki , qeli gege togon wane don kito edange , miti don maine ra edange , so ŋei ŋerep kubet kine kine enerop , so zoma kine kine enerop ebuki menaŋgoi .
40004024	Yale okangi , eŋane don kisiineŋo Siria kepeo korop sua ariki , dere more ŋei ŋerep eŋe detpi paki , zoma kubet korop so asu qotkoinerop so seuke wisikae gemaŋkoi , so mat popoine kie meteene seu seune , korop ebu Yesu wano ma sariu ma menaŋ onwareke .
40004025	Ŋei ŋerep magu suaineŋo ŋadino mogare arikoi , Galili kepeo ŋine , so Mat Suaine Ten eaŋine , so Yerusalem matko ŋine , so Yuda kepeo ŋine , so Yordan erinat kepe ea ŋine .
40005001	Yesu eŋe ŋei ŋerep magu suaine onge , paki meŋo mane wane kutno waki paki , ea pese ket metke , eŋine dokoine eŋe sari osino lolikka metkoi .
40005002	Pakiso eŋe kieke don iwa yale edange ,
40005003	“ Ŋei eŋe kotoenane detpi , wanap okanmaike , onoka wane eŋe wet pesek desikei , qeli gege togon yemo eŋane biŋek !
40005004	Nem kuasuruk gemami , eŋe wet pese desikei , onoka wane Anutuŋo baŋ maganut oniake !
40005005	Wetene ma pese gemami , eŋe wet pese desikei , onoka wane eŋe baŋ Anutuŋo onoka biŋek qe ebonge , ea makei !
40005006	Anutuŋo dere ebon maike ea wane rokopko wetene suaineŋo wikile mage okanmami , eŋe wet pese desikei , onoka wane Anutuŋo baŋ qe watke ebongi , ŋatene qeake !
40005007	Ŋei kimakopene eŋane wetene boriki , seseone okanmami , eŋe wet pese desikei , onoka wane Anutuŋo baŋ wetine boriki seseoniake !
40005008	Kotoene libeka gemami , eŋe wet pese desikei , onoka wane eŋe baŋ Anutu kakei !
40005009	Ŋei eŋane keueno peam wane urata mamami , eŋe wet pese desikei , onoka wane Anutu eŋe baŋ eŋine gipolekoune edorayake !
40005010	Ŋei mane Anutuŋo dere ebon maike , ea wane rokopko ma waremaike , miti wane ŋabaine ra more wikile kuteno wamaike , eŋe wet pese desikei , qeli gege togon eamo eŋane biŋek !
40005011	“ Ŋei eŋe det worik okan ŋungei , so ŋingu matali qetali okan ŋunikei , so ŋinane aŋao more isi don kine kine borikine korop ra sola ŋine matalikei , ŋine wet pese desikei , onoka wane ŋine naŋane ŋadeno mogatnane sarimami , ea wane .
40005012	Ŋine wet ŋine peseki , batne okanikei , onoka wane turuŋŋine lewine suaine qeliwo , ŋinane biŋek warekaki pamaike , ea wane . Propet ŋinane bango qei ge sakoi , miti wane ŋaba eŋe yale waka matali qetali ebukoi .
40005013	“ Ŋine kepe baŋem ŋei eŋane soli okanikei . Ŋo soli eŋe simileine ea mida okaniakeo , mau koso simile wako wakon wane numa eamo mi pamaike . Soli ea mo simile midaine , ea wane yeine qakeu ariki , ŋei ŋerep eŋe kutno gesoke ari okanmami .
40005014	“ Ŋine kepe baŋem ŋei eŋane kiwa , yale okane gekei . Mat mane suaine meŋo maneo makoi , eŋane qelaŋane kine kine maneŋo maine mi qekatkeake .
40005015	Ŋei maneŋo kiwa mane kiweke , laseŋo mi kito korauki mesiake , ea wane turuŋine yemo eŋe bosiŋino modeki okora more , ŋei ŋerep mat koto metmami , ea qelaŋane eboniake .
40005016	Rokop yalewaka , ŋinane kiwaŋo ŋei ŋerep qelaŋane eboniake , paki eŋe ŋinane masi tanik maine okanmami , ea kau paki , Magaŋine qeliwo gemaike , eŋe bakomine kitokei .
40005017	“ Ŋine naŋane iwa yale misuk wetke rakei , eŋe Mose wane ra rokop don so propet eŋane don ea esopkaki ariakane ketke . Na ea esopkawe ariakane , mi ketkole , midakaka , na don ea tewekewe paki , mawe eŋane don wele okaniakane ketkole .
40005018	Na welekatne ŋidanbe detpi ! Qeli so kepe ere pakeik , kop ra rokop don , me ea wane don sisine mane ra rokop don wane kotino qeqine , eaŋo mi siukeake , midakaka . Eŋe yale pamageki , qeli so kepe so yeye kine kine korop eŋane naso qoeake .
40005019	Eso ea wane , ŋei mane eŋe ra rokop don mide nigagatne mane dere qewoloŋgi paki , ŋei natne masi weku eaka okanikei wane kito edaniake , eŋe qeli gege togon kotino , eŋetine ketkele nigagatne payake . Ŋo nat paromine yemo mane eŋe ra rokop don ea dere tewekeake , so ŋei natne eŋe kop weku eaka okanikei wane kito edaniake , eŋe qeli gege togon kotine , eŋetine suaine , ŋei wawaine geake .
40005020	Ea wane na ŋidanbe detpi , ŋine Anutuŋo numa koboine mogare arikei wane wetkemaike , ea bororom teweke mogare arikeiwo , yemo ŋine ewekeu paki , qeli gege togon wane numa kotino maine wakesikei . Ŋo ŋine ra rokop don kito ebo ebon , so Parisi eŋane masi tanik ea mi yuan onbi paki , qeli gege togon kotino mi wakesikei . ”
40005021	“ Ŋine mokaka ŋabokop ŋine don iwa yale edange , ea mo detmami , ‘ Ge ŋei mi qem seukeake , ŋei mane eŋe ŋei qeki seukeake , eŋe baŋ ma ari wano wanok ŋei wane kaitko birakau okorayake . ’
40005022	Ŋo noŋo yemo iwa yale ŋidanbe detpi , ŋei mane eŋe kimainerop sot osi osi okaniake , eŋe baŋ ma more wano wanok ŋei wane kaitko birakau okorayake , ŋei mane eŋe kimaine iwa yale orayake , ‘ Ge maine yemo yaup wane ! ’ Yale orayake , eŋe baŋ ma more Kaunsol wane kaitko birakau okorayake , so ŋei mane eŋe kimaine ‘ Borikine qelaŋ togole , ’ orayake , eŋe baŋ sora gerep wikile teinerop ea ari kesiake .
40005023	Eso ea wane ge mo Anutu bakom okan kakenane , arata osino ari okorakeneo , ŋine eaka kimaŋineŋo ŋaba ŋaba ŋine payake , yewa desikene ,
40005024	paki qeligenom , bakom kine kineŋone ea arata osino metki , esatkamde kimaŋinano arinom , ŋaba ea makoboeuk qoeki , peamgo zinge sari more , Anutu bakom okankakene .
40005025	“ Ŋei maneŋo geŋane kine ra more dongo geu ariakeo , yemo ge ŋaba ŋonerop ari numao maratka more , naso pamaike , eaoka eŋerop kima okan naguwik qoeki , ŋado dongo arikene . Yale mi okangeneo , yemo ge ari lotkenom , eŋe geu more , wano wanok ŋei wano biraganiake , paki oŋo geu tebe ŋei wano biragangi , tebe ŋeiŋo baŋ mulap urumgo bira gangi wakesikene .
40005026	Na welekatne golatpe , ge yewa naso kiroine wikilerop met mage , baŋ kimaŋonane sot ikop mi qoeake , ea korop qolekanom qoewareki , ge maine kesikene .
40005027	“ Ŋine don iwa yale raraine pamaike , ea mo detkoi , ‘ Ŋao ŋanom ŋire misuk qeliŋ nagukeik , paki ŋei ge ŋerep mane misuk maikene ! ’
40005028	Ŋo noŋo yemo iwa yale ŋidanbe detpi , ŋei mane eŋe ŋerep mane kayake paki , mayakane wetkeake , eŋe eŋine ŋanomine mo qeliŋkaki paki , wetineŋo eŋerop bailalaŋ okane more , sotkorop okanmaike .
40005029	Ea wane ge deŋone wongoken eaŋo borikine makenane tebaganiakeo , qe pitikenom saketki biranom ariake ! Solaŋone sisine wekuŋo midayake , yemo zok wekumane , ŋo solaŋone koropŋo sora gerepko birau kesiake , eaŋo maine mi okanmaike .
40005030	Ge meteŋone wonŋo tebagangi borikine makeneo , yemo ge kitare so biranom ariake ! Ge bikumŋone sisine weku qeliŋkakene , eaŋo yemo zok wekumane . Ŋo solaŋone koropŋo ari sora gerepko kesiake , eaŋo maine mi okanmaike .
40005031	“ Ŋine don iwa yale raraine pamaike , ea mo detkoi , ‘ Ŋei mane eŋe ŋanomine qeliŋ kayakane okane , eŋe zokit kita kitat wane kibi mane kine desikei wane mire , ŋanomine maniake , masi ea maine okanmaike . ’
40005032	Ŋo noŋo yemo iwa ŋidanbe detpi , ŋei mane eŋe ŋanomine maineka ge mageuk paki , qeliŋkaki ari , ŋei mane koso mayakeo , yemo ŋei yewa eŋe okangi , ŋanomine eŋe bailalaŋ okanike , ea wane ŋei yewa eŋe sot korop okanmaike , so ŋei yewa eŋe ŋerep ŋaonerop , ea meke , eŋe yaleka bailalaŋ okanmaike .
40005033	“ Ŋine mokaka ŋei don iwa yale edange , ea mo yaleka detkoi , ‘ Ge donŋone rakone , ea misuk kitasikene , ge makenane ranom paki , Waom wane biŋek ra togolekone , ea siluŋ makene . ’
40005034	Ŋo na iwa ŋidanbe , ŋine kine kine mane makei wane rau paki , don yau yaup eao more misuk ra togolekei , qeliwo mode more , misuk ra togolekei , onoka wane qeli yemo Anutu wane met met .
40005035	Me kepeo misuk mode more ra togolekei , onoka wane kepe yemo Anutu wane gesoke met metine , me Yerusalem matko mode more misuk ra togogolekei , onoka wane ea yemo ŋei Waom suainane mat .
40005036	Me leweŋino misuk mode more ra togolekei , onoka wane ŋine leweŋine zoune mane mau mi wakoeake me mi sigileake .
40005037	Ŋine rawe raso yemo ‘ Okkei ’ me ‘ Mida ’ maine rakei . Don natne yaup rakei , ea yemo ŋei borikine welainano ŋine sarimaike .
40005038	“ Ŋine don iwa yale raraine pamaike , ea mo detkoi , ‘ Ŋei maneŋo geŋane deŋone qe pilikki , ge turuŋine eŋane deine qe pilikkene , so mane eŋe geŋane ŋetŋone kito muzuŋgi , ge turuŋine eŋane ŋetne kito muzuŋgene ’ .
40005039	Ŋo noŋo yemo iwa ŋidanbe detpi , ŋei mane eŋe masi qotkoine okan ŋungi , ŋine turuŋine qotkoineka mi okankakei . Ŋo ŋei mane eŋe tagenŋine wongoken ŋinguyakeo , ŋine tagenŋine kanaoken ea weneŋ sunkau ŋinguyake .
40005040	Ŋo ŋei mane eŋe mulapko biraganiakane geu ari takotŋone mayakeo , ge momo takotŋone ea weneŋ sunkanom mayake .
40005041	So kawali ŋei magu eŋane keuoŋine mane eŋe aboŋine numa bamgo ea wane rokop ma arikenane soringangi , ge maine ewekine numa kiroine ea wane rokop ma arikene .
40005042	Ŋei mane kine kine mane manikenane ra gangi , eŋe maine manikene . Ŋei mane eŋe geŋano ŋine kine kine mane kulit geu mayakane raki , ge kine kine ea maine eŋe manikene .
40005043	“ Ŋine don mane iwa yale raraine pamaike , ea mo detkoi , “ Kimakopŋine wet maep okan onikei , ŋo ŋabakopŋine yemo qaisik onikei . ’
40005044	Ŋo noŋo yemo ŋidanbe detpi , ŋabakopŋine wet maep okan ongei , paki ŋingu matali okanŋungei , eŋane Anutu meŋenkau , turuŋene bira yake .
40005045	Yale okanbi paki , ŋine baŋ Magaŋine qeliwo gemaike , eŋane gipolekoune okangei . Eŋe maki kaiweineŋo sirike , ŋei ŋerep maine so borikine eŋano rokop wekuka qe okanmaike , so koya ebon okanmaike , ŋei ŋerep masi maine okanmami , so tanik borikine okanmami weneŋ .
40005046	Ŋine ŋei ŋereppa wet maep okan ŋunmami , eŋeka weku wet maep okan ongeiwo , yemo Anutu eŋe onoka wane lewine qole ŋuniake ? Takis so borikine mama ŋei eŋe yaleka ea ma okanmami ! Kepe ŋei wane rokop yuankaikei !
40005047	So ŋine kimakop ŋine eŋeropka weku don awo nagukeiwo , yemo ŋine ŋei ŋerep natne onokaŋo tebaongei ? Qelaŋ ŋei ŋerep eŋe yaleka ea ma okanmami ! Kepe ŋei wane rokop yuankaikei !
40005048	Ea wane ŋine koboboine gekei , Magaŋine qeliwo eŋe koboboine gemaike , ŋine eŋane rokop magekei !
40006001	“ Ŋine miti urata kine kine maine ea ŋei ŋerep eŋane deeno mau , edo ŋune more , solaŋine mawakei wane , ŋine misuk maikei . Ŋine urata kine kine korop iwa ŋei ŋerep eŋane deeno mau , solaŋine mawakeiwo , yemo ŋine baŋ ea wane lewine Magaŋine qeliwo gemaike , eŋano ŋine mane mi makei .
40006002	“ Ea wane ŋine kine kine mane ŋei mane wanap aboŋine midaine manbe ra , yemo ŋine ukat sua didiwo , yale misuk okangei . Miti ŋei isisine edo lewa lewaŋ urumgo so numa suaino okanmami , eŋe ŋei ŋerep edo one more mawa ongei wane , yale okan okanmami . Iwa yale desikei ! Eŋe ea wane lewine mo korop qoleon wareke .
40006003	Ŋo ŋine ŋei mane wanap aboŋine midaine qesiŋkawe ra , yemo ŋine sanka siu siuko qesiŋkau , kimaŋine osoŋino gemaike , eŋe ea wane kine misuk desiake .
40006004	Ea yemo baŋ geŋone bonepŋone okaniake , paki Magaŋone , eŋe kine kine onokaka bonepŋone okanmaine , ea kaki paki lewine baŋ qoleganiake .
40006005	“ Ŋine meŋenkawe ra , miti ŋei isisine eŋe yale misuk okangei ! Eŋe lewa lewaŋ urumgo ŋei ŋerep eŋane kaitko wie okorau paki meŋenkakei wane , so numa qesik qesikino ŋei ŋerep edo one more mawa onikeiwane on okanmaike . Iwa yale desikei ! Ŋei ŋerep eŋe one mawaon okanbi , eaŋo lewineene okangi , mo korop qoemaike , Anutuŋo baŋ lewineene mi qoleake .
40006006	Ŋo ge meŋenkakenane okannom paki , urumŋone koto waket more , madetŋone kitokene , paki Magaŋone deŋo mi kakaine , eŋe meŋenkakene . Eso Magaŋone eŋe onokaka bonep okanmaine , ea kaki paki , lewine baŋ qoleganiake .
40006007	“ Meŋe meŋenŋino don loutne wele midaine misuk dapore meŋenkakei , yale ŋei miti midaine , qelaŋ edo meŋenka okanmami . Eŋe iwa yale wetke okan okanmami , Anutuŋo meŋe meŋenene baŋ desiake , onokawane eŋe meŋe meŋen kiroroine meŋen kamami , ea wane .
40006008	Ŋine eŋe yale meŋe meŋen kiroine misuk okangei , Magaŋine eŋe onokaka mikepka zuageu paki olatmami , ea mo detmaike .
40006009	Ea wane ŋine iwa yale ra meŋenkakei , ‘ Ŋenane Magaze ge qeliwo metmaine , geŋane eŋetŋone koboboine payake ,
40006010	Sari koto baŋem kepe baŋem Waom okanŋonnom , qeliwo geŋane aŋa tewe tewek pamaike , yale waka kepeo ŋenano wakoniake .
40006011	Ge ukude ŋaraze ŋebonikene ,
40006012	Ge borikineze korop qeliŋ warekene , ŋene yaleka matali ŋonmami , ŋei yewa eŋane borikineene qeliŋ waremaine .
40006013	Ge liwe liwek togolo misuk biraŋonikene , siluŋ borikino ŋine makok ŋonikene . ’
40006014	“ Ŋine ŋei ŋerep borikine okanŋunbi , eŋane sot turuŋ qeliŋgeiwo , yemo Magaŋine qeliwo gemaike , eŋe yaleka ŋinane sot turuŋine baŋ qelige ŋiboniake .
40006015	Ŋo ŋine natne eŋane sot turuŋ mi qeliŋgeiwo , yemo Magaŋine qeliwo gemaike , eŋe yaleka ŋinane sot turuŋ okanmami , ea mi qeligeake .
40006016	“ So ŋine miti wane sawe gekei , naso yewao kaitŋine zoileki miti ŋei isisine eŋane masi misuk okangei . Eŋe lolike ariu , ŋara wane seukmami yale kaitene onbi paki , ŋei ŋerep eŋe sawe gemami , yale dere ebongei wane yale okanmami . Ŋine iwa yale desikei ! Ea wane lewine eŋe mo korop mau qoeke .
40006017	Ge miti wane sawe gege wane ŋara midaine ge arikene , naso yewao kaitŋone sauke , so leweŋone yasokene .
40006018	Yale okannom , ŋei ŋerep natne eŋe ge sawe gemaine , ea wane kine maine mi detkei . Geŋane Magaŋone deŋo mi kakaine , eŋe wekuŋo baŋ desiake . So Magaŋone eŋe ge bonepŋone kine kine daleo mamaine , ea kaki paki , lewine baŋ qoleganiake .
40006019	“ Ŋine aboŋ kine kine loutne iwa kepeo misuk more maguke wakei , ea sip kine kineŋo ki barakeake , so weŋemine zeki paki barakeake , so kobu mama eŋe ra barake waket kobu ma arikei .
40006020	Ea wane turuŋ , ŋine wet maep wane aboŋ kine kine , ŋine maine weti qeli kotino pamaike , ea more maguke wakei , ea yemo sip kine kineŋo mi ki barake mataliake , so weŋemine mi zeake , so kobu mama edo ra barake waket , kobu mi ma arikei .
40006021	Aboŋ kine kineŋone pamaike , yewaoka wetŋone motnom , naso baŋem pa ariake .
40006022	“ Deŋo sola wane kiwa yale okanmaike . Deŋone maine payakeo , geŋane solaŋone korop qelaŋan ŋoka watke payake ,
40006023	Ŋo deŋone boriakeo , yemo solaŋone korop eamo baŋ panaman koto qeka maka okaniake . Eso ea wane rokop kotoŋono qelaŋan pamaike , ea komayakeo , yemo panaman i zok manerop wakongangi , qeka maka okangene !
40006024	“ Ŋei wekuŋo ŋei waom etke erane qelit maine mi mayake , eŋe baŋ mane qikkaki paki , mane wet maep okan kayake , eŋe baŋ mane wano makatake more , mane ŋadekkayake . Ŋine Anutu wane qelit so wesi urata orodoŋka maine mi makei .
40006025	“ Ea wane na ŋidanbe detpi , ŋine ŋara so doku kine kine me takot lap lap solaŋine qekat kekeiwane ŋaŋaeu paki , onokaŋo qesiŋ ŋongi gekene ra , gege ŋinane dere mezet mi okangei . Gegeŋo manerop wele , ŋara mi yuankamaike me ? So solaŋo manerop wele , takot laplap mi yuankamaike me ?
40006026	Naŋi onbi riwe ari sari gemami , eŋe ŋara mi ebot okanmami , eŋe ŋara mau waki maune ŋara urumgo mi mot okanmami , Magaŋine qeliwo gemaike , oŋo wareongi ge okanmami . Ŋine leweŋine zok manerop suaine , naŋi eŋane rokop mi yuankamaike me ? Magakŋo qeliwo gemaike , wareŋuneake .
40006027	Ŋinano ŋine mane maŋo koma natne koso manerop takotke geki paki , ea wane maine dere mezet okane geake ?
40006028	“ So onoka wane takot laplap wane zok dere mezet okanmami ? Ŋine onbi , eki zubaine zuraune daleo sua okanmami ? Eŋe takot laplapenane urataine mi ma okanmami , me edomka mi ma okanmami .
40006029	Ŋo na siluŋ ŋidanbe detpi , Solomon eŋe aboŋine suaine gekeŋo takotine kibi maep korop , eki zuraune iwa wane rokop mi ma geke .
40006030	Iwamo Anutu oŋom touk zubaine takotene biraon okanmaike . Touk eamo ukude iwa okoramami , wane qaekiwo yemo mida lele arikei , gerep koto qakeu waketpi ezoki siuk warekei . Wane eŋe ŋine takot manerop mi qorotŋuniake me ? O , mali malip ŋigagatneka ma gemami ! Dere mezet mi okane gekei !
40006031	Eso yalinane ŋine kieke dere mezet mi okane rakei , ‘ Ŋarane dia ŋine sariki nekale ? Me dokune dia ŋine maratka nekale ? Me takot laplapne dia ŋine ma au gekale ? ’
40006032	Kine kine iwa yemo korop qelaŋ edo ea wane naso baŋem ra okanmami . Magaŋine qeliwo gemaike , eŋe ŋine kine kine iwa korop ŋaŋaemami , ea mo det waremaike .
40006033	Ea wane turuŋine yemo , ŋine kine kine kepe wane kutno pamaike , ea wane dere mezet mi okane gekei , ŋine qeli gege togon wane aboŋ so kine kine onokaka Magakŋo wetkemaike , ea makei , pakimo eŋe kine kine natne kepe iwa korop , ea baŋ ŋiboniake .
40006034	Eso yalinane qaeki wane dere mezet mi okangei . Qaeki wane dere mazet eŋe baŋ qaeki oŋomka rokouno dere mezet okaniake . Kaiweine kaiweine eaŋo umatpae ma sarimaike , eao misuk takotkekei . ”
40007001	“ Ŋine ŋei natne misuk wanok ongei , eso yale okangei , yemo Anutuŋo ŋine yaleka baŋ mi wanok ŋuniake .
40007002	Onoka wane , ŋine ŋei natne wanok ongei , ea wane rokopka Anutu eŋe ŋine wanokŋuniake , so ŋine ŋei natne numa rokop more ebongei , numa weku eaka Anutuŋo baŋ ŋine more ŋiboniake .
40007003	Pakimo ge onoka wane kimaŋonane deino gok pamaike , eamo kamaine , ŋo geŋone deŋono eki sisine metmaike , eamo mi kamaine ?
40007004	Eki sisine geŋone deŋono metki , ge daleo kima ŋone iwa yale olasikene , ‘ Kima , ge detnannom , na deŋono gok metmaike , ea kitowe saketkep ? ’
40007005	Ge isi ŋei ! Eki sisine geŋone deŋono pamaike , ea alakane manom sakesiake , paki ge deŋone maine pore kakene , eso ŋado kimaŋonane deino ŋine gok ea manom sakesiake .
40007006	“ Kine kine kobekine ea kasi misuk ebongei , eŋe yemo weku zinge mo baŋ ŋidosikei , ŋine zenam ŋine berek eŋane soteno misuk birakei , eŋe yemo weku zolipeneŋo baŋ qe pelekeu kesiake , pakimo koso zinge ŋinŋine ŋaba ŋunikei .
40007007	“ Meŋenkanom paki , ge baŋ makene , zuaŋ mage ge wele baŋ maratkakene , madetko yatonom , baŋ lalage giniake .
40007008	Mane eŋe meŋen kamaikeŋo baŋ mayake , so mane eŋe zuaŋ maikeŋo wele baŋ marat kayake , ŋo mane eŋe madetko yatomaike , eŋe baŋ lalage maniake .
40007009	Ŋinano ŋine ma magakŋo gipole bret wane olatki mo , eŋe wesi wanaune maniake ?
40007010	Me ma ŋeiŋo gipole zawon wane olatki mo , eŋe koma qotkoine mane maniake ? Midakaka .
40007011	Ŋine kepe ŋei borikine yalineŋo gipon borasokopŋine ŋara aboŋ maine ebon okanmami . Magaŋine qeliwo gemaike , oŋo kine kine maine manerop baŋ meŋenka okanmami , eŋe maine eboniake !
40007012	“ Iwaŋo yemo Mose wane ra rokop don ea wane kine so propet eŋane don qeturaŋmaike , ŋine ŋei ŋerep natne edo yeye kine kine okanŋungei wane wetke okanmami , kop yaleka ŋei ŋerep natne eŋe ŋine okanongei .
40007013	“ Ŋine madet qeka qekaine eaka waketkei , onoka wane sora gerep wane madet yemo suaine , so ea wane numa yemo kakapa , yewao ŋei loutneŋo ari okanmami .
40007014	Gege wane madet yemo qeka qekaine , so ea wane numa yemo nigagatne , so numa eaoken arikene yemo umatne so wikile teine , eso ŋei ewekine edoka ea maratka okanmami .
40007015	“ Propet isisine eŋane diam seleleine makei , eŋe ŋinano sariu onbi , solaeneŋo lama sola okaniake , ŋo kotoeneŋo yemo kasi zubaine , eŋane koto yale payake .
40007016	Ŋine kineene yemo baŋ numa kine kine okangei , eao detonikei . Mulap wakelerop , eao wele nenine mi wakon okanmaike .
40007017	Eki maine eŋe wele maine qekimo , eki qotkoine eŋe wele qotkoine qeake .
40007018	Eki maine mane eŋe wele qotkoine mi qeake , so eki qotkoine mane eŋe wele maine mi qeake .
40007019	Eki natne wele maine mi qekei , yemo kitatpi ketki gerepko qakeu ezoyake .
40007020	Eso yalinao ŋine baŋ propet isisine eŋane tanik manik okangei , eao kineene detongei .
40007021	“ Ŋei ŋerep loutneŋo ‘ Waom , Waom , ’ nora okanmami , eŋe koropŋo qeli gege togon kotino mi waket warekei . Magane qeliwo gemaike , eŋane aŋaine teweke more , urata ma okanmami , edoka weku waketkei .
40007022	Kaiwe naso yewa bomile sariki , ŋei ŋerep loutneŋo baŋ iwa yale nolale rakei , ‘ Waom , Waom ! Geŋane eŋetko gora more , ŋene Anutu wane don edangone , geŋane eŋet gora more , ŋene asu qotkoine loutne esop onŋem saket ariwarekoi , so masi togogole loutne ma okangone ! ’
40007023	Yale raumo , na baŋ iwa yale edangale , ‘ Na ŋine mi detŋungole , wie biranane ari wareu , ŋine borikine mama ! ’
40007024	“ Eso ŋei mane eŋe naŋane don iwa dere tewekeake , eŋe baŋ ŋei mane dereretinerop yale okaniake . Ŋei dereretinerop mane oŋo matine wesi kutno maki metke .
40007025	Paki koya suaine qeki doku qakum suaine wieke , so momo suaine togogole puane more , mat ea qe make , ŋo siluŋ mat ea mi mak maŋge , onoka wane mat ea wesi kutno make , ea wane togole metke .
40007026	“ Ŋo ŋei mane eŋe naŋane don iwa dere mi tewekeake , eŋe ŋei mane qelaŋ yale okaniake . Ŋei qelaŋ mane eŋe matine gumo gumo kutno make .
40007027	Paki koya suaine qeki , doku qakum suaine wieki , momo suaine puane , mat ea togoleka qe mak maŋge . Makmaŋgi okmage ket zaŋ zuŋ make ! ”
40007028	Yesu eŋe don iwa korop rawareki qoeki , ŋei ŋerep magu suaine eŋe miti rarainane detpi paki , oŋaene qaeki welelepkekoi .
40007029	Eŋe ra rokop don kito ebo ebonkopene , eŋane dereret wane rokopko mi edange , eŋe miti don zonominerop edange .
40008001	Yesu eŋe bonagao ŋine ketki , ŋei ŋerep magu suaineŋo ŋadino arikoi .
40008002	Ŋei mane kube rubet eŋe Yesu wano sari more , wawetine qe umi ketki paki rake , “ Suaine , ge naŋane simile ganmaikeo , yemo maine neunom menaŋgale . ”
40008003	Yesuŋo metine bira , so solaino make , pakiso olatke , “ Na simile nanmaike . Ge kubetŋone osikep ! ” Rakiso eaka kubetine piridiŋgi libe qe osike .
40008004	Pakiso Yesuŋo olale rake , “ Detnom ! Ge ŋei mane misuk edangene , ge siluŋ pris wano koboine ari sikankanom , solaŋone ganiake , pakiso Moseŋo rake , yale soe soep mitnom , ŋei ŋerep eŋe gane more , ge solaŋone osike , ea desikei . ”
40008005	Yesu eŋe Kaperneam matko ari waketki , Roman kawali ŋei eŋane ware ware maneŋo maratkaki paki , mapik kayakane olale rake ,
40008006	“ Suaine , naŋane qelit medepne , eŋe matko zomakaki pamaike , eŋe kie metine seu seune okanmaike , wikile zok manerop detmaike . ”
40008007	Rakiso , Yesuŋo olatke , “ Na baŋ ariwe paki , mawe menageake . ”
40008008	Raki , kawali ŋei eŋane ware wareŋo mainge olale rake , “ O , mida suaine , na ŋei maine mida , ea wane ge naŋane matko misuk sarikene , ge yaup iwa mere donŋoka ranom menageake .
40008009	Na yaleka , ŋei suaine wawaine kiqa guruŋ guruŋ enerop eŋet biŋek suaine , eŋane bango ketkele gemaile , so na kawali ŋeikopne ebuwe , eŋe naŋane bango gemami . Wane na eŋano ŋine mane wane rakale , ‘ Ari ! ’ Rawe eŋe ariake , so mane eriwa wane rakale , ‘ Sari ! ’ Rawe eŋe sariake . So na qelit medep wane rakale , ‘ Iwa manom ! ’ Rawe eŋe ea mayake . ”
40008010	Yesu eŋe don ea dere welepke more , ŋei ŋerep ŋadino arikoi eŋe edane rake , “ Na rawe delukkeu , na mali malip iwa yaline Israel ŋinane keuo ŋine mane wano mi ka okanmaile .
40008011	Ea wane iwa detpi ! Ŋei ŋerep loutneŋo kepe deine samaikeo ŋine , so ketmaikeo ŋine , baŋ sari more , ŋara nene zakeo qeli gege togon kotino pese ket , Abraham , Isak , so Yakop , eŋerop weneŋ mesikei .
40008012	Ŋo ŋinano ŋine Yuda welaine natne qeli gege togon kotino gegine , eŋe mi waketkei , yemo baŋ ebu biraongi , panaman koto qeinat ket more , yewao baŋ aroke ŋet warik warik ki gekei . ”
40008013	Pakiso , Yesuŋo ware ware olale rake , “ Matko arinom , pakimo ge detluke malipkamaine , ea wane welewa eamo wakonganiake . ” Pakiso nasomde eaka ware ware wane qelit medep menaŋkake .
40008014	Yesu eŋe Petoro wane matko arike , eso ea kaki Petoro sewenine eŋe zoma kaki papaino pake , zoma gereunerop qeke .
40008015	Eŋe ka more metino maki , so zomaŋo qeliŋka arike , paki so ŋerep eŋe wieki paki , kieke ŋaraine mire mauluke Yesu mange .
40008016	Kepe qoeki , ŋei ŋerep eŋe ŋei ŋerep loutne asu qotkoineŋo kotoeno ket gekoi , ea ebu Yesu wano sarikoi . Yesu eŋe asu qotkoine ea donŋo ra esopongi saket warekoi paki , zoma onge ea korop ma menaŋon wareke .
40008017	Eŋe yewa okange , yemo propet Isaiaŋo don mane sogino iwa yale rake , ea wane weleine wakoniakane ea make , “ Eŋe oŋomka ŋenane zomaze ŋebu mawareke , so zoma kine kineze korop teweke ariwareke . ”
40008018	Yesu eŋe ŋei ŋerep loutneŋo sari lolikkau ongi paki , eri doku namuŋ nat arikei wane dokoine edange .
40008019	Pakiso , ra rokop don wane kito ebo ebon maneŋo Yesu wano sariki paki rake , “ Kito ŋebo ŋebon , na mo ewekmaile , ge yewao me yewao arikene , na weneŋ gerop arikale . ”
40008020	Yesuŋo mainge olatke , “ Kasi zubaine eŋe aŋapenerop kulu pamami , so naŋi eŋe matenerop , ŋo Ŋei Wawainane Gipole eŋe yemo matine midaine , diawao ket paki paki zonom mayake ? ”
40008021	Ŋei mane , eŋine dokoine eŋane keueno ŋineŋo Yesu olale rake , “ Suaine , mikepka qeliŋnanom , zinge ari magane seukkeakane okangi paki , seukke dukkawe paki , baŋ zinge ŋadeŋono koso sarikale . ”
40008022	Yesuŋo mainge olatke , “ Yeine ŋadeno sarinom , paki seuseune gege togon qeliŋonnom , edomka seuseune kopene dukongei . ”
40008023	Yesu eŋe seki koto waki , so dokoine eŋe eŋerop weneŋ arikoi .
40008024	Ariu yewaka momo suaineŋo sari doku namuŋ eao qe talekaki , dibom suaine tepke wie more qakki , seki somekake . Ŋo Yesu eŋe kulu pake .
40008025	Dokoine eŋe eŋano ari ma wirikkau wieki olale rakoi , “ Waom qesiŋ ŋonnom , ŋene mo midakenane okanmaine ! ”
40008026	Yesuŋo edane rake , “ Ŋine mali malipŋine nigagatne onoka wane zok kaet ŋunmaike ? ” Yale edangi paki wie more , momo so dibom don etane rawet otke , pakiso momo ea giriŋ doŋ mane pakiso kaloŋ suaine dumene pake .
40008027	Ŋei eŋe ea kau paki welelepke more rakoi , “ Yai , ŋei iwa eŋe ma ? Yaline ea wane momo so dibom ere aŋaine tewekmamik ! ”
40008028	Yesu eŋe sari Gadara ŋei eŋane kepeo doku namuŋ nat paromine ea lotkeke , pakiso ŋei etke eto marat kakoik , ere ŋei dukon dukon kem ea ŋine saket sarikoik . Ŋei etke ea ere asu qotkoineŋo koto etno ket gekoi , ea wane ere zok zubaine okanbik , ŋei ŋerep maneŋo numa eaka mane mi ari okangoi , kaet okangoi .
40008029	Ere esatka aroke rakoik , “ Anutu wane Gipole , ge ŋere daleo okan ŋotkene ? Ge naso koboine mi bomileki , ŋere wikile alakane ŋepongenane sarimaine me ? ”
40008030	Berek magu mane eŋe abaran mida , osop ŋara ne gekoi .
40008031	Asu qotkoine eŋe Yesu togoleka olale rakoi , “ Ge esopŋonnom saket keneo , yemo taleŋonnom ari berek magu yewa eŋane kotoeno kesikene . ”
40008032	Yesuŋo edange , “ Ariu , ” rakiso , eŋe saket more ari berek eŋane kotoeno ketwarekoi . Pakiso berek magu yewa eŋe sora wazaino biririke ari , so doku namuŋ koto ketpi ma qorok onwareke .
40008033	Ŋeiwa berek wareone gekoi , eŋe biririke mat suaino ari ŋei ŋerep donkisi korop edangoi , so ŋeiwa asu qotkoinerop ere daleo okangoik , ea wane don kisi weneŋ edangoi .
40008034	Pakiso , ŋei ŋerep koropŋo mat suaino ŋine Yesu kakeiwane arikoi , Ari kau pakiso kepeene ea qelige ariakane olatkoi .
40009001	Yesu eŋe seki koto waki paki , zinge koso doku namuŋ yuane more eŋine matino sarike .
40009002	Pakiso ŋei natne eŋe ŋei mane kie metine bori worine eŋano ma sarikoi , eŋe supi kutno pake . Yesu eŋe mali malipene zok pake , ea detki paki , ŋei kie metine seu seune eŋe olale rake , “ Togolenom , medepne ! Geŋane sotŋone mo oma ganmaile . ”
40009003	Paki ra rokop don kito ebo ebon ŋei natne eŋe edomka auye rakoi , “ Ŋei iwa ono ka wane eŋe Anutu ewe mabaik okan kamaike ? ”
40009004	Yesu eŋe ea wetkekoi , ea wane wetenane kine detongi paki rake , “ Ŋine wetŋineŋo onoka wane borikine wetkemami ?
40009005	Diawaŋo ewekine raikene , ‘ Geŋane sotŋone mo matalimaile ’ , me raikene , ‘ Wienom paki , arinom ’ ?
40009006	Ea wane na baŋ ra qelaŋanŋunbe ŋine detpi , ŋei Wawainane Gipole eŋe kepeo ŋei sotene mataliki siukeakane zonom pa manmaike . ” Eso yale edane , so ŋei mete seu seune eŋe olale rake , “ Ge kaŋzaŋ wienom , lameke papaŋone manom paki , matko arinom ! ”
40009007	Ŋei eŋe kaŋzaŋ wie , so matko arike .
40009008	Ŋei eŋe ea kau paki kaetonge , paki Anutu eŋe zonom iwa yaline ŋei ebongane mawa kakoi .
40009009	Yesu eŋe mat yewa qelige arike , eso eŋe ari ariki paki , ŋei mane takis mama eŋe kake , eŋetine Mataio , eŋe takis mama urumine koto metke . Yesuŋo olale rake , “ Ŋadeno sarinom . ” Rakiso Mataioŋo kaŋzaŋ wie ŋadino arike .
40009010	Yesu eŋe eŋane matko ŋara ne metki , eaka takis mama ŋei so borikine mama ŋei loutneŋo sari , eŋe so dokoine eŋano takotke more , eŋerop ŋara zakeo weneŋ metkoi .
40009011	Parisi natneŋo ea kau paki , dokoine edane rakoi , “ Ŋinane kito ŋibo ŋibon eŋe onoka wane takis mama so borikine mama eŋerop mere ŋara nemaike ? ”
40009012	Yale rau , Yesuŋo detongi paki edange , “ Ŋei ŋerep solaene maine weteno dere , edo dokta wano mi ari okanmami , ŋo zoma kubet korop edoka weku ari okanmami .
40009013	Ŋine ariu paki , Anutu wane papiaŋo don iwa daleo wane ramaike , ea wane dapotpi paki , kine maine detlukkei , ‘ Anutuŋo ramaike , na osomŋo soe soep yauwine rokouneka mire nin okanmami , ea wane na zok mi simin nan okanmaike , wet borik so mauluk mauluk wane simin nan okanmaike . ’ Raki paki koso rake , na ramaile , na ŋei maine eweenerop wetene detokanmami , na eŋe edora newan ongalane mida , borikine mama , borikinene ŋadekakei wane , na edora newan ongalane ketkole . ”
40009014	Naso yewao Yohane doku tau tau wane dokoine eŋe Yesu wano sari qesonka rakoi , “ Onoka wane ŋene so Parisi ŋedoka sawe gamaine , ŋo geŋane dokoŋone eŋe mane kaki sawe mi ge okanmami ? ”
40009015	Yesuŋo edange , “ Ŋine ŋei lobo zokit mama wane batko sarimi , eŋe ŋerep ŋaone eŋe eŋeropka geki , eŋe wet borik okan okanmami me ? Yale midakaka ! Ŋo baŋ naso bomileake , yewao ŋerep ŋaone eŋe kimakoune eŋano ŋine ma arikei , eao yemo eŋe baŋ ŋara midaine , sawe ge arikei . ”
40009016	Yale raki paki so koso don rokop mane rake , “ Ŋei maneŋo lap lap tutu museleŋo takot suaine sogine bara warakine eao maine mi maturage qetusiake , onoka wane tutu musele eaŋo abongi , takot suaine sogine ea barakki , aŋaine koso manerop suayake .
40009017	Me don mane wele wekuku , ŋei maneŋo wain doku musele ea qeki , wain solaine soginane eao maine mi weteake . Ŋo eŋe qeki wetemaikeo , yemo wain solaine barake , pakimo wain musele ea qake saketki solaine ea borimaike . Ea wane tungo , yemo wain musele ea wain solaine musele eao qeki weteake , pakimo eretnarek maineka pakeik . ”
40009018	Yesu eŋe don iwa edane okoraki , Yuda ŋei eŋane ware ware maneŋo eŋano sariki paki , wawetine qeki paki olale rake , “ Naŋane borasone mo seukmaike , ŋo siluŋ sarinom paki , meteŋone kutno motnom eŋe baŋ wisikae geake . ”
40009019	Eso Yesu eŋe wie more ŋadino mogare ariki , dokoine eŋe weneŋ arikoi .
40009020	Ŋo ŋerep mane eŋe ŋerep zoma qotkoine naso kiroroine zok geki , koma 12 okange , oŋo Yesu wane ŋadino sariki paki , takotinane mezeno ea make .
40009021	Paki eŋe oŋomka wetke rake , “ Na weku takotine uakakaleo , yemo na baŋ menaŋgale . ”
40009022	Yesuŋo zinge more , eŋe kake paki rake , “ Borasone , mi kaet gangep ! Geŋone mali malipŋoneŋo geuki menaŋmaine . ” Rakiso yewaoka ŋerep ea solaine menaŋkake .
40009023	Eso Yesu eŋe ware ware wane mat koto ari wake , paki onge seu seu wane mulup pua puan ŋei eŋe puangoi , ŋo ŋei ŋerep natne korop eŋe aro suaine arokkoi .
40009024	Yesuŋo edane rake , “ Ŋine korop ket wareu ! Ŋerep ŋerep eŋe mi seukmaike , eŋe yemo kulu pamaike ! ” Eŋe korop kieke tenik kakoi , ea wane mo seukmaike detkakoi .
40009025	Ŋei ŋerep korop ebuwi ket wareu , Yesu eŋe eaka ŋerep wane urum koto wake , pakiso metino malipka okoraki , so eŋe kaŋzage wieke .
40009026	Pakiso ea wane don kisiŋo kepe yewao korop sua arike .
40009027	Yesu eŋe mat ea qelige ariki , yewaka ŋei de pilik etke ere ŋadino kieke mogare arikoik . Paki suaineka boka rakoik , “ Ge Dawit wane qerakine , Anutuŋo biragangi ŋenano ketkone , ŋerane wetŋone borikep ! ”
40009028	Yesu mat koto waki , eaka ŋei de pilik etke ere eŋano sarikoik . Pakiso eŋe qeson ore rake , “ Na iwa maine makale , ea ŋire malip nanmamik ? ” Ere mainge rakoik , “ O , Suaine malip ganmaite ! ”
40009029	Pakiso Yesu eŋe de etno ma so rake , “ Ŋire detluke malipnanimik , ea wane rokopko maine wakon ŋusiake ! ”
40009030	Rakiso , de etne koso manerop pot lotkekoik , pakiso Yesuŋo don togoleka etane rake , “ Iwa wane don kisi ŋei mane misuk edangeik ! ”
40009031	Ŋo ere don ea detpik paki , soringe ari Yesu wane donkisi ra sua ariuk , eŋane don kisiŋo kepe ea korop rokopke arike .
40009032	Ŋei yewa ere ariuk , so ŋei natne eŋe ŋei mane qelaŋ don mi raraine , ea Yesu wano ma sarikoi , onoka wane eŋe asu qotkoineŋo kotino ket geke , ea wane ma sarikoi .
40009033	Wane asu qotkoine ea esopkaki saketki , so eaka ŋei yewa eŋe don kieke rake . Pakiso ŋei ŋerep magu suaine eŋe kau paki , oŋaene qaeki welelepke rakoi , “ Masi iwa yaline Israel ŋenano mane mi wakongi ka okangone me ? ”
40009034	Ŋo Parisi eŋe yemo rakoi , “ Iwa yemo asu qotkoine eŋane suaineene oŋo zonom mangi esopongi saket arimami . ”
40009035	Eso Yesu eŋe mat suaine so nigatne korop lolike qeare one arike . Eŋe Yuda lewa lewaŋ urum baŋem wa more don kito edange , yemo Waom wane qeli gege togon don kisi maine yewa ra qelaŋane edange , so ŋei ŋerep eŋane keueno zoma kine kineenerop ebuki menaŋwarekoi .
40009036	Eŋe ŋei ŋerep magu suaine ongi paki , eŋane wet borikŋo qomine watkeke , onoka wane eŋe wetene yau yaup motpi paki , kito qesiŋene midaine , lama ware wareene midaine yale gekoi , ea wane
40009037	Eso ea wane eŋe dokoine edane rake , “ Ea kau , eu suaine mane yewao , ŋara mo menage pamaike , ŋo ŋara ma more urum koto mot mot wane urata ŋeine yemo ewekine mi okanmaike .
40009038	Ea wane ŋine ŋara eu ea wane welaine meŋenkau , eŋe urata ŋei natne biraongi , euino ŋine ŋara ma urumgo mosikei wane arikei . ”
40010001	Yesu eŋe dokoine 12 edoraki sari qeturaŋgoi , paki eŋe zonom ebonge , asu qotkoine esoponbi saket arikei wane , so zoma kine kine enerop so kubet kine kine enerop ebuwi menaŋ ongei wane .
40010002	Iwa yemo aposolo 12 eŋane eŋetene , lewet yemo Saimon , Petoro orake , so eŋane ŋole Andrea , Yakop , so eŋane ŋole Yohane , Zebedi gipoletkine ,
40010003	Pilip so Bartolomu , Tomas so Mataio , takis mama , Yakop , Alpius gipole , so Tadius ,
40010004	Saimon Patriot , so Yudas Iskariot , oŋo Yesu ŋaba eŋane meto birakake .
40010005	Yesu eŋe dokoine 12 , don iwa yale edangi paki tale ongi arikoi , “ Ŋine qelaŋ ŋei eŋane kepeo , me Samaria ŋei eŋane mat maneo misuk arikei .
40010006	Ea wane tungo yemo ŋine Yuda wane lama yau yaup ket kere wete ari gemami , Israel ŋei ŋerep magu eŋano ariu .
40010007	Ariu paki don iwa yale edanbi , ‘ Qeli gege togon nasoine mo bomile osop sarimaike ! ’
40010008	Zomarop ma menaŋongei , seuseune ma wisikae ongei , kubetenerop ebuwi solaene libe qe osiake , asu qotkoine ea esop onbi saket ariwarekei . Ŋine zonom yewa lewine midaine makoi , ea wane ŋine lewine midaine yaup ebongei .
40010009	Ŋine gol natne , me silwa , me wesi mane misuk malo kite ŋino more ma gekei ,
40010010	ŋine kieke arikei , naso yewao kite , gerep , ea misuk ma numa arikei , me takot etkeka , me kie tabe so maun , me qesi etkeka mane misuk magekei , urata ŋei , eŋe onoka wane ŋaŋae more ziaŋmaike , eamo yaup lewine midaine manikei .
40010011	“ Ŋine mat suaine maneo me mat nigatne maneo ariu paki , mat koto wau paki onikei , ŋei mane maŋo eweke more don awo ŋuniake , yemo ŋine eŋeropka mere kito okane ge mage , mat ea qelige arikei .
40010012	Ŋine mat maneo waketpi paki rakei , ‘ Peamŋo gerop pakep . ’
40010013	Mat ea wane ŋei ŋereune eŋe don awo ŋunikeiwo , yemo ŋinane peam donŋo motpi eŋano payake , ŋo eŋe don mane mi awoŋunikeiwo , yemo ŋine peam don ŋine ea koso ma zinge arikei .
40010014	So mat natne edo me mat suaine natne edo don mi awo ŋunikei , me ŋinane don mane mi desikeiwo , yemo ŋine mat ea qeliŋgei paki , kie ŋino lube lube ea sitogeu ket ea mesiake , ŋei ŋerep ea sotene weneŋ gekei .
40010015	Na welekatne ŋidanbe detpi ! Wano wanok kaiwe naso yewao Anutu eŋe Sodom so Gomora ŋei ŋerep borikine welaine , eŋe seseone more , umat ewekine eboniake , ŋo mat suaine donŋine mi detkoi , ea wane ŋei ŋerep eŋe yemo wikile so umat kakapa eboniake !
40010016	“ Detpi ! Na ŋine lama yale , kasi zubaine eŋane keueno biraŋunmaile . Ŋine diamŋine seleleine , koma eŋane masi yale makei , so naŋi baluse yale ŋine pelelekatne ŋei ŋerep okanonikei .
40010017	Diamŋine togogole makei , onoka wane ŋei eŋe baŋ ŋibu ari dongo biraŋungei , so kumunamŋo Yuda lewa lewaŋeno baŋ ŋingukei .
40010018	Ŋine baŋ ŋibu ari ŋei wawaine so ŋei waom eŋane kaitko biraŋunbi , naŋane rau paki don urata makei , yemo eŋe don maine edanmami , so qelaŋ ŋei , Yuda ŋadino gemami edanmami , ea wane wikile desikei .
40010019	Ea wane , eŋe ŋibu dongo biraŋunbi , ŋine onoka don rakene , me don daleo baŋ rakene rau paki , dere mezet misuk okangei , don raikei wane naso bomile sariki , don daleo rakei , ea wane numaine yemo baŋ Anutuŋo wetŋino mosiake .
40010020	Ŋine don rakei , yemo baŋ ŋinane mi okaniake , yemo eŋe baŋ Magaŋinane Asu wano ŋine sari wetŋino more ŋidaniake .
40010021	“ Ŋei eŋe baŋ enŋene weŋem sotak kopene eŋane kine ra dongo biraonbi ebu ari kawali ŋei edo enguwi seukei , so magakopene eŋe rokop weku yewaka doko kopene okanongei , dokokopene eŋe baŋ zinge naga magakopene ŋabaongei paki , ebu ari engukei .
40010022	Ŋei korop eŋe baŋ onoka wane naŋane rau paki qik ŋungei , ŋo mane eŋe togogole malipka okora mageki naso qoeake mo , Anutuŋo ŋei ea baŋ mayake .
40010023	So eŋe mat maneo masi qotkoine okan ŋunbi , so ŋine kakakone more wie mat maneo arikei , na welekatne ŋidanbe detpi , ŋine urataŋine Israel eŋane mat pamaike , yewao korop mi mawareu qoeake , eŋe yeka paki ŋei Wawainane Gipole eŋe sari lotkeake .
40010024	“ Kibi medepŋo kito man maninane suaine ea mi yuankamaike , me qelit medepŋo ware wareinane suaine ea mi yuankamaike .
40010025	Eso ea wane kibi medep mane eŋe konapkeki paki , yemo maine kito man manine yale okaniake , so qelit medep mane eŋe yaleka konapkeki paki , eŋe maine ware wareine yale okaniake . Na mat wane magaine , borikine welaine , Belzebul norakoiwo , yemo naŋane dokone eŋane eŋetene yemo zok manerop qotkoine edorakei !
40010026	“ Ea wane ŋine ŋei eŋane kaet misuk okangei , onoka wane kine kine kaweunerop pamaike , ea baŋ kawet lalaŋgi didiwo wakoniake , so yeye kine kine sane pamaike , ea mo korop baŋ didiwo wakongi detwarekei .
40010027	Na panaman koto don iwa ŋidanmaile , ŋine yewaka koso kaiweo didiwo rawakongei , so ŋine don bonepŋine detokangoi , yewa ŋine mat bakine kutnoka okora ra wakongei .
40010028	Solaŋineka qeu seukeake , ŋei yewa eŋane misuk kaetŋuniake , yewa edo asuŋine maine mi qeu seukeake . Ŋo Anutu wane yemo maine kaetŋuniake , oŋo sola so oŋa oŋaŋine weneŋ orodoŋ maine sora gerepko matali osiake .
40010029	Ŋine naŋi zowoliliŋ etke ea wan toyaŋo maine qolekei , ŋo siluŋ eŋano ŋine mane Magaŋineŋo mi okki , kepo mi ket kitoyake .
40010030	Eso ŋinane , yemo leweŋine zoune ea wane zaleine yemo korop mo dapotwareke .
40010031	Eso ea wane ŋine kaet misuk okangei , ŋinane ra more Anutu detmaike , leweŋine yemo zok manerop lewine suaine , zowoliliŋ loutne eŋane rokop yuanmaike !
40010032	“ Mane eŋe na ŋei eŋane kaitko ra qelaŋan naniake , na rokop yaleka Magak qeliwo gemaike , eŋane kaitko eŋe ra qelaŋankakale .
40010033	Ŋo mane eŋe na ŋei eŋane kaitko bisopnaniake , na yaleka Magak qeliwo gemaike , eŋane kaitko eŋe baŋ bisopkakale .
40010034	“ Ŋine naŋane misuk wetke rakei , eŋe kepeo peam ma wakoniakane ketke , midakaka na kepeo peam ma wakongalane mi ketkole , na kawali pilaŋ mane ma wakongalane ketkole .
40010035	Na ŋei mapokonbe poripkekei wane ketkole , ea wane naŋane ra more maga gipon ere ŋaba nagukeik , so naŋane ra more naga boraso ere ŋaba nagukeik , so naŋane ra more ŋerep eŋe atolekopene ŋabaonikei .
40010036	Ŋei mane wane ŋabakoune qotkokoine , yemo baŋ eŋine weŋem sotawekoune edo okankakei .
40010037	“ Ŋei mane eŋe eŋine magaine me nagaine wet maep manerop okankaki paki , na nigatnemde okan naniake , eŋe naŋane biŋek mi qeake . Mane eŋe eŋine gipole me borasine wet maep manerop okankaki paki , na nigatnemde okannaniake , eŋe naŋane biŋek mi geake .
40010038	Ŋei mane eŋe kibeŋ qabeŋine ma tewekki paki , naŋane ŋadeno mi sariake , eŋe naŋane biŋek mi geake .
40010039	Ŋei mane eŋe eŋine gegeine wakoniakane urataine mayake , eŋe baŋ qeliŋgi siuke maniake . Mane eŋe gegeine naŋane raki paki qaisik kayake , eŋe baŋ wakone maniake .
40010040	“ Ŋei mane eŋe ŋine ŋibu mauluk ŋuniake , eŋe na mauluk naniake , so mane eŋe na mauluk naniake , eŋe talenangi sarikole , eŋe mauluk kayake .
40010041	Ŋei mane eŋe Anutu wane propet kima okanka mauluk kayake , onoka wane eŋe Anutu wane propet , ea wane eŋe baŋ propet wane lewine nat parom , eŋe mayake . So ŋei mane eŋe ŋei maine koboboine mane kima okanka maulukayake , onoka wane eŋe ŋei maine koboboine , ea wane eŋe baŋ ŋei maine koboboine lewine nat parom , eŋe mayake .
40010042	So iwa welekatne rawe detpi ! Ŋei mane eŋe dokone ketkele iwa eŋane keuo ŋine mane doku momoine mangi neake , onoka wane eŋe naŋane dokone , ea wane eŋe baŋ welekatne lewineine mayake . ”
40011001	Yesu eŋe don iwa korop dokoine 12 ebon wareki qoeki , ŋadino mat ea qelige , so miti don kito eboniakane so edaniakane , mat osop osop mere arike , yewa arike .
40011002	Yohane Doku Tautau eŋe mulap urumgo mere , Kristoŋo urata kine kine make , ea wane don kisiine ea detke Paki eŋe dokoine natne raongi Yesu wano arikoi .
40011003	Ari qesonka rakoi , “ Ŋedannom , ge sarikenane Yohaneŋo rake , ge weku mo sarikenane Anutuŋo biragangi ketkone , iwa me ŋene mane wane ra tomaka gekene ? ”
40011004	Yesuŋo edange , “ Zinge ariu paki , kine kine onokaka detmami so kamami , ea Yohane olatpi ,
40011005	De pilikŋo deene maine potmami , kie wawetene qoi qoineŋo maine numa arimami , kubet togole eŋe solaene piridiŋgi libe qeki gemami , ketene wonwoleŋo don maine detmami , seu seuneŋo wisikae wie more gemami , so sigi maep don mayakakatne ea , ŋei ŋerep ket qeqineŋo detmami .
40011006	Mane eŋe naŋane wet etkeka mi okaniake , eŋe wet pese desiake ! ”
40011007	Yohane dokoine eŋe koso zinge ariu , eaka Yesu eŋe Yohane wane don kisi ŋei ŋerep magu edane rake , “ Ŋine kepe yaup papaino Yohane wano onokaka kakei wane arikoi ? Ŋine gim mane metine momoŋo ma ari ma sari okangi kakei wane arikoi me ?
40011008	Ŋine ari onokaka kakoi ? Ŋei mane takotine kibi maep korop augeki , eŋe kaikei wane arikoi ? Mida ! Ŋei takot kibi maep korop yaline auge okanmami , eŋe ŋei waom urum eaoka ge okanmami !
40011009	Nolatpi , ŋine onokaka kakei wane arikoi ? Propet mane me ? O welekatne , na ŋidanbe detpi , ŋine kakoi , yemo propet mane wane rokop yuanmaike , oŋo yemo rokop mane eŋe kakoi .
40011010	Yohane eŋe weku eŋane Anutu wane papiaŋo iwa yale ramaike , ‘ Iwa eŋe naŋane siron rara ŋei , Anutuŋo ramaike , na baŋ eŋe talekawe , oŋo lewine alakangi paki , geŋane numa lalageake . ’
40011011	Iwa ŋidanbe detpi , Yohane Doku Tau tau eŋe zok kakapa suaine , eŋe kepe ŋei korop mo sogino wakonbi ge mage naso iwao gemami , eŋe yuan one more gemaike . Ŋo mane eŋe baŋ ŋado qeli gege togon wakongi , ea wane kotino ketkele geakeŋo siluŋ eŋe Yohane yuan kayake .
40011012	Yohane Doku Tautauŋo miti don kieke edange , naso yewao ŋineka sarimage , ukude kaiwe iwa qeli gege togonŋo zonom gorop wakonge wakone pamaike , pakimo ŋei sorin borin gorop , eŋe togole more ea makei wane soringemami .
40011013	Propet korop eŋe so Mose wane ra rokop don eŋe qeli gege togon wane don rau paki qe sari mageu , Yohane wane nasoo don ea raki qoeke .
40011014	So ŋine eweke more propet eŋane don desikei wane ŋunmaikeo , detlutkei , Yohane eŋe Elaiya , oŋo sariakane raraine .
40011015	Eawane ŋine ketŋineropŋo don iwa misuk ŋaŋaekei !
40011016	“ Naso iwao ŋei ŋerep gemami , na eŋe onokakao kineene rokop onbe ? Eŋe ŋerep medep nigatne edo nalu qole qole sobego metmami , ea yale . Magu mane edo magu mane eŋane boka iwa yale ra okanmami ,
40011017	‘ Ŋene geŋane zokit mama mulup puanmaine , ŋo ge eŋet mi oremaine ! Ŋene seu seu eŋet kitomaine , ŋo ge mi arokmaine ! ’
40011018	Ea wane ra more na ramaile , Yohane sarike , so eŋe sawe geke , paki eŋe wain mi neke , bat midaine geke , eso ŋei eŋe kau paki rakoi , ‘ Eŋe asu qotkoineŋo kotino ket gemaike ! ’
40011019	Ŋei Wawainane Gipole sarike , eŋe ŋara neke so doku neke , so ŋei ŋerep keuo ewekine geke , eso ŋei eŋe kau paki rakoi , ‘ Kau ŋei iwa ! Eŋe mep qot so wain nene , takis mama so borikine mama natne eŋane kimaene mane ! ’ Na ramaile , ŋinane dereretŋine yemo wele midaine pamaike , ŋo Anutu wane dereretŋo yemo welekatne welerop okangi , kine sikanŋon okanmaike . ”
40011020	Mat natno Yesuŋo masi togogole loutne manerop maki , ŋei ŋerep eŋe kau paki wetene mainge more , sotene mi ŋadekkakoi , ea wane Yesuŋo girem don edange ,
40011021	“ Yai , Korazin welaine ! Ŋinano umat kakapa suaine baŋ wakonŋuniake . Yai , Betsaida welaine ! Ŋinano umat kakapa suaine yaleka baŋ wakon ŋuniake . Ŋinano masi togogole zok manerop makole , masi togogole eaŋo Tire So Sidon qelaŋ ŋei ŋerep eŋano mane mama ra , mokaka ŋei ŋerep yewa eŋe kau paki betŋo takot yale birau ketki , kaitko zepeŋo edomka qak naguwi paki , sotenane wet borik detpi paki , borikineene ŋadek kamami , ea wane kine yale qe wakonbirap !
40011022	Ea wane iwa yale desikei , kine ma wakon ma wakon kaiwe naso yewao , Anutuŋo Tire so Sidon qelaŋ ŋei ŋerep baŋ manerop seseoniake , paki eŋe wikile sisinimde desikei , ŋo ŋine yemo kakarauk suaine sikanŋuniake !
40011023	So Kaperneam welaine ŋine ! Ŋine ŋinŋineka qeliwo ma wa wetika weti bira nagukei me ? Yemo midakaka , na ramaile , ŋine baŋ qeu biraŋungi , qeika qei ŋei seu seune eŋane biraŋunbiso ra gerepko kesikei ! Ŋei mane eŋe Sodom matko ariki paki , noŋo masi togogole ŋinane keuo makole , yalewaka masi togoleŋo ŋei ŋerep qelaŋ eŋano maki , eŋe masi ea kau paki , borikine ŋadekau ra , mat ea mi suikki paki , naso iwao eŋe mere waki rap !
40011024	Ea wane iwa yale rawe desikei , kine ma wakon ma wakon kaiwe naso suaine yewao , Anutuŋo Sodom qelaŋ ŋei ŋerep manerop baŋ seseongi paki , wikile sisinimde ebongi desikei , ŋo ŋine yemo kakarauk suaine manerop sikanŋungi , wikile suaine baŋ desikei ! ”
40011025	Naso yewao Yesuŋo rake , “ Magak , qeli so kepe ea wane Waom ! Na bakomŋone kitomaile , onoka wane ge dereretenane detpi wawaine okanmaike , eŋe miti donŋone mi sikanone more , motone okanmaine , ŋo medep nigatne yale dereretenane detpi ketkele okanmaike , eŋe yemo ra wakone ebon okanmaine .
40011026	O Magak , iwa yemo geŋone simile so wet dereretŋonane wele yale mogatnom wakone pa ariakane , detnom mo menaŋge .
40011027	“ Maganeŋo yeye kine kine korop more ninwareke , ŋei maneŋo Gipolane wet dereretinane kine mi detmaike , eamo Magakŋoka weku detkamaike . So ŋei maneŋo Magak wane wet dereretinane kine mi detmaike , Gipoleŋoka weku detkamaike . So ŋei mane Gipoleŋo Magak wane kine rawakone olatki , ŋei ea eŋe maine desiake .
40011028	“ Ŋei ŋerep ŋine wikile dere umatŋine kakapa suaine teweke geu , umatne ŋidotki zonomŋine mida lelemaike , ea korop naŋano sariwareu , noŋo baŋ dan gunut so riwe morian ŋibon warekale , paki so ŋine wet pesek desikei .
40011029	Ŋine naŋane umat kabut ea mau paki , ŋinŋino birau ketkep , paki naŋane kinene detlukkei , onoka wane na asuneŋo wet pesesekatne so ketkele gemailane , ŋine baŋ oŋa oŋaŋinane metmet maratkau metki , menaŋkayake .
40011030	Na umat yewa kabut pa baŋ kutŋino more ŋibongale , eamo ewekine gemaine tewekene , so na umatpa kine kine ŋido tewekkei wane , na baŋ kutŋino motkale , yemo ewekine so ponoŋ kiridiŋ , ŋine maine baŋ tewek warekei . ”
40012001	Mi azonŋgi , Yesu eŋe wit eu keuoka kitare Qezarek Nasoo arike . Eŋine dokoine eŋe ŋaraenane seukkoi , pakiso eŋe kieke more wit woune ea peikeu paki , nekoi .
40012002	Parisi eŋe ea kau paki Yesu olale rakoi . “ Kanom , iwa yemo ŋenane ra rokop don ea qebarakeu paki , geŋane dokoŋone eŋe Qezarek Nasoo masi iwa okanmami ! ”
40012003	Rau Yesuŋo doneene turuŋine mainge iwa yale ra edange , “ Ŋine don iwa Dawitŋo mo sogino daleo okange , ea ŋine mi dapore det okanmami me ? Eŋe naso yewao eŋe eŋine so ŋeikoune eŋe ŋaraenane seukkoi , na yewa wane ramaile . Kine ea ŋine mi dere qelaŋanmami !
40012004	Eŋe Anutu wane urum kotino waki paki , eŋine so ŋeikoune eŋe Anutu wane biŋek bret motpi metke , ea yemo pris edoka weku yewa ŋine nekei wane raraine , ŋo eŋe siluŋ yaleka eŋe ra rokop don qebarakeu paki , bret ea nekoi .
40012005	Me ŋine Mose wane ra rokop don ea mi dapore det okanmami . Qezarek naso baŋem Pris eŋe urata wane Bakom Urum koto wa okanmami , eaŋo ra rokop don ea eŋe qebarak okanmami , yale okanmaike , ŋo eaŋo sot mi okanmaike me ?
40012006	So na iwa yale ŋidanbe detpi , yeye mane iwa eaŋo yemo kakapa suaine Bakom Urum wane wawaine , kine kine yewaŋo Bakom Urum yuankamaike .
40012007	Anutu wane papiaŋo iwa yale qe wakone ramaike , ‘ Na osomŋo soe soep mire ningeiwane , mi simile nanmaike , ŋo wet maepŋo ŋinane keu ŋino korop paki gekei , na ea wane simile nanmaike . ’ Ŋine welekatne iwa wane kine mane detlukeurap , yemo ŋine ŋei sotene midaine , eŋe don umat mane kuteno more mi edanbi rap ,
40012008	Onoka wane Ŋei Wawainane Gipole eŋe Qezarek Naso ea wane Waom so oŋo warekaki pamaike . ”
40012009	Yesu eŋe ea qelige more koso eaŋine ari Yuda eŋane mat maneo lewa lewaŋ urum maneo waketke .
40012010	Ŋei mane ea metke metine seu seune , so ŋei natne eŋe yewa weneŋ metkoi , eŋe Yesuŋo sot mane okangi kau paki dongo birakakei wane , eso eŋe ea wane Yesu qesonka more rakoi , “ Iwa ŋenane ra rokop don qebarake more , Qezarek Nasoo ŋei ma menaŋkakene me dale ? ”
40012011	Yesuŋo mainge qeson one rake , “ Ŋinano ŋine mane eŋe lama mane mageake , pakimo lama ea eŋe qezarek nasoo lom kiroine maneo kesiake , pakimo Qezarek Nasoo , daleo okangei ? Ŋine ea baŋ qesiŋka more ma birau sayake , me ka ŋadeka more qeliŋkau yeine okorayake ?
40012012	Ŋei mane eŋe lewine suaine so zok manerop wawaine okanmaike , so eŋe lama mane wane rokop yuanmaike ! Eso yalinane mo , ŋenze ra rokop donzeŋo yemo ŋei natne Qezarek Naso eao mapik ongenane maine detŋonmaike . ”
40012013	Yale raki paki ŋei olale rake , “ Meteŋone biranom . ” Rakiso eŋe metine birakiso menaŋkaki metine mane ea wane rokop okange .
40012014	Pakiso Parisi eŋe wie ari lewage , Yesu qeu seukeakane don aukoi .
40012015	Yesu eŋe don so ŋaba ŋaba kine kine ea Parisi edo eŋe okankaikei wane rakoi , ea detki pakiso , mat ea qelige arike , paki ŋei ŋerep loutneŋo ŋadino mogare arikoi , eŋe ŋei zomarop ea korop ebuki menaŋwarekoi .
40012016	Pakiso , eŋe ŋei ŋerep natne eŋine don kisiine ea mi edangei wane ra togoleone more rawetonge .
40012017	Masi tanik kine kine yale rawetongi paki okangi , Anutuŋo don mane propet Isaia iwa yale olatki qeke , ea wane wele wakonge ,
40012018	“ Iwa eŋe naŋane qelit ŋei , eŋe noŋo ma wakonkakole , na eŋane zok manerop simin nanmaike , na eŋane ra more wet maep okanŋungale , weku na eŋane simile nanmaike , na eŋane zok detpe menaŋmaike . Na baŋ Asune eŋane kutno mosikale , paki eŋe baŋ naŋane kine ma wakon ma wakon don koboboine ea ra qelaŋane more , kepe wane kutno ŋei ŋerep korop edaniake .
40012019	Ŋo eŋe baŋ kim sorin so busu me don suaine mi okaniake , me don ukatine mane suaine numa suaino mi raki ŋei ŋerep eŋe desikei .
40012020	Ŋei ŋerep eŋe gim mane togole mida , so kuŋ kuŋine me eŋe mo dumeniakane okanmaike yale , ŋo eŋe baŋ mi dumeniake . So lam mane lawe pilik oka okane yale , eŋe mi pilik lukeake , eŋe urataine koboboine ma met mage baŋ don urata koboboineŋo yuankayake .
40012021	So ŋei ŋerep magu mane qelaŋ mitiene midaine , yewa korop eŋe baŋ wetene so mali malipene eŋano mot warekei . ”
40012022	Naso yewao ŋei natne eŋe ŋei mane deine pilik pilikine don mi raraine , ea Yesu wano ma sarikoi , onoka wane eŋe asu qotkoineŋo kotino geke . Yesu eŋe ŋei yewa ma menaŋkake , eso ŋei yewa eŋe eweke more , don maine rake , so deine maine potke .
40012023	Ŋei ŋerep magu suaine okorakoi , eŋe koropŋo eŋe kau paki , welelepke more qeson nagu rakoi , “ Eŋe ea Dawit wane ŋaboine , Anutuŋo birakayakane rake , eŋe me ? ”
40012024	Parisi eŋe don ea detpi paki mainge rakoi , “ Eŋe asu qotkoine esopongi saketmami , yemo onoka wane Belzebul asu qotkoinane lewetŋo zonom mangimo , eŋe asu qotkoine yewa esopongi saketmami . ”
40012025	Rau , Yesu eŋe wetenane kine detki paki edane rake , “ Ŋine iwa detpi , gavaman kepe mane eao ŋei eŋe edomka mapoke magu etke okane more , kawali yakuwi rap , baŋ kepe yewa naso kiroine mi okaniake , siukki rap . So mat mane me ŋei magu mane eŋe oŋomka mapoke magu etke okane , kawali yaku aito okanbi rap , baŋ poripke warekei , paki mat yewa eŋe siukkeu rap .
40012026	Eso yalinane magu maneŋo daleo kimaine Satan magu mane esopkayakeo , mi kopkemaike , eŋe yale okaniakeo , yemo urataine maine mi pa wayake , eamo eŋe yeine suikeake !
40012027	Ŋine ramami , yale na asu qotkoine esop onikalane Belzebulŋo zonom ningi , na asu qotkoine ea esoponmaile , ea maine welekatneo , yemo na qeson ŋunmaile , ŋo ŋinŋine dokoŋine ea eŋe yemo maŋo zonom ebongimo , eŋe asu qotkoine yewa esoponbi qelige saket arimami ? Ŋinŋine dokoŋine ea edo kine ŋine ma wakonmami , yemo ŋine don ŋine yewo koboine mida so ŋine sot korop okanmami !
40012028	Belzebulŋo mi qesiŋnange , midakaka , iwa yemo Anutu wane Asu , oŋo zonom ningimo , na asu qotkoine esoponbe saket arimami , eaŋo kine ma wakonmaike , yemo Anutu wane qeli gege togon wane nasoine ŋinano mo sari saket wareke .
40012029	“ Ŋei maneŋo ŋei togogole mane wane mat koto kito barake waket more , aboŋ kine kineine maine yaup mi ma ariake me ? Eŋe yale okaniakane ra , eŋe ŋei togogole ea mikepka ma wokomkaki paki , ŋado yemo maine matine ea kito barake , waket kine kineine ea mat koto pamaike , maine kobu mayake .
40012030	“ Ŋei mane eŋe na kima mi okannaniake , eŋe na ŋabananiake . Ŋei mane eŋe na qesiŋ nane more lamakopne wekuoka ebu mi biraoniake , eŋe welekatne esopongi , yau yaup ari warekei .
40012031	Ea wane na ŋidanbe detpi , ŋei eŋe borikine kine kine natne makei , so don borikine natne rakei , ea wane turuŋene yemo Anutuŋo maine bira eboniake , ŋo ŋei mane eŋe Asu Koboboine eŋane ra more don borikine rayake , yemo sotinane turuŋine mane Anutuŋo maine mi biraka maniake .
40012032	Ŋei mane eŋe Ŋei Wawainane Gipole eŋane ra more don borikine rayake , yemo turuŋine Anutuŋo maine bira maniake , ŋo mane eŋe Asu Koboboine eŋane ra more dere worik okan kayake , eŋe turuŋine ea Anutuŋo mi biraka maniake , naso iwa gemaineo , me naso ŋado sariake , yewao mi bira maniake , midakaka .
40012033	“ Eki wele maine makenane dere , yemo eki maine ea mauluke magekene , ŋo ge eki zegulakine motmole ea magekeneo , yemo ge baŋ wele qotkoine qeki minakkene . Eki mane wane kine yemo wele qemaike , eao ka desikene .
40012034	Ŋine koma borikinane dokoine , ŋine borikine geu paki mo daleo don maine rakei ? Wetŋine borikineŋo watke pamaike , eaka aŋaŋo ra okanmaike .
40012035	Ŋei maine eŋe dereretine maine kotino pamaike , ea wane eŋe masi tanik maine okan okanmaike . Ŋei borikine mane eŋe dereret qotkoine loutne kotino pamaike , ea wane eŋe masi tanik qotkoine ma okanmaike .
40012036	“ Na iwa ŋidanbe , ma wakon ma wakon kaiwe naso , eao ŋei ŋerep korop eŋe don kine kine yau yaup raraine , korop ra gekoi , ea wane don urata makei .
40012037	Ŋinŋine donŋine eaŋoka baŋ kine ma wakoniake . Ma wakongi , sotŋine midaine okanikei , me ma wakongi sot korop okanikene . ”
40012038	Yale edangiso , ra rokop don wane kito ebo ebon natne , so Parisi natne eŋe Yesu olale rakoi , “ Kito ŋebo ŋebon , ŋene masi togogole mane manom kakenane ŋonmaike , ge manom kaŋem paki , ŋene raikene ge Anutu wane urata mamaine . ”
40012039	Rau , Yesuŋo edange , “ Ukude naso iwa wane ŋei ŋereune yemo borikine , so eŋe weteneŋo Anutu mi malip kamami , so Anutu midaine gemami ! Ŋine masi naso baŋem togogole mane mawe kakeiwane ra nan okanmami ? Midaka ! Masi togogole weku baŋ ŋibongale , yemo propet Yona wano masi togogole wakonge , ea wakongi kaikei .
40012040	Numa weku yewaka Yona eŋe kaiwe karewe so goiŋ karewe zawon suainane wouine koto wete metke , wane Ŋei Wawainane Gipole eŋe yaleka baŋ kaiwe karewe so goiŋ karewe kepe koto ket mesiake .
40012041	Kine ma wakon ma wakon kaiwe naso yewao Niniwe mat welaine ŋei ŋerep eŋe baŋ wie okorau paki , kineŋine tilekkei , onoka wane Anutuŋo Yona eŋano birakake , eŋe Yonaŋo miti edangi dere borikineene ea ŋadekka warekoi , na ŋidanbe , kine kine mane iwa , ea yemo Yona wane suaineine !
40012042	Kine ma wakon ma wakon kaiwe naso , eao yemo raiwoken ŋine qelaŋ ŋerep waomŋo wie okoraki paki , kineŋine tilekeake , onoka wane eŋe kepe keuo ŋine kitare lolike numa kiroroine ari mage , Solomon wane dereret koboboine ea detke , so wetine main gemaike , na welekatne ŋidanbe detpi , yewao kine kine mane iwa pamaike , ea yemo Solomon wane suaineine ! ”
40012043	Yesuŋo donkisi mane edane rake , “ Asu qotkoine eŋe ŋei mane wane kotino ŋine sakesiake , paki eŋe kepe wetataine yewao mat mane maratka ma metpe ra , zuage ariake . Ari mat mane mi marat kayake .
40012044	Paki eŋe oŋomka iwa yale rayake , ‘ Na baŋ koso zinge ari , matna qelige sarile , eao waketkale . ’ Eso eŋe koso zinge ari kaki matpa qamen , kotine sino kito mauluk mageumo , mayakatne payake .
40012045	Pakimo , eŋe saket ariki paki , asu qotkoine natne sewen , eŋine rokop mida , qotkokoine ebuki sarikei , eŋe sariu pakimo , mat yewa wane kotino waket gekei . Eso ŋei yewa eŋe alakan borikine geke , wane iwa yemo zok manerop boriluluke geake . Numa tanik iwamo ŋei ŋerep borikine ukude naso iwao gemami , ŋinano yale wakoniake . ”
40012046	Yesu eŋe ŋei ŋerep don yeka edane okoraki , nagaine so ŋolekoune lotkekoi , eŋe mat ŋadino qeinat okora Yesu don olatkei wane qesongoi .
40012047	Pakiso ŋei maneŋo olale rake , “ Detmaine , geŋane nagaŋone so ŋolekopŋone eŋe qeinat okoramami , so eŋe gerop don aukei wane simin onmaike . ”
40012048	Rakiso , Yesuŋo mainge olatke , “ Maŋo naŋane nagane ? Deo edo naŋane ŋolekopne ? ”
40012049	Yale raki paki dokoine eŋano metine qesikane more rake , “ Onnom ! Iwa edo naŋane nagane so ŋolekopne okanmami !
40012050	Ŋei mane eŋe Magane qeliwo gemaike , eŋane simile mogare gema okanmaike , eŋe naŋane ŋonne , so naŋane kiarone , so naŋane nagane . ”
40013001	Kaiwe weku yewaoka Yesu eŋe mat qelige , so doku namuŋ wazaino arike , ea pese ket mere , so don kito edange .
40013002	Metki , ŋei ŋerep loutneŋo sari qeatka lolikkakoi , eŋe zok magu suaine , ea wane Yesu eŋe seki mane wane kotino ketki paki , ea wane kutno pese metke , ŋei ŋerep magu eŋe qalakko okorakoi .
40013003	Eŋe don naŋengo rokop motki paki , kine kine loutne yale kito edan maŋke , mane iwa yale edange , “ Ŋei mane geke , oŋo nene woune euo rasuyakane arike .
40013004	Eŋe woune mapororoke euo rasuke , woune natne numao ketke , pakiso naŋi edo sari neu midake .
40013005	Woune natne kepe tabilainerop eao ket kitoke , yewao kepe gukine etkemde pake , wane komine mo ikopka qeke , onoka wane kepe gukine qeirop mi pake , ea wane ,
40013006	kepe deine sake , naso yewao kaiweŋo sirike qeki , komine musele sake , ea kuku suluŋge , onoka wane ŋodineŋo kepe qeirop mi make , ea wane komine ea ikopka seukwarekoi .
40013007	Woune natne touk wakelerop ea wane koto ket kitoke , wane sua wieu toukŋo kitoki siukkoi .
40013008	Ŋo woune natneŋo yemo kepe gukinerop eao kitoke , wane sua wa more wele qekoi , setne natne eao woune 100 qekoi , setne natne eao woune 60 qekoi , so setne natne eao woune 30 qekoi . ”
40013009	Pakiso Yesuŋo iwa yale edange , “ Mane eŋe ketneropŋo don iwa desiake , ŋine misuk ŋaŋaekei , don naŋengo yewa wetŋineŋo wetkekei ! ”
40013010	Dokoine eŋe Yesu wano sariu paki qesonka rakoi , “ Ge ŋedannom desikene . Ge onoka wane don naŋengoka ŋei ŋerep edan okanmaine ? Ea wane kine ra qelaŋan ŋonikene . ”
40013011	Yesuŋo mainge edane rake , “ Qeli gege togon kotino wake waket ea wane dereret sane , yemo ŋidoka detkei wane ŋibonge , ŋo ŋei natne iwa edo detkei wane yemo mi ra ebonge .
40013012	Ea wane natne eŋe dereret loutne magemamiwo , yemo koso manerop qewatpi ebongi , morian loutne baŋ ma wakonka ebongi ma gekei . Ŋo natne eŋe dereret loutne ea mi magemaimiwo , yemo dereret nigagatne magemaike , ea baŋ siluŋ dereret ea omakkaki , eŋe yaup geake .
40013013	Na don naŋengoka ra edanmaile , ea wane kine yemo iwa yale , eŋe deeneŋo kine kine kaikei , ŋo siluŋ mi kaulukmami , so eŋe keteneŋo don detkei , ŋo siluŋ kine mi detlukkei , ea wane ŋaŋaemami .
40013014	Eso ŋei ŋerep yale okanmami , eŋano propet Isaiaŋo don iwa yale rake , ea wane wele eŋe ukude wakonmaike , ‘ Ŋine baŋ ketŋo don naso baŋem detkei , ŋo kine yemo siluŋ mi wet detlukkei , Ŋine baŋ deŋo ka so ka okanikei , ŋo siluŋ kine kine mane mi kaulukkei .
40013015	Onoka wane ŋei ŋerep iwa eŋane dereretene mo siukke , so eŋe ketene mo qe wongekoi , so eŋe deene mo pilikke . Eŋe deeneŋo kine kine maine kaulukeu rap , eŋe keteneŋo kine kine wane kine maine detpi rap , eŋe wet derereteneŋo kine maine gege dere qelaŋanbi rap , yemo eŋe naŋano maine zingeu rap , Anutuŋo ramaike , pakimo na maine ma menaŋ onbe rap . ’
40013016	“ Ŋine yemo wet pese so bakom suaine desikei ! Ŋine deŋineŋo kine kine maine kamami , so ketŋineŋo don maine detmami , ea wane .
40013017	Na don iwa ŋidanbe detpi ! Propet loutne so Anutu wane ŋei ŋerep dereret korop magu loutneŋo sogino gekoi , ŋine yeye kine kine iwa kamami , ea zok kakei wane onge , ŋo siluŋ mi kakoi , so ŋine don kine kine iwa detmami , ea zok detkei wane onge , ŋo siluŋ mi detkoi . ”
40013018	Yesuŋo koso takotke more rake , “ Ketŋine motpi paki , nene woune rasu rasu wane don naŋengo rele , ea wane kine detpi .
40013019	Ŋei ŋerep qeli gege togon wane don dere more , kine mi detluk okanmami , eŋe yemo wit woune numao ket kitoke , yewa wane rokop . Miti don wele kotoene ket kitoki , Satanŋo sariki paki pukso , ariki eŋe yaup gemami .
40013020	Wit woune natne kepe wesi tabilainerop yewao ket kitoke , yemo ŋei ŋerep natne eŋe miti don simileka detpi paki , eaka ma nogankamami .
40013021	Ŋo siluŋ qei kotoeno ketluke more , ŋodine mi ma qotkemaike , eŋe nasomde bamgoka ma gemami , eso miti don wane ŋabaine sarimami , me don wele wane umat mane wakongi , yewao eŋe ikopka qeligeu siukmaike .
40013022	Woune natne touk wakelerop ea wane koto ket kitoke , yemo ŋei ŋerep natne eŋe miti don detmami , ŋo iwa kepeo gege ea wane dere mezet so wesi aboŋ suaine ma gege , ea wane simileŋo kitoki , miti don mo siuk waremaike , paki eŋano wele mi wakonmaike .
40013023	Eso woune natne kepe gukinerop ea kitoke , yemo ŋei ŋerep natne eŋe miti don ea detpi paki , kine weteeneŋo detlukmami , paki malipkau weleine maine wakonmaike , natne eŋe wele woune loutne 100 qemaike , natne wele 60 qemaike , so natne wele 30 qemaike . ”
40013024	Yesuŋo don mane naŋengo koso iwa yale edange , “ Qeli gege togon wane numa , yemo ŋei maneŋo wit woune maine euino rasuke , yale .
40013025	Rasukimo , goiŋ maneo ŋei ŋerep eŋe kulu pawarekoi , pakimo ŋei ŋaba maneŋo sariki paki , touk qotkoine ea wane woune wit koto rasuki paki arike .
40013026	Wit woune ea komine qe suaki paki , kieke wele mo qeakane okange , pakiso touk qotkoine mo eaka wiri wiekoi .
40013027	Pakimo ŋei yewa wane qelit medep eŋe kau paki , sari olale rakoi , ‘ Suaine , ŋene detmaine , ge wit woune maine euŋono rasukone , pakimo daleo wane tomok borikine yewa diao ŋine sari wakonmaike ? ’
40013028	Eu welaine eŋe mainge edane rake , ‘ Ea yemo ŋaba natne edo tanik iwa okanimi . ’ Eŋe qesonka rakoi , ‘ Ge detŋon so ŋedanom , ŋene ari touk qotkoine maine yewa lokake qakŋem ariake ? ’
40013029	Eŋe mainge edane rake , ‘ Mida , ŋine touk qotkoine ea lokakeu paki , wit natne weneŋ lokak ongei wane .
40013030	Qeligeu , wit so touk eŋe weneŋ orodoŋka sua ware menaŋgeik , paki na baŋ loka lokak ŋei ea edanikale , ŋine mikepka touk korop ea lokak wareu paki , gerepko peikeu ket ezoyakane , mulapŋo wokomon warekei , Pakiso ŋado wit peike more ŋara urumno magukkei . ’ ”
40013031	Yesu eŋe koso don mane naŋengo more , iwa yale edange , “ Qeli gege togon wane magu yemo mastet woune yale , ŋei maneŋo ma ari euino rasumaike .
40013032	Mastet ea wane woune yemo eki natne eŋane woune yale mida , eŋe nigagatnemde , ŋo siluŋ suamaike , eao yemo eki natne korop yuanonmaike . Eŋe sua eki kakapa okanmaike , eso naŋi eŋe sari matene qogine kutno ma okanmami . ”
40013033	Yesu eŋe koso don naŋengo mane iwa yale edange , “ Qeli gege togon wane donkisi dalino sua ariake , yemo yist yale . Ŋerep maneŋo yis ea maki paki , plaua kawet mane earop liwa geake , liwaŋ mage , plaua korop eŋe baŋ piwiwige wieake . ”
40013034	Yesu eŋe ŋei ŋerep magu don kine kine iwa korop edaniakane , yemo don naŋengoka more edanmageke , eŋe don naŋengo me rokop kito kito midaine didiwo mane mi rawakone edanmageke .
40013035	Eŋe yale okange , yemo propetŋo don mane iwa yale rake , ea wane wele wakoniakane yale okange , “ Na don edanikalane , yemo na baŋ don naŋengoka more edangale , na baŋ edanikale , yemo yeye kine kine mi dereretne kepe ea wakonge , eao ŋineka pa sari mage iwa pamaike , ea edangale . ”
40013036	Yesu eŋe ŋei ŋerep magu ea biraoneso , mat koto ari wake . Eŋine dokoine eŋe eŋano sariu paki olale rakoi , “ Toukpa euo wieke ea wane kine ŋedannom . ”
40013037	Yesuŋo mainge edane rake , “ Ŋeiwa waet maine euo rasuke , yemo Ŋei Wawainane Gipole ,
40013038	eu yemo kepe baŋem pamami , woune maine yemo miti dereret magu ŋei ŋerep qeli gege togon wane biŋek gemami , eŋe , ŋo touk qotkoine , yemo ŋei ŋerep qotkoine , eŋe Satan wane biŋek , eŋane qelit qe gemagekei .
40013039	Ŋo ŋei ŋabawa waet qotkoine euo rasuke , yemo Satan , borikine welaine . Ŋo menaŋmaike , yemo qeli kepe naso qoeake , ea , so menaŋgi ma urumgo mot mot urata ŋei , yemo aŋelo edo okanmami .
40013040	Touk qotkoine peikeu waki , gerepko pekekeu ezoyake , ea yemo baŋ naso qoeake , yewao yale wakon wareake .
