40025020	Urata ŋeiwa K5 , 000 make , eŋe koso K5 , 000 magu mane earop masariki paki more rake , ‘ Suaine , ge K5 , 000 ningone . Kanom ! Na koso urataine mawe K5 , 000 magu mane iwa wakonge . ’
40025021	Olatki , suaineineŋo rake , ‘ Ge urata mauluke makone , ge urata ŋei mayakakatne , so aŋa tewe tewek korop ! Ge kine kine nigatne ea wane urataine mayakakatne mauluke makone , eso ea wane noŋo baŋ kine kine suaine ea wane ware wareine biraganikale . Ge sari saketnom paki , narop wet pese detnom ! ’
40025022	“ Pakiso , urata ŋeiwa K2 , 000 mange oŋo sari saketki paki olale rake , ‘ Suaine , goŋo K2 , 000 ningone . Kanom ! Noŋo urataine mawe K2 , 000 magu mane koso iwa wakonge . ’
40025023	Raki ware wareineŋo olale rake , ‘ Ge urata mauluke makone , ge urata ŋei mayakakatne , so aŋa tewetewek korop ! Ge kine kine nigatne ea wane urataine mayakakatne mauluke makone , eso ea wane noŋo baŋ kine kine suaine , ea wane ware wareine biraganikale . Sari saketnom paki , narop wet pese detnom ! ’
40025024	“ Pakiso urata ŋeiwa K1 , 000 make , oŋo sari saketki paki olale rake , ‘ Suaine , na geŋane kine detmaile , ge ŋei togogole , ge goŋom ŋara metnom paki eaŋine mi lokak okanmaine , so goŋom wit woune yasonom paki , eaŋine mi ma sari maguk okanmaine .
40025025	Na kaetnange , eso ea wane na ariwe paki , geŋane wesi ea kepo dukewa pake . Kanom ! Geŋane wesiŋone mo iwa manom . ’
40025026	“ Yale olatki , suaineineŋo iwa yale olatke , ‘ Ge urata ŋei borikine so taboŋ gege ! Ge iwa yale detkone , na noŋom ŋara metpe paki , ea ŋine mi lokak okanmaile , me na noŋom wit woune yasowe paki , ea ŋine mi ma maguk okanmaile , yale me ?
40025027	Ea maine , ge naŋane yale detnom paki , naŋane wesi ea wesi urumgo motnom rap , pakimo edo mau sua leule okangi , na zinge sariwe paki , ea koropka sisine weneŋ mawe rap .
40025028	Wesi iwa omakkau paki , ŋeiwa ten tausen kina ( K10 , 000 ) magemaike , eŋe manbi .
40025029	Ŋei mane eŋe kine kine mangoi , ea mageki ma leule manbi , eŋe baŋ morian manerop wakonka mangi mageake , ŋo mane eŋe kine kine mangoi , ea mi ma leule more , siluŋ nigagatnmde mageake , ea baŋ omaka ariu , eŋe yaup geake .
40025030	Urata ŋei bau wawaine yaline yemo ma birakau , ŋadino panaman koto kesiake , yewao eŋe baŋ aroke more , ŋetneŋo warik warik ki geake . ’
40025031	“ Ŋei Wawainane Gipole , eŋe Ŋei Waom yale okane sariake , naso yewao , eŋe so aŋelo magukoune korop eŋerop weneŋ sarikei , paki eŋe baŋ Ŋei Waom met metine qeli ewe zonom gorop ea wane kutno pese mesiake .
40025032	Metkimo , kepe baŋem ŋei ŋerep korop eŋe baŋ eŋane kaitko sari lewaŋgei , paki mo eŋe baŋ mapokongi , magu etke okangei , lama ware wareŋo lama noniŋ eŋane koruo ŋine mapokonmaike , ea wane rokop mapokoniake ,
40025033	mapokone more , lama eŋine wonino biraoniake , ŋo noniŋ yemo kanaino biraoniake .
40025034	Pakimo ŋei waomŋo baŋ ŋei ŋereppa woninoken okorakei , ea iwa yale edaniake , ‘ Ŋine naŋane Maganeŋo mosop ŋunge , sariu paki , qeli gege togon welaine okanbi , eamo mokaka qeli so kepe ma wakon ore more , ŋinane biŋek mauluke motke .
40025035	Na ŋara wane seukewe , ŋine ŋara gume nangoi , doku wane qomne sererekki , ŋine doku ninbi nekole , na ŋei kuneŋine yale sariwe , ŋine neu matŋine kotino biranangoi .
40025036	Na lawam gewe , ŋine takot laplap ramunangoi , na zoma nangi , ŋine warenangoi , na mulap urumgo metpe , ŋine qelipkenan okangoi . ’
40025037	“ Ŋei koboboine eŋe baŋ iwa yale mainge rakei ‘ Waom , ŋene dango ganŋem , ge ŋara wane seukenom , ŋene ŋara gumegangone , me doku wane qomŋone sererekki , doku ginŋem nekone !
40025038	Naso dango ŋene ganŋem , ge ŋei kuneŋine yale sarinom , geu matze kotino biragangone , me lawam sarinom , takot laplap ramu gangone !
40025039	Naso dango ŋene gaŋem , ge zomagangi ware gangone , me mulap urumgo metnom , ŋene qelipke gan okangone ! ’
40025040	Ŋei waomŋo baŋ mainge edane rayake , ‘ Na welekatne ŋidanbe , kimakopne ketkele eŋane keuoŋine , ŋei wekumane kima mauluk okankakoiwo , yemo ŋine na okannangoi yale okanmaike ! ’
40025041	“ Pakimo , eŋe baŋ ŋei ŋereppa kanaino okorakei , eŋe iwa yale edaniake , ‘ Anutuŋo soakŋunge , ŋine naŋane kaitko ŋine ariwareu ! Ari more , Magakŋo Satan so aŋelokoune eŋane gerep togogole dubukki zeki mauluke biraonge , yewao ket more gekei !
40025042	Na ŋara wane seukkole , ŋo ŋine siluŋ ŋara mane mi ningoi , doku wane qomne sererekki , ŋine doku mi ningoi ,
40025043	Na ŋei kuneŋine yale sariwe , ŋine neu more mat ŋine kotino mi biranangoi , lawam gewe , ŋine takot laplap mane mi ramu nangoi , na zoma nange so mulap urumgo metpe , ŋine warenane more qelipke nan mi okangoi . ’
40025044	“ Yale raki , eŋe baŋ iwa yale olasikei , ‘ Waom , ŋene naso dango ganŋem ŋara wane seukkone , me doku wane qomŋone sererekke , me ŋei kuneŋine yale sarikone , me lawam gekone , me zoma gange , me mulap urumgo metnom , gane qewoloŋ okan gane more mi qesiŋgangone ! ’
40025045	Rau , ŋei waomŋo baŋ iwa yale mainge edaniake , ‘ Na welekatne ŋidanbe , kimakopne ketkele gemami , eŋane keuo ŋine ŋeimde wekumane kima mauluk okankakei wane bauŋine waki walukkakoi , yemo naŋane bauŋine waki , na waluk nangoi okanmaike . ’
40025046	Pakimo ŋei iwa yaline , eŋe ea wane turuŋine baŋ wikile papa togon ea marat kaikei , ŋo ŋei koboboine eŋe baŋ qeli gege togon matko arikei . ”
40026001	Yesu eŋe don iwa korop rawareki qoeki , dokoine edan rake ,
40026002	“ Kaiwe etke , ea ŋine mo detmami , yewa qoekimo Aŋeloŋo Loloŋongi ŋara soep nemaŋkoi , ea wane taboŋ met met naso baŋ bomileake , paki naso yewao Ŋei Wawainane Gipole eŋe baŋ ŋei eŋane meteeno birakau , kibeŋ qabego biriŋŋo rasukaikei . ”
40026003	Pakiso naso yewao , pris ŋetne so Yuda ŋei sele eŋe sari qeturage , Kaiapas pris suainane urumgo lewaŋgoi .
40026004	Pakimo don pise more Yesu sanka ma lukkau paki , qeu seukeakane don aukoi .
40026005	Pakiso rakoi , “ Ŋene Loloŋon Loloŋon peada naso iwao misuk okanikene , me ŋene okanŋem , ŋei ŋerep eŋe kawali yau yaup baŋ qekei . ”
40026006	Yesu eŋe , Saimon kuku sele ŋei sogine mo menaŋge , eŋane matko Betani yewao wa metke .
40026007	Metkimo , ŋerep mane eŋe beloŋ mane kelok qoune simileteine , lewine suaine eaŋo qewat qewale , ea ma more Yesu wano sarike . Yesu eŋe ŋara ne metki , eaka kelok ea qakki , lewino ket taukake .
40026008	Dokoine eŋe ea kau paki , sotene osike qesone rakoi , “ Onoka wane eŋe kelok iwa korop matali maike ?
40026009	Kelok iwa yemo motŋem ari , wesi suaine kiatki sariki mo , ma more ŋei aboŋene midaine maine ebonŋem rap ! ”
40026010	Yesu eŋe don rakoi , ea wane kine mo detke paki edane rake , “ Ŋine ŋerep iwa onoka wane ra kitat okan kamami ? Iwamo maine so kine kine weku mane , ŋerep eŋe na okannanmaike .
40026011	Ŋei aboŋene midaine , eŋe yemo baŋ naso baŋem ŋinerop ge arikei , ŋo na yemo naso baŋem ŋinerop mi gekale .
40026012	Ŋerep eŋe yale okane more , kelok qoune simileteine yewa solane qakike , yemo seukewe duknangei wane , ma eweknanike .
40026013	Na welekatne iwa rawe detpi ! Kepe baŋem don kisi iwa ra qelaŋane arikei rokop , ŋerep iwa okan nanmaike , eŋane weneŋ detsoroke more , don kisiine baŋ rau sua ariake . ”
40026014	Naso yewao dokoine 12 enŋenane keueno ŋine mane eŋetine Yudas Iskariot , oŋo pris ŋetne eŋano arike .
40026015	Paki edane rake , “ Na Yesu ŋinane meto birakawe , ŋine lewine onokaka ninikei ? ” Eŋe wesi setne , silwa 30 , yale dapore mangoi .
40026016	Naso yewaoka Yudasŋo kieke Yesu ma wakon kayakane numaine dere mauluk okange .
40026017	Bret sap saune ea wane soda weku kaiwe mane yewao dokoine eŋe Yesu wano sari qesonka rakoi , “ Ŋene detmaine , ŋo diawao ari mere , Aŋeloŋo Loloŋonge ea wane Nasoo ŋara mauluke gingene ? ”
40026018	Rau eŋe edane rake , “ Ŋine mat suaino ariu paki , ŋei mane maratkakei , paki iwa yale olasikei , ‘ Kito ŋebo ŋebonŋo ramaike , naŋane nasone mo bomilemaike , wane naŋane dokoine so na ŋene baŋ Aŋeloŋo Loloŋonge Naso eao geŋane matko mere ŋara nekene . ’ ”
40026019	Dokoine eŋe Yesuŋo don edange , ea wane rokop okane more , Aŋeloŋo Loloŋonge Naso ea wane ŋara maulukkoi .
40026020	Kepe rarap okangi Yesu eŋine so dokoine 12 , eŋe zakeo ŋara nekeiwane pese metkoi .
40026021	Ŋara ne mere , eaka Yesuŋo rake , “ Na welekatne ŋidanbe , ŋinane keuŋino ŋine ŋei maneŋo na baŋ ma wakon naniake . ”
40026022	Dokoine eŋe wetene boriki , kieke weku weku qesonka rakoi , “ Welekatne , Waom , ge naŋane ramainane ? ”
40026023	Rau Yesuŋo mainge edange , “ Ŋeiwa metine biraki narop lase wekuo ketki bretine ma neake , oŋo na baŋ ma wakon naniake .
40026024	Ŋei Wawainane Gipole eŋe yemo Anutu wane papaiaŋo ramaike , yale baŋ seukeake , ŋo Ŋei Wawainane Gipole ma wakonka yake , ŋei yewa eŋe yemo turuŋine , yai , zok manerop zinge maniake ! Ŋei yewa eŋe nabok kotino ŋine mi wakongirap , yemo mayakatne okangirap ! ”
40026025	Raki ma wakon kayake ŋei , Yudas , oŋo qesone rake , “ Kito ŋebo ŋebon , ge naŋane ramainane ? ” Yesuŋo mainge olale rake , “ Mo ea , goŋom ramaile . ”
40026026	Eŋe ŋara ne metpi , eaka Yesu eŋe bret ma more bakom kitoki paki , dokoine ebone rake , “ Mau paki neu , iwa nae bikumne . ”
40026027	Pakiso , eŋe wain lase ma more , Anutu bakomine kitoki paki , dokoine ebone rake , “ Ŋine korop iwa neu ,
40026028	iwamo nae weŋemne , ea wane ra more , Anutuŋo ŋinerop tako rakot geake . Naŋane weŋemne yemo , ŋei ŋerep korop ŋinane borikineŋine saukeakane qake kesiake .
40026029	Na ŋidanbe detpi , na baŋ koso ŋinerop wain iwa manerop mi nene , yaupka ge arimage , kaiwe naso yewao na wain musele , ea ŋinerop weneŋ Maganane gege togon kotino nekene . ”
40026030	Yale rakiso eŋe aŋelo loloŋon loloŋon wane eŋet so miti okanbi paki , matko ŋine ket more , Oliwa Bonagao arikoi .
40026031	Pakiso , Yesu eŋe dokoine edane rake , “ Ruomde iwao , mali malip ŋine korop baŋ pelekki , na qeliŋnane kaet ari warekei , onoka wane Anutu wane papiao iwa yale ramaike , ‘ Anutu eŋe baŋ lama ware ware qeki paki , qe kuruŋonbe , lama magu koropŋo baŋ kakak nagu ket yeo yeo qiŋ qiririŋ ari warekei . ’
40026032	Ŋo na seu seuo ŋine wisikae wiewe paki , na baŋ Galili kepeo alakane ŋibonikale . ”
40026033	Petoroŋo aŋage olale rake , “ Natne eŋe korop geŋane detpi boriki biragane ari warekei , ŋo na yemo baŋ mi biragane arikale ! ”
40026034	Raki , Yesuŋo Petoro girem don olale rake , “ Na welekatne iwa golatpe detnom ! Tiakŋo mi bokaki , ge ruo yewao atak karewe bisopnane more raikene , ‘ Na eŋe mi detkamaile ’ ”
40026035	Petoroŋo togole mainge rake , “ Na gerop weneŋ seukkaleo , na siluŋ geŋane bisopke mi raikale , na eŋe mi detkamaile ! ” Pakiso dokoine korop eŋe qesiŋka don don weku eaka rawarekoi
40026036	Pakiso , Yesu eŋe dokoine eŋerop rome saromat mane , eŋetine Getsemane , yewa ari more edane rake , “ Ŋine iwa metpi , na eriwa ari meŋenkawe . ”
40026037	Eŋe Petoro , so Zebedi wane gipoletkine etke weneŋ ebuki arikoi . Ariu paki qomine umareki wikile suaine detke .
40026038	Paki edane rake , “ Kotono umat zok kakapa suaine , eaŋo ki pelek naniakane okanmaike , ea wane ŋine iwa narop weneŋ wet wisika mere , diam maikei . ”
40026039	Yale edane more , eŋe eri ekeket biraone ariki paki , eŋe eŋineka meine ket kepo kito more iwa yale ra meŋenkake , “ Magane , ge detnom iwa maine okanmaikeo , yemo wikilane lase iwa oma nannom ! Ŋo siluŋ naŋane don mida , geŋane don togoleake . ”
40026040	Yale ra meŋenkaki paki , zinge ari dokoine karewe metkoi , eŋe ongi kuluka pakoi , pakimo eŋe Petoro olale rake , “ Ŋine ŋei karewe iwa daleo wane mi ewekeu paki , narop wan aua diam wet wisika mi gemami !
40026041	Diam tako rakot mau paki meŋenkau , ŋine yale okan mage , baŋ peleke more , liwe liwek borikino ket qekei . Asuŋineŋo yemo eweke more kine kine okaniakane okanmaike , ŋo solaŋineŋo yemo umareki paki , zonomine midaine okanmaike . ”
40026042	Atak etke eŋe koso manerop zinge ari meŋenka rake , “ Magane , wikilane lase iwa mi oma nanikeneo , yemo na maine newe mo , geŋane don ea togoleake . ”
40026043	Eŋe koso manerop zinge ari dokoine ongi kuluka pakoi , eŋe deene wareka wet wisika mi metkoi .
40026044	Yesu eŋe koso manerop qeliŋone ariki paki meŋenkaki atak karewe okange , don wekuka ra meŋenkake .
40026045	Pakiso , koso dokoine eŋano zinge ariki paki rake , “ Ŋine yeka kulu pau paki , zonom mamami me ? Kau ! Naso mo bomilemaike , wane Ŋei Wawainane Gipole mo ma more , ŋei borikine mama eŋane meteeno bira kakei .
40026046	Wieu , ŋene ariŋem , kau , ŋeiwa ma wakon naniake , mo iwa sarimaike ! ”
40026047	Yesu eŋe don yale edane okoraki , dokoine 12 eŋane keuo ŋine mane Yudas , eaka lotkeke . Eŋerop weneŋ sarikoi , yemo ŋei magu suaine , Pris ŋetne so Yuda ŋei sele edo taleonbi , kawali wane pilaŋ so soba weneŋ peike sarikoi .
40026048	Isi bela ŋei , ea eŋe ŋei magu yewa kait masi iwa yale maki kau paki , Yesu makei wane edange , “ Na ari ŋei yewa ka more , lulu zam zam maweso , ŋine kau paki , Yesu iwa raso malipka lukka arikei ! ”
40026049	Yudas eŋe eaka lotke more , Yesu wano koboine ari rake , “ Peamŋo gerop payake , kito ŋebo ŋebonze . ” Yale raso , lulu zam zam make .
40026050	Yesuŋo olale rake , “ Kima , urata makenane wetke sarine , ea ikop manom ! ” Rakiso , eŋe osino sari more malipkau paki , metine wokom gekoi .
40026051	Yesurop gekoi , eŋano ŋine maneŋo pilaŋ warage more , Pris Suainane qelit medep qeki paki , ketne nat kito qotki ketke .
40026052	Yale okange Yesuŋo olatke , “ Ge pilaŋŋone koso biranom , matno ketkep , onoka wane ŋei korop pilaŋ ma okanmami , eŋe pilaŋ yewaŋo enguki seuk okanmami .
40026053	Ge mi detmaine , na Magane maine qesiŋ naniakane olatpe eŋe kawali ŋei aŋelo magu suaine 12 ea yuanmaike , eŋe esatka taleongi sari qesiŋ nanbirap ?
40026054	Ŋo eŋe yale okanbimo , Anutu wane papiao numa yalewa oken wakoniakane raraine , ea wane wele eamo daleo wakongirap ? ”
40026055	Naso yewaoka Yesu eŋe ŋei magu yewa edane rake , “ Na kawali ŋei ea wane ŋine kawali wane buza so soba weneŋ mau paki , neukei wane sarimi me ? Na kaiwe baŋem Bakom Urum koto pese mere , miti don kito ŋidan okane gekole , pakimo , ŋine yewao mi neu luknangoi .
40026056	Ŋo siluŋ masi iwa korop wakonmaike , yemo propet edo Anutu wane papiao don qekoi , ea wane wele wakoniakane masi iwa wakonmaike . ” Yale ra edangiso , dokoine korop eŋe qeliŋkau paki , biraka ariwarekoi .
40026057	Ŋeiwa Yesu ma lukkakoi , eŋe mau paki , Pris Suaine Kaiapas wane matko iwenka arikoi , yewao ra rokop don kito ebo ebon ŋei , so ŋei sele eŋe sari lewage metkoi .
40026058	Petoro eŋe Yesu ŋadino mogare eri amaŋ Pris Suainane mat wane sen ŋadino arike . Eŋe ari sen koto waket more , tebe ŋei diam gege eŋerop pese ket mere , tanik daleo okankaikei , ea wane one modatke .
40026059	Pris Suaine eŋe so ŋei wawaine korop , eŋe Yesu wane isi don maratkau paki , gube qesat don solaino kito more , qeu seukeakane don aukoi .
40026060	Ŋei loutneŋo sariu paki , isi don zok loutne solaine qe rawarekoi , ŋo siluŋ donene eaŋo wele mi okange . Pakiso ŋei etke ere wakone saketkoik .
40026061	Paki rakoi , “ Ŋei iwaŋo iwa yale rake , ‘ Na Anutu wane Bakom Urum iwa kito ra barakewe , ariki kaiwe karewe yewaka koso maulukkale . ’ ”
40026062	Pris Suaine eŋe wie okoraki paki , Yesu olale rake , “ Eŋe geŋane don ramami , ea wane turuŋine edanikenane mane ma okoramaine , me mida ? ”
40026063	Yesu eŋe siluŋ meune qoeki okorake . Pris Suaine eŋe koso manerop olale rake . “ Anutu gege togon welaine , eŋane kaitko qesonganbe , ge welekatne Mesia , Anutu wane gipole gemaineo , yemo ŋedannom . ”
40026064	Yesuŋo mainge rake , “ Ge mo ea ramaine , ŋo na korop ŋidanbe detpi , naso iwao ŋine ge ari more , ŋine korop baŋ kau , Ŋei Wawainane Gipole , Anutu zomine kakapa suainane metine wonino metki paki , qeliwo kezoŋ kutno sariake ! ”
40026065	Yale raki , Pris Suaine eŋe takotine ma barake more rake , “ Eŋe Anutu mabaik kamaike ! Ŋene koso raŋem qesat ŋei eŋe sari , eŋane don mi rakei , yeine ! Ŋine eŋane don qotkoine mo iwa raki detkamami !
40026066	Ŋine daleo detmami ? ” Eŋe mainge rakoi , “ Eŋe sot korop , ea wane eŋe maine seukeake . ”
40026067	Yale rau paki , kaitine sopotka more qekoi , paki ŋei natne qekoi , edo rakoi ,
40026068	“ Mesia ŋenane don saeŋine ranom ! Detnom , maŋo gekumaike ! ”
40026069	Petoro eŋe qeinat mat wane sen kotino metki , Pris Suainane qelit ŋerep maneŋo eŋano sari more rake , “ Ge yaleka Yesu Galili kepeo ŋine , eŋerop weneŋ gekone . ”
40026070	Ŋo eŋe korop eŋane kaiteno bisopke more rake , “ Ge don ramaine , na ea mi detmaile . ”
40026071	Yale raki paki , eŋe mat wane sen ea wane madetko ari wakesiakane okange , paki qelit ŋerep maneŋo kaki paki , ŋei yewa metkoi eŋe edane rake , “ Ŋei iwa eŋe Yesu Nazaret matko ŋine , eŋerop geke . ”
40026072	Petoro eŋe koso ea bisopke more rake , “ Welekatne ramaile , na ŋei yewa mi detkamaile ! ”
40026073	Naso nigatne azoŋgi , ea wane ŋadino ŋei yewa okorakoi , eŋe Petoro wano sariu paki rakoi , “ O welekatne , ge eŋane tegoo ŋine mane iwa . Ge don tanik ŋone ramaine , eaŋo kine qe wakongi detmaine ! ”
40026074	Rauso , Petoroŋo don togoleka bisopke more rake , “ Welekatne , Anutu wane kaitko ramaile , na don welekatne mi ŋidanmaileo , yemo Anutuŋo wikile niniake , na ŋei yewa mi detkamaile ! ” Rakiso , eaka tiak bokake .
40026075	Pakiso Petoro eŋe Yesuŋo don iwa yale olatke , “ Ge atak karewe , mi det kamaile , ra bisop nannom , tiakŋo atak karewe bokayake . ” Ea detsoroke more , saket ariki paki , wetine tabaeki zok arokke .
40027001	Kepe qaeki ruoropka , pris ŋetne korop so Yuda ŋei suaine , eŋe Yesu qeu seukeakane don aukoi .
40027002	Eŋe mulap togoleŋo Yesu metine wokomge more mau paki , Roma ware ware suaine Pilat wano ma ari birakakoi .
40027003	Yudas , siron qeqe ŋei , eŋe ongi Yesu mo seukeakane ra togolekoi , yale kaki paki , wetne mainge more , wesi silwa 30 ea koso mazinge ari Pris ŋetne so Yuda ŋei suaine ebonge .
40027004	Paki rake , “ Na sotkorop okanbe paki , ŋei sotine midaine iwa ma wakonka seuseuo birakamaile ! ” Eŋe mainge rakoi , “ Ea ŋenano onoka wane sari ramaine ? Eamo geŋone aboŋ ! ”
40027005	Yudas eŋe wesi yewa biraki , Bakom Urumgo wakiso biraone ketke . Ket ari moreso , oŋomka ebine rapokke .
40027006	Pris ŋetne eŋe wesi yewa mau paki rakoi , “ Wesi iwa yemo weŋem kiti kitine , ea wane ŋene ŋenze ra rokop donze yewa qe barake more , Bakom Urum wane wesi kiteo mi biraŋem kesiake . ”
40027007	Eŋe don auye , dereret okan naguwi paki , ea wane ŋadino wesi yewa mau paki , kap gola mama wane kepe mane ea qolekoi , eamo lobo ŋei abaran ŋine sari sarine , eŋane deŋesere mane okaniakane .
40027008	Ea wane eŋe kepe yewa eŋetne “ Weŋem wane kepe ” orakoi , wane naso iwao pamaike .
40027009	Yale okanbi , propet Yeremaiaŋo don mane iwa yale rake , ea wane wele wakonge , “ Eŋe wesi silwa 30 ea makoi , Israel ŋei eŋe dereret okannagu more , wesi yewa ŋei ea qolekakei wane biŋek qekoi .
40027010	Paki wesi yewaŋo ma more , kap mama wane kepe mane qolekoi , eamo Waomŋo nolatke , ea wane rokopko . ”
40027011	Yesu eŋe Pilat wane kaitko okoraki , oŋo qesonka rake , “ Ge Yuda ŋei eŋane ŋei waom me ? ” Yesuŋo mainge rake , “ Goŋom mo ea ramaine . ”
40027012	Eŋe pris ŋetne so ŋei suaine edo gube qesat don solaine more rakoi , ea wane turuŋine mane mi mainge edange .
40027013	Eso ea wane Pilatŋo olale rake , “ Ge don iwa korop solaŋone qeu paki ramami , ea mi detmaine me ? ”
40027014	Ŋo Yesuŋo don mide mane nigatne mi mainge olatke , eso ea wane Pilat eŋe zok manerop oŋaine qaeke .
40027015	Aŋeloŋo Loloŋonge Naso , yewao Pilat eŋe ŋei ŋerep magu edo rauso , mulap ŋei mane siwotkaki , mulap urumgo ŋine saket okanmaŋke .
40027016	Wane , naso yewao ŋei mane eŋetine Yesu Barabas , eŋe mulap urumgo metke .
40027017	Eso ea wane ŋei ŋerep magu eŋe sari lewageu , Pilatŋo qeson one rake , “ Ŋine ma ŋei siwotka ŋibonikalane wetkemami ? Yesu Barabas me Yesu , Mesia oramami ? ”
40027018	Pilat eŋe kine mo detlukke , onoka wane eŋe Yesu wane det worik okanbi paki , ma ari eŋane meto birakakoi .
40027019	Pilat eŋe wano wanok urumgoka metki , eŋine ŋanomineŋo don mane iwa yale motki arike , “ Ge ŋei sotine midaine , ea kine kine mane misuk okankaikene , onoka wane na yatne ruoo kulu kulu kawe paki , eŋane ra more wikile zok suaine maratkele . ”
40027020	Pris ŋetne so ŋei suaine eŋe ŋei ŋerep magu taleongoi , eŋe Pilat olatpi Barabas siwotka ebongi paki , Yesu birakaki qeu seukeakane .
40027021	Ŋo Pilatŋo yemo qeson one rake , “ Ŋei etke iwa erano ŋine ŋei diawa siwotka ŋibonikalane wetkemami ? ” Eŋe rakoi , “ Barabas ! ”
40027022	Rau Pilatŋo qesonone rake , “ Pakimo na Yesu , Mesia oramami , eŋe daleo okankaikale ! ” Eŋe rakoi , “ Eŋe kibego rasu kanom ! ”
40027023	Pilatŋo yemo qesonone rake , “ Onoka sot okangane ? ” Pakiso eŋe togoleka boka rakoi , “ Eŋe kibego rasu kanom ! ”
40027024	Pilat eŋe mo kake , eŋane don eaŋo mi rokoponge , kawali suaineka wakoniakane okange , ea wane eŋe doku natne ma more , ŋei ŋerep magu eŋane kaiteno metine saukki paki rake , “ Ŋei iwa seukeake , yemo noŋo rawe mi seukeake ! Iwa yemo ŋinane aboŋ ! ”
40027025	Ŋei ŋerep magu eŋe mainge rakoi , “ Eŋane seuseuinane turuŋ yemo qeligenom , ŋene so doko ŋosakopze ŋenane kutzo pa wayake ! ”
40027026	Pakiso , Pilat eŋe Barabas siwotka ebonge , ŋo Yesu yemo kumunamŋo qeki paki , kawali ŋei eŋane meteeno birakake , kibego rasukaikei wane .
40027027	Pilat wane kawali ŋei eŋe Yesu mau paki , ware ware wane urum koto ma waketkoi , pakiso kawali ŋei korop eŋe sari qeatkakoi .
40027028	Paki , eŋe eŋine takotine ea kito qoke more , takot weŋemka kiroine ea birakakoi .
40027029	Pakiso , eŋe sitman wakelerop , eaŋo ŋei waom marok mane mau paki , lewino birau ketkiso , kumunam mane metine wonino motkoi . Paki eŋe eŋane osino wawetene geu paki , isi bela qebela okankau paki rakoi . “ Yuda ŋei eŋane Ŋei Waom , naso kiroroine ge ari arikene ! ”
40027030	Eŋe sopotkau paki , kumunam oma ka more , lewino rasipokkoi .
40027031	So eŋe isi bela qebela okankawareu qoeki , takot weŋemka kiroine ea kito qokkau paki , eŋine takotine ea koso mainge birakakoi . Pakiso eŋe kiruŋaŋo kibego rasu kakeiwane iwenka saket arikoi .
40027032	Eŋe numao ariu paki , ŋei mane Sairini matko ŋine , eŋetine Saimon maratkau paki , qebin kau Yesu wane kibeŋ qabeŋ tewetki arikoi .
40027033	Eŋe ari mage , kepe mane eŋetine Golgota , ea lotkekoi . Kepe eŋetine ea wane kine iwa yale , “ Lewe Setne Kepe . ”
40027034	Yewa rau pakiso , eŋe wain wisi tabaine teine earop mauluk maulukine ea manbi , ne detki paki , waulukke .
40027035	Pakiso , eŋe kiruŋaŋo kibeŋ qabego rasu kau paki , takot kine kineine ea wezu qe yuanbi paki , mapoke amanagukoi .
40027036	Ea wane ŋadino eŋe yewa eŋane diam metkoi .
40027037	Lewine kutno dere worik donene dapore det okanikeiwane , don iwa yale qekoi , “ Iwa Yesu , Yuda ŋei eŋane Ŋei Waom . ”
40027038	Pakiso eŋe borikine mama etke Yesurop weneŋ kibeŋ qabego kiruŋaŋo rasuotkoi , mane wonino , ŋo mane kanaino .
40027039	Ŋei ŋerep osino kere pore okan lewetene kaliŋ kito ruzake , Yesu mawa maket kitou paki rakoi ,
40027040	“ Ge Bakom Urum ra barakenom ketki , kaiwe karewe yewaoka koso maulukkenane rakone ! Ge weleka Anutu Gipole gemaineo , yemo ge goŋomka qesiŋ nagunom ! Kibeŋ qabego ŋine qoe ketnom ! ”
40027041	Numa weku yewaka pris ŋetne so ra rokop don kito ebo ebon so Yuda ŋei suaine , eŋe isibela qebela okanka rakoi ,
40027042	“ Eŋe ŋei ŋerep natne qesiŋonge , ŋo eŋine yemo mi qesiŋ nagumaike ! Eŋe Israel eŋane Ŋei Waom me ? Ea wane eŋe kibeŋ qabego ŋine baŋ qoe iwa kesiakeo , yemo ŋene baŋ eŋe detlukka malip kaikene !
40027043	Eŋe Anutu detlukka malipkaki paki , na Anutu wane Gipole ra okanmaike , ea yemo maine , ŋo Anutuŋo wetne eŋane pamaikeo , yemo ukude eŋe qesiŋkaki , ŋene kaŋem ! ”
40027044	Borikine mama Yesurop weneŋ kibeŋ qabego etkukoi , ere yalewaka mabaik qebaik okankakoi .
40027045	Kepe oŋa bango 12 kilok , yewao kepe yewa korop goiŋ suaine kere panaman kito paki , sa 3 aua okange .
40027046	Naso 3 kilok okangi , Yesuŋo togoleka boka more rake , “ Eli Eli lema sabaktani ? ” Don ea wane kine iwa yale , “ Anutune , Anutune , ge onoka wane qeliŋ nanmaine ? ”
40027047	Ŋei natne yewa okorakoi , eŋe dere more , iwa yale rakoi , “ Eŋe Elaiya wane bokamaike ! ”
40027048	Eŋano ŋine ŋei mane eŋe ikopka biririke ari more , wain dokune tabainerop eao lap lapŋo qe muruge more , kudupko piseki paki , Yesuŋo neakane mange .
40027049	Ŋo ŋei natne eŋe rakoi , “ Ŋene tomaka more Elaiya eŋe qesiŋ kayakane sarimakeo , yemo kaŋem ! ”
40027050	Yesu eŋe koso manerop togogoleka bokakiso , yewaka asuine saket arike .
40027051	Pakiso , laplap suaine Bakom Urum koto mode ket okorake , ea keuoka puntuk wiri , weti kutno ŋine sariki , qela kino qoe , etke leleke . Kepe qiseki wesi suaine korop din bun wiri , yeo yeo arikoi .
40027052	Deŋesere poripke aŋaŋgi , so Anutu wane ŋei magu loutne koboboine ge more seukkoi , eŋane pareŋene ea ma wirikongi , wisikae wie warekoi .
40027053	Eŋe wie wareu , Yesu wisikae wieke ea wane ŋadino eŋe Mat Koboine Suaino Yerusalem ariu , yewa ŋei ŋerep loutneŋo marat onwarekoi .
40027054	Kawali ŋei eŋane ware wareene , so kawali ŋei eŋerop weneŋ geu paki Yesu warekakoi , eŋe memea make , ea so masi kine kine wakonge , ea kakoi , paki oŋaene qaeki rakoi , “ Ŋei iwa eŋe welekatne Anutu wane Gipole ! ”
40027055	Ŋerep loutne eŋe yewa abaran okorau paki potpi ariki kakoi , eŋe Yesu ŋadino mogatka Galili ŋine sarikoi paki , eŋe qesiŋkakoi .
40027056	Eŋane keuo yemo Maria Magdalena , Maria mane Yakop so Yesep erane nagaetne , eŋe Zebedi gipoletkine erane nagaetne .
40027057	Kepe ketki rarapko , ŋei mane aboŋine suaine , Arimatea mat welaine mane , eŋane eŋetine Yosep , eŋe yaleka Yesu wane medep geke .
40027058	Eŋe Pilat wane kaitko ari waketki paki , Yesu pareŋine ma ariakane qesonkake . Pakiso , Pilat eŋe Yesu wane pareŋine Yosep manikei wane ra ebonge .
40027059	Eso Yosep eŋe Yesu pareŋine ea maki paki , laplap musele maneŋo kawetkake .
40027060	Pakiso eŋine deŋesere biŋek mane kem koto muse musen wesi aŋaine koto yaso maulukke , eao motke . Motki paki wesi suaine rodiŋgi ari eaŋo deŋesereo wake waket aŋaine ea kito wonge metkiso , eŋe arike .
40027061	Maria Magdalena so Maria mane ere yewa deŋesere ka mogare metkoik .
40027062	Kepe qaeki kaiwe maneo eamo qezareko met met ea wane naso qoeke , pris ŋetne so Parisi eŋe korop Pilatrop lewaŋgoi .
40027063	Paki olale rakoi , “ Suaine , ŋene detmaine , isi ŋei ea eŋe wisika geki paki , iwa yale rake , ‘ Kaiwe karewe qoeki , ea wane ŋadino na baŋ wisikae wiekale . ’
40027064	Yale rake , ea wane ge ra edannom , eŋe deŋesere ea diam seleleine ma warekau , kaiwe karewe ea qoeke , eso eŋine dokoine eŋe maine mi eweke more , ari pareŋine ea baŋ kobu makei , paki ŋei ŋerep maine mi edane raikei , ‘ Eŋe mo seu seuo ŋine wisikae wiike . ’ Iwa ŋadino isi eaŋo yemo zok qotkoine , alakan isi ea yuankayake . ”
40027065	Rauso Pilatŋo edange , “ Ŋine diam ŋei mane mau paki , ari deŋesere ea mauluke maine warekakei . ”
40027066	Eso eŋe bira nagu ari , so wesi suaine ea ekiŋo sikatine qe makatakeu metki , so kawali ŋei natne biraonbi diam metkoi .
40028001	Qezareko taboŋ met met ea wane naso qoeki , kepe weleleke ketki , Sodao sakoka Mari Magdalena so Maria mane ere deŋesere kaikeik wane arikoik .
40028002	Eaka memea suaine togoleka maki , Waom wane aŋelo maneŋo qeliwo ŋine ket more wesi , suaine ea rodiŋgi masikane kereki , ea wane kutno pese metke .
40028003	Eŋane kait togaine qilap yale , ŋo takotine yemo libe libe ais yale .
40028004	Kawali ŋei eŋe kaetongi zonomene oreki , seuke seuseune yale okane pakoi .
40028005	Pakiso , aŋeloŋo ŋerep etane rake , “ Ŋire mi kaetŋutkep , na detmaile , ŋire Yesu kibeŋ qabego rasukau seukike , eŋe kaikeik wane sarimamik ,
40028006	eŋe yemo iwa midakaka , eŋe yemo mo ŋidange , yale mo wisikae wiike , iwa sariuk paki , numaine peke ea kauk .
40028007	Ŋire ikopka ariuk paki , dokoine iwa yale edanbik , ‘ Eŋe mo seu seu oŋine wisikae wiike , wane eŋe mo lewine alakane Galili arimaike , ŋine eŋe baŋ ea kaikei ! ’ Na mo ŋidanile , ea desikei . ”
40028008	Eso ere deŋesere esatka qelige arikoik , kaetotke so wetetne oi bakomŋo watkeki , dokoine edangeik wane biririke arikoik .
40028009	Ariuk , eaka Yesuŋo numao marat ore more rake . “ Peamŋo ŋirano payake . ” Ere eŋane osino ariuk paki , kine masatka more bakomine kitokoik .
40028010	Pakiso Yesuŋo etane rake . “ Ŋire misuk kaet ŋusiake , ŋire ariuk paki , naŋane kimakopne edanbik , eŋe Galili ariu paki , na baŋ yewa marat nanikei . ”
40028011	Ŋerep etke ere numaka ariuk , kawali ŋei natne deŋesereo diam metkoi , eŋe mat suaino zinge ariu paki , pris ŋetne tanik kine kine wakonge , yewa edan warekoi .
40028012	Pakiso , pris ŋetne eŋe korop Yuda ŋei suaine eŋerop don au ma togolekoi , eŋe wesi kakapa suaine kawali ŋei ebongoi .
40028013	Paki edane rakoi , “ Ŋine rakei , ‘ Ŋene kulu paŋem eŋine dokoine eŋe goigo sariu paki , pareŋine ea kobu ma arimi . ’
40028014	So ware ware suaine eŋe don kisi iwa mane desiakeo , yemo ŋene don natne baŋ olatkene , ŋine ea wane dere mezet baŋ mi okanikei . ”
40028015	Kawali ŋei diam metkoi , eŋe wesi yewa mau paki , so don mane mi ra qelaŋangoi . Don kisi eaŋo Yuda ŋei edo rau sua arike , so naso iwao eŋe eaka ra gemami .
40028016	Dokoine 11 eŋe Galili meŋo mane , Yesuŋo arikei wane edange ea arikoi .
40028017	Paki , eŋe Yesu kau paki , eŋane kaitko umi qeu paki , bakomine kitokoi , ŋo natne eŋe wet etkeka okangoi .
40028018	Yale okanbi Yesuŋo osoeno sari edane rake , “ Zonom kine kine qeli kotino so kepe kutno yemo korop na ninwareke .
40028019	Ea wane ŋine kepe baŋem ariu paki , ŋei magune magune dokone ebukei , paki Magak so Gipole so Asu Koboboinane eŋetko doku tau onikei .
40028020	So kito edanbi , eŋe don ra ŋidane okan gekole , ea tewek warekei . So ŋidanbe detpi , na naso baŋem ŋinerop ge magewe , kepe nasoine qoeake . ”
41001001	Papia iwa oŋo , eŋe Anutu wane gipole Yesu Kristo , eŋane sigi maep kieke ra wakonmaike .
41001002	Mikepka , Anutu wane qelit ŋei , Isaiaŋo , Yesu Kristo wane sigi maep kieke iwa yale qeke , “ Anutuŋo rake , ‘ Ge detnom ! Na ŋei mane biraka more qebinkawe , oŋo naŋane don kisi ra qelaŋaniake , so geŋane numa maki wakoniake , so alakane gine more urataŋone ma ewekeake . ’
41001003	Kepe yaup papaino didi sawaŋ ŋeiine midaine , yewao ŋei yewa eŋe mere , ŋei mane wane aŋa , ŋei ŋerep boka edora more edane rake , ‘ Ŋine Waom wane numaine mauluke more kito ma koboeu wesake digin qekep ! ’ ”
41001004	Rakiso , naso kutno Yohane eŋe kepe yaup papaine didi sawaŋ ŋeiine midaine yewao wakone doku tauone more biŋek don iwa yale boka edange , “ Ŋine gege mage me masi tanik kine kine ŋine qotkoine korop qeligeu paki wet mainge more ŋadekkauso na doku tauŋunikale . Pakiso , Anutu eŋe ŋinane borikine ŋine yewa yaleka qeliŋgi nigetkayake . ”
41001005	Yale raki dere more , ŋei ŋerep louloutne , Yuda kepeo ŋine so Yerusalem mat suaino ŋine , warage Yohane wane don desikei wane arikoi . Eŋe dere more borikineene ra qelaŋane wet maingeuso , Yohane eŋe Yordan dokuŋo tauonge .
41001006	Yohane eŋe iwa yale geokange . Takotine kamel ea wane zouneŋo mamaine , ea bira more so radeune kebaŋino makatake more , ŋaraine kubon so begok zikotno ŋine eaŋoka nemaŋke .
41001007	Yohane eŋe biŋek don ŋei ŋerep iwa yale edange , “ Ŋei mane ŋadeno sariake . Eŋane zonomineŋo yemo naŋane zonom yuannanmaike . Na ŋei bile mida namde eŋane qelit qeqemeine , noŋo aboŋ kite umatne kutno motpe mi rokopkeake .
41001008	Ŋo noŋo yemo doku tauŋunmaile , oŋo yemo yalewaka Anutu wane Asu Koboboineŋo tauŋuniake . ”
41001009	Naso maneo Yesu eŋe Nazaret mat qelige more , Galili kepeo ŋine Yordan dokuo sari lotkeki , Yohaneŋo Yordan dokuŋo eŋe taukake .
41001010	Taukaki Yesu eŋe dokuo ŋine sa more , yewaka pore kaki , qeli aŋaŋgi Asu eŋe baluse naŋi yale ket Yesu eŋine kutno kitoke .
41001011	Pakiso , Waom wane boka woka mane qeliwo ŋine iwa yale bokaki ketke , “ Ge naŋane gipon maepne , na wetneŋo lukgane malip ganlukmaile . ”
41001012	Eso naso yewaka Asuŋo Yesu ma birakaki , ŋei midaino kepe yaup papaino arike .
41001013	Ari more , ea goiŋ kaiwe 40 geke , naso yewa ŋei midaine kepe yaup papaineo , Ŋei Borikine , Borikine Welaine , Satanŋo sari Yesu liwekkake . Yesu eŋe osom zubaine eŋerop geke . Pakiso aŋelo edo sari qesiŋka more qelit qekakoi .
41001014	Yohane eŋe mulap urumgo waketke , naso yewao , Yesu eŋe koso zinge Galili kepeo sari more Anutu wane biŋek don ra edange .
41001015	Eŋe iwa yale rake , “ Anutuŋo naso motke , ea mo iwa sari lotkemaike . Anutuŋo qeli ewe zonominane motke , iwa mo sarimaike . Ŋine borikine ŋine ŋadekka more , wet maingeu paki , biŋek don iwa dere malipkau ! ”
41001016	Yesu eŋe Galili doku namuŋ wazaino ari more , Saimon so ŋole Andrea potki ariki otke . Ere zawon wane kamaga etne doku namuŋ wazaino bira okorakoik Ere sola wane qesiŋ maratkakeik wane urataine yale naso baŋem togogoleka mamaŋkoik .
41001017	Naso yewao Yesuŋo erano lotke mo etora etane more rake , “ Ŋire sari naŋane ŋadeno mogat nanbik ! Ŋire zawon ebuebu wane kine detlukkoik , pakimo , noŋo ŋei ŋerep ebu ebu wane kine kito ŋiponikale . ”
41001018	Rakiso , ere esatka kamaga qelige more , ŋadino mogare arikoik .
41001019	Yesu eŋe eri eri ari more , eŋe Zebedi wane medewetkine , Yakop so ŋole Yohane otke , ere seki kutno mere kamaga maulukkoik .
41001020	Yesu eŋe ore more boka etoraki , so ere magaetne , Zebedi so urata medewekoune qeliŋ onbik , seki kutno metpi , so ere sari more Yesu wane ŋadino mogare arikoik .
41001021	Pakiso , Yesu eŋine so dokoine ebuke , eŋe Kapaneam matko ari metkoi . Sarere kutno , zonom mama nasoo , Yesuŋo Yuda eŋane lewa lewaŋ urumgo ari more , ŋei ŋerep biŋek don kito edange .
41001022	Ŋei ŋerep edo eŋane miti kito ebo eboninane dere more , qisekoi so oŋaene qaeke . Eŋane kito ebon eboninane zonomineŋo kau , Anutu papa togon welaine ŋei , eŋetene Skribe , eŋane kito ebo ebon ea manerop yuanonge .
41001023	Naso yewao , ŋei mane asu qotkoineŋo kotino weneŋ pake , eaŋo Yuda wane lewa lewaŋ urum koto saket more , oŋo togoleka boka rake ,
41001024	“ Yesu , Nazaret matko ŋine , ge dalino okan ŋonikenane ? Ge ŋene ŋengu matali ŋonikenane iwa sarimaine ? Na detluk ganmaile ! Ge ŋei koboboine Anutuŋo uratainane ra matoke biragangi Anutu eŋino ŋine sarimaine . ”
41001025	Yale rakiso , Yesuŋo asu qotkoine yewa don okanka more olale rake , “ Ge aŋaŋone ma waluke more ŋei yewa qeliŋ kanom ! ”
41001026	Rakiso , asu qotkoineŋo ŋei togoleka rapap qepapkaki paki , suaine boka aro uŋanlan suaineka okane saket qeliŋka arike .
41001027	Pakiso , ŋei ŋerep eŋe oŋaene qaeki , done done au more rakoi , “ Iwa onokaka ? Kito ebo ebon musele me ? Eŋe zonominerop ra togole asu qotkoine edangi , eŋe aŋaine tewekmami . ”
41001028	Ea wane , Yesu wane don kisiŋo ari more esatka Galili kepeo korop rokopkeke .
41001029	Yesu eŋine so Yakop so Yohane eŋe Yuda wane lewa lewaŋ urum qelige ket more Petoro so Andrea eretne matko koboine ari waketkoi .
41001030	Simon wane sewenine eŋe zoma suaine okane , papaino paki solaineŋo zok manerop gereune okangi , ŋei ŋerep edo ikopka Yesu olale rakoi , “ Simon sewenine , eŋe zoma manerop okane , solaine wikile zok manerop wakonkamaike . ”
41001031	Yale rau , Yesu eŋe eaka ari ŋerep metino ma qesiŋka more bukkaki wieke . Paki ŋerep ea eŋe solaine momo qe more menaŋkaki , eŋe eaka wie eŋane ŋara doku mauluke ebongi nekoi .
41001032	Rarapko kepe deine qoe , ruo kereakane okangi , ŋei ŋerep eŋe zoma ŋei , so ŋei asu qotkoinerop , ea Yesu wano ebu sarikoi .
41001033	Mat suaine yewa wane ŋei ŋerep magu suaineŋo sari Simon wane mat tirino lewage qedugu metkoi .
41001034	Metpi Yesu eŋe ŋei ŋerep zoma kine kineenerop ma menaŋone more , kotoeno asu qotkoinerop , ea esoponge , esopongi asu qotkoine eŋe Yesu wane kineine detluk kakoi . Pakiso Yesu eŋe eŋane kine rau mi sua ariakane , ra wetonge .
41001035	Pakimo Yesu eŋe kepe qae qae wane goigoka panaman weneŋ wie ket , mat qeliŋka more , kepe ŋei midaine yewao ari mere meŋenkake .
41001036	Meŋenka metki , Simon eŋine so kimakoune , eŋe baŋ ŋado zuaŋka ari maratkakoi .
41001037	Eŋe ari maratka more , iwa yale olale rakoi , “ Ŋei ŋerep korop magu suaine eŋe ge zuaŋ ganmami ! ”
41001038	Rauso , eŋe iwa yale mainge edange , “ Iwamo ŋene mat suaine natne osop osop pamaike , ŋene ea lolike arikene , na eŋano weneŋ miti edanikalane nanmaike , na urata ea maikalane sarikole . ”
41001039	Yale ra edane so , eŋe Galili kepeo lolike ge mat baŋem Yuda wane lewa lewaŋ urum metke , rokop miti edange , so asu qotkoine ea korop esoponge .
41001040	Ŋei mane kubet togonineropŋo Yesu wano wawetine qe qesonka more rake , “ Ge naŋane simile ganmaikeo , yem ge maine naŋane kubetne iwa manom osiake ! ”
41001041	Yale rakiso , Yesu eŋe eŋane wet borik ma more metine bira solaino uaka mo olatke , “ Na geŋane simile nanmaike , ea wane kubetŋone iwa osikep ! ”
41001042	Olatkiso , esat naso yewaka kubet togonine ea osiki , solaine ea menage libe qeke .
41001043	Pakimo Yesuŋo ŋei ea don kukka ra qebinka more , iwa yale olatke , “ Ge detlukkenom ! Ge ari solaŋone menaŋmaike , ea wane donkisi ŋei mane misuk edanikene , asoze Moseŋo sogino iwa yale ra togoleke . Ŋei mane kubet togonine mo osi menaŋkakeso , eŋe mosop ŋei wano ari solaine sikankayake . Ge yalewaka mosop ŋei wano koboine ari more , solaŋone sikanka more bakom mannom paki arikene . Pakimo , ŋei ŋerep eŋe detgane raikei , eŋe solaine mo menaŋ kamaike . ”
41001044	Yale rakiso , Yesu eŋe don gereunerop olale qebinka birakaki arike .
41001045	Ŋo ŋei yewa eŋe ari more , don kisi yau yaup ra edane ariki eŋane don kisi eaŋo sua korop kepe baŋem rokopkeke . Pakiso , Yesu eŋe mat suaino ŋei ŋerep eŋane deeno koso mi ari lolikke , eŋe kepe ŋei midaino ari metke . Metkiso , ŋei ŋerep kepe baŋem ŋine edoka Yesu wano sarimaŋkoi .
41002001	Yesu eŋe kaiwe mama karewe yewa geki qoekiso , Kapaneam mat suaino zinge ari lotkeke . Pakiso , naso yewao ŋei ŋerep edo don rau yauyaup ariki rakoi , “ Yesu eŋe mo koso i sari matino metmaike . ”
41002002	Paki ŋei ŋerep eŋe esatka mat yewa wane kotino watke madetko so mat wazaino korop rokop ketwarekoi . Kepe ameŋine mane yaup mi pake . Naso yewao Yesu eŋe biŋek don edane okoraki ,
41002003	ŋei etke so etke eŋe zoma ŋei kie metine seuseune mane teweka sarikoi .
41002004	Mat mo ŋei ŋerep edo watke warekoi wane eŋe dalino Yesu wane osino ma waurap . Ŋaŋae more , tiriwoka teweke wa mat bakino Yesu metke kutnoken yewa kito barake more ŋei etke so etke eŋe mulapkoka mau qoroŋ qoroŋ ket zoma ŋei ea eŋe teweinerop Yesu wane osino rasu pake .
41002005	Yesu eŋe kaŋ qae wie pore ŋei etke so etke , eŋe one more eŋane mali malipene detone more Yesuŋo zoma ŋei olale rake , “ Medepna , na geŋane masi qotkoine makone eamo ma qeliŋkawe arimaike . ”
41002006	Yale ra olatkiso , Anutu papa togon welaine ŋei natne , Skribe , eŋe Yesu wane osino mere detpi , dereretene mi kopkeke ,
41002007	“ Dalino wane ŋei yewa eŋe don yaline ramaike ? Eŋe Anutu yuanka more eŋane met met mayakane okanmaike me ? Eŋe detki eŋine Anutu yale okanmaike ? Ŋei maneŋo mane wane sot maine mi qeliŋkayake , Anutu wekuŋo ŋei mane wane sot turuŋ qotkoine ea makoke ma menaŋ ŋoniake ! ”
41002008	Yesu eŋe yewaka dereretene detone more , iwa yale edange , “ Onoka wane ŋine dereret yaline detmami ?
41002009	Na zoma ŋei yewa don ewekine dalino yale olasikale ? Na olale raikale , na sotŋone mo qeliŋkawe siukamaike , me ge wie menage more uamŋone ma more arinom ?
41002010	Ea wane ŋine na detluk nanbi , na Ŋei Wawainane Gipole . Na nae tunno kepeo ŋei ŋerep eŋane sotene eamo qeliŋkawe suikwaremaike . ” Yesu eŋe yale ra more , zoma ŋei olale rake ,
41002011	“ Wie , uamŋone ma more matŋono arinom ! ”
41002012	Pakiso , zoma ŋei yewa eŋe ŋei ŋerep eŋane kaiteno ikopka wie more , uamine rutupke more , kolopke ket arike . Ŋei ŋerep eŋe korop oŋaene qaekiso Anutu wane eŋetine ora bukeu waki rakoi , “ Sogino kine kine mane iwa yaline mi kakone , i midakaka ! ”
41002013	Yale rauso , Yesu eŋe koso Galili doku namuŋ mezeno zinge arike . Ariki ŋei ŋerep magu suaine eŋe sari Yesu wano qeduguwi eŋe miti don kito edange .
41002014	Yesuŋo eŋe ea ŋine ari more , Lewi eŋe takis wesi mama mat koto metki olale ka more rake , “ Lewi ge ket ŋadeno mogatnane sarinom ! ” Raki , Lewi eŋe yewaka wie more , wesi mama urataine ea qelige more , eaka Yesu wane ŋadino mogatka arike .
41002015	Pakiso , boaŋ Yesu eŋe Lewi wane matko ŋara mere neke . Naso yewao takis mama ŋei loutne so ŋei sotenerop natne eŋe Yesu eŋine so dokoine eŋerop weneŋ mere ŋara nekoi .
41002016	Ne metpi , naso yewao Anutu wane papa togon welaine ŋei natne , Parisi , eŋe Yesu kau takis mama ŋei so ŋei sotenerop eŋe weneŋ metki one more , Yesu eŋine dokoine qeson one more rakoi , “ Eŋe eamo onoka wane ŋei qotkoine eŋerop mere ŋara nemaike ? ”
41002017	Rauso , Yesu eŋe detone more rake , “ Maŋo mauluk mauluk ŋei eŋane ari okanmaike ? Zomaenerop , me , zomaene midaineŋo ? Na ŋei yaline eŋane ra more sarikole . Ŋei sotenerop zuaŋone more ebu qesiŋ onikalane sarikole . Na ŋei dereretenane detpi koboine okanmaike , eŋe qesiŋ onikalane mi sarikole . ”
41002018	Naso maneo , Yohane doku tau tau wane dokoine so Anutu papa togon welaine ŋei , Parisi , eŋane dokoene eŋe ŋara sawe gekoi . Naso yewao ŋei ŋerep natne eŋe sari Yesu qesonka rakoi , “ Yohane wane dokoine so Anutu papa togon welaine ŋei , Parisi , eŋane dokoene eŋe ŋara sawe gemami . Ŋo , daleo wane geŋane dokoŋone eŋe yale mi okanmami ? ”
41002019	Yale rauso , Yesuŋo mainge more edane rake , “ Ŋei mane eŋe zokit mayakane rayakeo , ŋei kima koune , eŋe maine ŋara sawe mesikei me ? Yale mida , eŋe zokit mayakane okaniakeo , ŋei kimakoune eŋe maine eŋerop ŋara oi bakom weneŋ mesikei , so kimakoune eŋe ŋara wane sawe mane mi okanikei .
41002020	Na ŋei qaluwit yewa eŋane rokop . Baŋ , naso maneo ŋei edo na neuwi ariwe dokone eŋe koso na mi nanikei , naso yewao eŋe maine ŋara wane sawe gekei . ”
41002021	Yesu eŋe koso takotke rokop don mane rake , “ Takot mane toeki aŋaine okoraki laplap musele mane wane sisineŋo more maine mi qetusikene . Yewa siluŋ qetusikeneo , yemo lap lap sisine museleŋo tebakaki , takot sogine ea toe aŋap suaine wakoniake .
41002022	Ŋo mane maŋo wain musele ea qeki koso nomare sogine yewao kesiake . Eŋe yalewa okangi , yemo wainŋo ket qebinkaki , nomare ea muzugeake . Pakimo , nomare so wain ere weneŋ mida lelekeik , ea wane wain musele eŋe eŋine nomare muselo ketki , eamo menageake . ”
41002023	Qezarek naso maneo , Yesu eŋine so dokoine eŋe wit eu kotinoka ari more dokoine edo wit wele natne siwekoi .
41002024	Pakiso , Anutu papa togon welaine ŋei , Parisi , edo one more Yesu qeson kakoi , “ Ge onnom ! Geŋane dokoŋone eŋe wit siwe nemami . Dokoŋone eŋe masi yewa ŋenane ra rokop dongo yemo okane more sot kaukmami . Qezarek naso yewao mi maikei , yewa ŋenane ŋabozane rara togon don . ”
41002025	Yale rauso , Yesuŋo donene mainge edange , “ Mo sogino asoze Dawit , Israel Ware Ware , eŋine so dokoine eŋe ŋaraenane seuke more
41002026	ari Anutu wane Bakom Urum koto waket more , bret yewao ŋine mi mamaine , eamo ra togoleke , ea ma nekoi . Bret yewa Anutu wane bakom kitokenane . Naso yewao , Abiata Anutu wane mosop ŋei eŋe lewet geke . Ŋenane ra rokop don ra togoleki mosop ŋei edoka bret yewa ne okangoi , ŋo Dawit eŋe yewa ne more dokoine ebongi nekoi . ”
41002027	Yesu eŋe koso edange , “ Anutu eŋe mikepka ŋei so ŋerep ma wakonotki paki , erane ra more ŋadino qezarek naso yewa baŋ motke . Qezarekŋo mawakongi paki , ŋei so ŋerep mi ma wakonge , naso yewaŋo ŋei ŋerep qesiŋ osiakane motke . Me naso yewaŋo ŋei ŋerep matali osiakane mi motke .
41002028	Ea wane , na Ŋei Wawainane Gipoleŋo yalewaka qezarek naso ea wane Waom , so noŋo ea wane welaine . ”
41003001	Naso maneo , Yesu eŋe koso zinge ari Anutu wane lewalewaŋ urum koto waketke . Ŋei mane yewa metke , eŋe metine nat paromineŋo setneka marap maraune .
41003002	Ŋei natne eŋe Yesu kau sariki diamine mau paki , iwa yale rakoi , “ Yesu eŋe qezarek nasoo zoma ŋei metine marap maraune iwa maine ma menaŋ kayake me mida . Eŋe ma menaŋ kayakeo , yemo ŋene Yesu dongo birakaikene . ”
41003003	Yesu eŋe zoma ŋei yewa metine borikine , eŋe olale more rake , “ Ge meteŋone borikine , yalinane iwa wie sari okoranom ! ”
41003004	Pakiso , eŋe ŋei ŋerep qeson one rake , “ Ŋenze ra rokop don eŋe qezarek naso wane don dalino mawalukke ? Masi maine maikene me qotkoine ? Ŋene ŋei ŋerep gegeene ma menaŋ onikene me ŋei ŋerep enguŋem seukkei ? ” Qesonongi , edo dere more don mane mi mainge olatkoi .
41003005	Pakimo Yesu eŋe deine pore lolike more ongi eŋe dereretene won geki doneene midaine metkoi , ea wane Yesu eŋe ikopka sotine osiki koso dere umare onge . Pakiso , Yesu eŋe zoma ŋei olale rake , “ Ge meteŋone birakanom ! ” Eŋe metine biraki , eaka ikopka menanŋkake .
41003006	Yale okangiso , Parisi eŋe ikopka Anutu wane lewa lewaŋ urum qeliŋka more wie saket ari Herot wane tego eŋerop lewage more , Yesu eŋe numa ea me ea maratka more qeu seukeakane done aukoi .
41003007	Yesu eŋe dokoine eŋerop wie mat yewa qeligeu paki , Galili wane doku namuŋ pamaike , yewa arikoi . Pakimo ŋei ŋerep magu tego kakapa suaineŋo wie eŋe mogatka arikoi . Ŋei ŋerep magu suaine yewa eŋe kepe baŋem ŋine sarikoi .
41003008	Galili kepeo ŋine , Yuda kepeo ŋine , Yerusalem mat suaino ŋine , Idumia kepeo ŋine , Yordan kepe sasaino ŋine , Tire so Sidon kepeo ŋine . Ŋei ŋerep magu suaine yewa eŋe Yesuŋo urata kine kine maki detka more eŋano sarikoi .
41003009	Magu suaine zok manerop Yesu watke more , gitit kaikei wane okanbi eŋe dokoine eŋane rake , “ Ŋine ari seki mane ikopka mauluke ma sariu , yaup warenan metkep ! Ŋei ŋerepŋo magu suaine okanbi , so na ea wane kutno wa more toe , ŋei ŋerep biraone eri kere , amaŋ naeka toe mesikale . ”
41003010	Sogino mo Yesu eŋe ŋei ŋerep loutne ma menaŋ onge , ea wane ŋei ŋerep zomaenerop eŋe edom meteeneŋo solaine makei wane onge , pakimo ea wane eŋe kimakopeene qepodon onbi sari , Yesu sola takotino uakaikei wane okangoi .
41003011	Naso natneo ŋei ŋerep asu qotkoinerop eŋe Yesu ka more ari kepeo ket rasu pa more boka aroke ora rakoi , “ Ge , Anutu wane Gipole ! ”
41003012	Yale rau , Yesu eŋe asu qotkoine togogoleka ra togole ongi paki eŋe ma , ea tingo me didiwo eŋane eŋetine zok mi rau suayakane rawetonge .
41003013	Pakiso , Yesu eŋe weti bonagao wake , naso eao wie more , ŋei natne eŋerop gekei wane ma wakononge , ŋei ea eŋe edoraki eŋano sarikoi .
41003014	Pakimo eŋe ŋei magu 12 ma wakononge , ŋei yewaŋo eŋinerop gekei wane , ma wakon one more , eŋeteene aposolo edorake , so eŋe bira ongi ari ŋei ŋerep eŋano biŋek don ra qelaŋanikei wane rake .
41003015	Yesu eŋe ŋei 12 yewa eŋine tungo asu qotkoine esop onikei wane zonom takot onge .
41003016	Yesu dokoine eŋane eŋet tegoene iwa yale ebonge . Simon , eŋetine mane Petoro orake .
41003017	Zebedi wane gipole Yakop , eŋine so ŋole Yohane , erane eŋeteetne mane Boanerges etorake . Eŋet yewa wane kine , quruŋ qilap .
41003018	Andrea , so Pilip , Bartolomu , Mataio , Tomas , Yakop , Alpius wane gipole , so Tadius so Saimon Zelot .
41003019	Ŋo Yudas Iskariot , ŋei yewaŋo Yesu ŋaba eŋane meteeno masi qotkoine okan kaikei wane ma wakonka birakake .
41003020	Pakiso , Yesu eŋe matko ariki ŋei ŋerep magu suaineŋo eŋano koso sari lewaŋgoi . Ea wane Yesu , eŋine so dokoine eŋe qeka more , dalino ŋara mane neurap .
41003021	Yesuŋo kine kine okange so make , ea wane tego tanik manik ea ŋei eŋe ra suau dere more weneŋ tutulekoune , eŋe Yesu ma walukka more , iwenkaikei wane sarikoi . Tutulekoune eŋe iwa yale rakoi , “ Eŋe mo qelaŋ qemaike ! ”
41003022	Anutu papa togon welaine ŋei natne , Skribe , eŋe Yerusalem ŋine ket more rakoi , “ Eŋe kotino Belzebul , eŋetine mane Satanŋo okoramaike . Eŋe Belzebul wane zonomgo so oŋo qesiŋkaki , asu qotkoine ea esoponmaike , eaŋo asu qotkoine eŋane ware ware . ”
41003023	Eŋe yale rauso , Yesu eŋe edoraki osino sari metpiso don rokop mane more edane rake , “ Satan oŋomka dalino Satan osop kayake ?
41003024	Ŋei ŋerep kaunsol mane wane magu eŋe wiri magu etke okane more yakukei , kaunsol ea wane zonomine eamo midayake .
41003025	Ŋo ŋei urumene weku eŋe wiri more magu etke okane more kawali yakukei , ŋei yewa eŋe koso togole qeturage maine weku mi lele gekei .
41003026	Ŋo Satan eŋe eŋine magu ŋaba okan oniake , eŋe wiri more zonomene midayake . ”
41003027	Yesu eŋe koso don iwa yale takotke rake , “ Satan ŋei zonomine suaine , eŋane urata wane aboŋ kine kineine yaup maine mi ari maikene , yemo midakaka . Mikep eŋine kie metine wokomka more ŋado maine eŋane mat koto wa more , urata wane aboŋ kine kineine pamaike , yewa matali onikene .
41003028	Na ŋine don wele iwa yale ŋidanbe , Anutu eŋe ŋei ŋerep eŋane masi tanik qotkoine kine kine so don dereret borikine ramami , yewa eŋe korop qeliŋgi siukeake .
41003029	Ŋo ŋei mane eŋe Anutu wane Asu Koboboine ra matali okan kayakeo , yemo ukude Anutuŋo eŋane sot ea mi qeliŋgi siukeake . Eŋane borikinane sot turuŋ ea qoi qoine midaine motki pamageake . ”
41003030	Yesu eŋe don yale ra edangane Anutu wane papa togon don welaine ŋei eŋe rakoi , “ Yesu eŋe mo kotino asu qotkoineŋo ketke okoramaike . ”
41003031	Naso yewao Yesu wane nagaine , so ŋonqaine eŋe sari lotke more mat wazaino okora more don motpi wake , Yesuŋo saket oniakane .
41003032	Pakimo , ŋei ŋerep magu suaine eŋe Yesu lolikka metkoi , edo olale rakoi , “ Ge detnom ! Geŋane nagaŋone , so ŋonqakopŋone eŋe qeinat , mat wazaino okora more goŋo kesikenane ramami . ”
41003033	Yalewa rau , Yesu eŋe mainge edane rake , “ Maŋo naŋane nagane , so ŋonqane ? ”
41003034	Eŋe deine ŋei ŋerep lolikka metkoi , eŋe one more , enanoka pore ongi paki rake , “ Onbi ! Iwa edo naŋane nagane so ŋonqane okanmami .
41003035	Ŋei me ŋerep mane eŋe Anutu wane don dere eŋane simile mogasikei , ea ŋo naŋane nagane so ŋonqane okanmami . ”
41004001	Pakimo , Yesu eŋe koso kito ebo ebon urataine takotke more , Galili doku namuŋ wane qalakino ŋei ŋerep kito ebonge . Pakiso ŋei ŋerep zok tego suaineŋo sari eŋano manerop lewage more watke Yesu lolikkau eŋe kepo qelige ari seki mane kutno wa more ŋei ŋerep biraone weti toe namuŋgo wa eŋineka metke . Metkiso , ŋei ŋerep magu eŋe qalakino lewage okorakoi .
41004002	Eŋe yalewa okorau , Yesu eŋe don rokop mane kito more edane rake ,
41004003	“ Ŋine detpi ! Ŋei mane eŋe euo wit ebosiakane arike .
41004004	Eŋe wit woune natne euo ebotke , pakimo , natne ari numao kito metki naŋi edo sari nekoi .
41004005	Woune natne ari kepe wesi tabilainerop kepe ewekine yewa wane kutno ket kito ikopka poripke wiekoi .
41004006	Wane kaiwe suaine sa more wit komine yewa ezoke . Ŋodoene yewa qei mi ketlukke kepe wesi tabilainerop ea wane komine ururuke seukkoi .
41004007	Wit woune natne touk okolerop ea wane koto ket kitokoi . Wane touk okolerop yewaŋo ikop wie more pise walip onge . Walip ongiso , wit wele maine mi qekoi .
41004008	Ŋo , wit woune natne kepe gukinerop yewao ket kitokoi . Ket kito more , komine poripke sua more wele maine qekoi . Wele natne 30 , natne edo 60 , natne edo zok 100 yaline qekoi . ”
41004009	Ea wane Yesu eŋe edange , “ Ŋei me ŋerep mane eŋe ketineropŋo yemo don iwa dere malipka more , kine detlukkayake . ”
41004010	Ŋei ŋerep magu suaine eŋe biraone ari warekoi , naso yewao Yesu eŋineka metki , eŋine dokoine 12 eŋe so ŋei natne mo Yesurop weneŋ ge okangoi , eŋe Yesu wane don raki detkakoi , ea wane eŋano sari qesonka rakoi , “ Ge don rokop more rene ea ra qelaŋane ŋedannom detŋem . ”
41004011	Yesu eŋe mainge rake , “ Anutuŋo don sanine so qeli ewe zonominane kine so ŋine dalino ware ŋunmaike , na ŋine ea desikei wane ŋidanmaile . Ŋei ŋerep natne ŋadino gemami eŋe naŋane don , ea don rokopkoka kito more edan edan wane raraine , ea wane rokop na korop kito edanbe , eŋe detwaremami .
41004012	Yalewa wane , ‘ Eŋe deeneŋo kaikei , ŋo , eŋe kine kine maine mi kau qelaŋaniake . Eŋe keteneŋo maine desikei , ŋo , eŋe kine maine mi detlukkei , so weteeno mi maingeu , soteene pa eboniake . Ea wane eŋe wet maingeu , Anutuŋo eŋane sot qelingi siukeake . ’ ”
41004013	Pakiso , Yesu eŋe qesonone rake , “ Ŋine don rokop kito more rele , yewa koso maine weneŋ detlukkamami me ? Pakimo , ŋine don rokop korop yewa wane kine dalino det lukkaikei ?
41004014	Ŋei wit woune ebotmaike , ea eŋe Anutu wane don oŋom ebotmaike .
41004015	Woune natne dumao ket kitoke , ea yemo ŋei ŋerep natne eŋe Anutu wane don detpi , kotoeno ketki , nasomde bamgoka , Satan eŋe sari Anutu wane don ea ŋei ŋerep natne eŋane kotoeno yasoke , ea ma biraki saket ariake .
41004016	Woune natne kepe kutka , wesi tabila weneŋ , ea wane kutno ket kitoke , eamo ŋei ŋerep natne eŋe Anutu wane don ikop dere ma more bakom kitokei .
41004017	Ŋo , eŋe ŋodine qeirop mi ket ma qotke mesiake . Eŋe kutka metki , ŋaba edo biŋek don wane umat natne wikilerop ebonbi , eŋe koso Anutu ŋadekkaikei .
41004018	Woune natne eŋe touk okolerop ea wane keune ket kitokoi , eamo ŋei ŋerep natne eŋe Anutu wane don detkoi .
41004019	Ŋo , kepe kutno gege wane umat so wesi aboŋ suaine maratka maratka , so kine kine natne , ea wane bailalaŋ , eaŋo ŋei ŋerep eŋane kotoeno waket more , Anutu wane don kotoeno piseka more ma qorokka more , ma pelek kaki siukke , ea wane wele maine mi qekoi .
41004020	Ŋo woune natne kepe kelokinerpko eao ket kitokoi , eamo ŋei ŋerep natne eŋe Anutu wane don dere more malipka lukeu paki , ma qotkakoi . Ea wane eŋe wele maine qekoi , wele natne 30 , natne 60 , natne 100 yale qekoi . ”
41004021	Pakiso , Yesu eŋe koso rake , “ Ŋei mane kiwa kuake more diao qeki okorayake ? Lase bano me rosaŋo more supaki mesiake ? Mida ! Eŋe kiwake more qeki zake kutno didiwo okora korop qelaŋanoniake .
41004022	Yalewaka , kine kine korop sane pamaike , ea na ŋado didiwo mawe wakon wareake . So kine kine natne supawe metmaike , ea ŋado na ma lalagewe didiwo wakon wareake .
41004023	Ŋei me ŋerep mane eŋe ketineropŋo don iwa wane kine dere more malipka lukki paki , korop detka wareake . ”
41004024	Yale ra more eŋe koso edane rake , “ Ŋine dere more kaulukkei ! Ŋine ŋei ŋerep eŋano urata kine kine mauluke ebonikeiwo , Anutu eŋe yalewaka ŋine mauluke ŋibone more koso manerop takotke yuanka maulukŋune ŋiboniake . Ŋo , ŋine ŋei ŋerep matali ebonikeiwo , Anutu eŋe ŋine yalewaka mataliŋune more koso manerop yuanka mataliŋune ŋiboniake .
41004025	Anutu eŋe ŋei me ŋerep mane kine kine mo mangi make , ea togoleka malipka geakeo , eŋe koso takotke mane more ma sua maniake . Ŋo , ŋei mane eŋe Anutu kine kine nigatne mange , ea mi mauluke wareka mageakeo , yemo Anutu eŋe ŋei yewa wane kine kine mange , ea koropka omaka wareake . ”
41004026	Yesu eŋe koso rake , “ Anutuŋo ware ŋunmaike , ea wane tanikine iwa yale . Ŋei mane eŋe kine kine woune euo ebore more ,
41004027	eŋine matko ari toma geake . Ŋo eŋe mi detkamaike , wele dalino eu koto wakonmaike . Pakimo , woune ea eŋe poripke sayake .
41004028	Saki , kepe oŋomka komine mapitkaki sua wele qeake . Mikepka kau saraine so pizulumine . Ŋadino wit wele wakone more menage laŋeniake .
41004029	Wit wele laŋengi , ŋei eŋe kieke pilaŋŋo kitatmaike . ”
41004030	Yesu eŋe koso takotke more ŋei ŋerep qesonone more rake , “ Na Anutuŋo wane miti me qeli ewe zonom wane numa ea mo kine kine mane onokakao rokop kitowe , takotke more ra qelaŋanikale ?
41004031	Eŋe eamo mastet woune yale , nigatnemde okanmaike . Mastet woune nigatnemde kine kine natnane woune me waetne yuane more zok manerop , nigatne okanmaike . Yalinane mastet woune ea ŋei manŋo euine ebotke .
41004032	Pakimo , eŋe poripke more , sua eu kotino ŋara nenine natne korop yuanone more , eŋe wie weti wa qogine qe mesiake . Pakimo , naŋi eŋe sari wa more naune koto matene kito more mesikei . ”
41004033	Yesu eŋe don rokop kine kine loutne iwa more ŋei ŋerep ra edange . Ŋei ŋerep edo dere qelaŋanikei wane Yesu eŋe dereretene rokouno edange .
41004034	Yesu eŋe ŋei ŋerep don rokop eaka edane okange . Ŋo , eŋe dokoine eŋerop mere more , don rokop wane kine ra qelaŋane edane okange .
41004035	Naso mane kepe qoiqoiwo , Yesu eŋe dokoine edane rake , “ Ŋene sekiwo wa more , doku namuŋ kitare erinat ariŋem . ”
41004036	Raki , eŋe ŋei ŋerep magu suaine yewa qeliŋone more , Yesu alakane wa metkiso , dokoine eŋe ŋado seki yewa wane kutno wa more , eŋe weneŋ ma ariuso , seki natne eŋe weneŋ eŋerop arikoi .
41004037	Ariu , ikopka dibom suaine wie more seki koto kiwet qakki ket watke ma murugeakane okange .
41004038	Yesu eŋe seki sotno qaliŋan more kulu pake . Dokoine eŋe ari ma wirikka rakoi , “ Kito ŋebo ŋebon ŋene zok bori more seukkenane okanmaine ! Ge onoka wane mi det ŋonmaine ? ”
41004039	Yesu eŋe wie more togoleka kuroge momo olatke , “ Doŋ mannom ! ” Ra more eŋe dibom olatke , “ Ge , tikŋane doŋ mane panom ! ” Rakiso momo eŋe doŋ mangi , so dibom eŋe yaleka tik doŋ mane kaloŋ suaine pake .
41004040	Pakiso , Yesu eŋe dokoine edane rake , “ Ŋine onoka wane kaet okanmami ? Ŋine malip malipŋine mida me ? ”
41004041	Eŋe kaet suaine okane more , enŋene auye rakoi , “ Ŋei iwa eŋe zok ŋei kine mane ! Naso bano ŋei ŋerep zoma kubetenerop so asuene qotkoine ma menaŋonge , wane koso iwa momo so dibom suaine iwa don etangi , ere done detka more qeliŋmamik ! ”
41005001	Kaloŋ okangi , Yesu so dokoine eŋe Galili Namuŋ erinat ari lotkekoi , kepe yewa eŋetine Gerasa .
41005002	Yesu eŋe seki qeliŋka ketki , yewaka ŋei mane eŋe deŋesere wane kezem aŋaino ŋine sari qalakko okoraki maratkake . Ŋei yewa eŋe asu qotkoineŋo kotino pake .
41005003	Eŋe deŋesere koto geokange , pakiso ŋei maneŋo ŋei yewa maine mi ma walukkake me mulap togogoleŋo kine metine lukkakoi , eŋe mi detke .
41005004	Naso loutne ŋei ŋerep eŋe ma more , kie metine mulap togoleŋo wokom kamaŋkoi , ŋo , naso baŋem eŋe mulap togole metino ea romatkeki qoe okange , so eŋe mulap togole kieino ea ratokmaŋke . Ŋei ea wane zonomineŋo manerop kakapa suaine okane , ŋei korop yuanonge , ea wane ŋei maneŋo maine mi ma walukkake .
41005005	Naso baŋem goiŋ kaiwe ŋei yewa eŋe deŋesere koto so tobo zikotne bonagao yau yaup lolike ari ari , sari sari , okorake , so bokaki paki , kuroge oŋom ari kitoki , solaine eki so wesiŋo kitat qetat mamaŋke .
41005006	Naso eao ŋei yewa eŋe abaranka okora pore kaki , Yesu eŋe sekiwo kiroine eri sariki , eŋe ikopka biririke sari qalakko Yesu ketki , eŋano wawetine qeke .
41005007	Asu qotkoine yewa , eŋe Yesu wano aroine suaine aroke rake , “ Yesu , ge Anutu Suaine Wetika Weti , eŋane gipole ! Ge na dalino okan nanikene ? Na Anutu wane kaitko meŋen ganmaile . Goŋo na matalinane more wikile zok misuk ninikene ! ”
41005008	Eŋe yale waka rake , ea yemo Yesuŋo asu qotkoine yewa olale rake , “ Asu qotkoine , ge ŋei yewa qeliŋka arinom ! ”
41005009	Pakiso , Yesuŋo qesonkake , “ Ge , eŋetŋone ma ? ” Asu qotkoine eŋe rake , “ Ŋene eŋetze , kawali ŋei , ŋene magu suaine , ea wane asu qotkoine ŋene louloutneŋo ŋei iwa wane kotino metmaine . ”
41005010	Pakiso , eŋe koso Yesu sorinka rake , “ Kepe iwa ŋine misuk osopŋonnom arikene . ”
41005011	Berek magu suaine eŋe meŋo erinat ea ŋara ne gekoi .
41005012	Ea wane asu qotkoine eŋe Yesu togogoleka sorinka rakoi , “ Ŋene ŋebu biraŋonnom ari berek eŋane kotoeno maine wakesikene ! ”
41005013	Yesu eŋe dere more , asu qotkoine edane rake , “ Maine ŋine yewa arikei . ” Rakiso , Asu qotkoine eŋe ŋei yewa qeliŋka more , saket ari berek eŋane kotoeno waketkoi , waketpi , berek magu suaine yewa eŋe biririke ari korop sorao sontake ket dokuo qok ne more seukwarekoi . Berek magu suaine kibiene 2,000 .
41005014	Berek ware ware eŋe masi ea kau paki , kaetongi , korop ket ari more matko matko so kepe saiwo ŋei ŋerep donkisi edangoi . Pakiso ŋei ŋerep louloutne eŋe ari berek seukkoi ea ongoi .
41005015	Eŋe koso Yesu wano ari more , ŋei yewa kau eŋe sogino asu qotkoineŋo matalikaki geke , ea eŋe maine lap lap ramu more wetine lotkeki tik ŋaneŋ metke . Naso yewao ŋei ŋerep eŋe ka more kaet onge .
41005016	Ea wane berek ware ware edo qelaŋ ŋei asu qotkoinerop eŋane so berek seu seuenane kine ra qelaŋane ŋei ŋerep magu yewa edangoi .
41005017	Ea wane ŋei ŋerep eŋe dere more , koropŋo Yesu wane don togole iwa rakoi , Yesu eŋe ikopka ŋenane kepe mat iwa qeligeso kepe mat maneo ariake .
41005018	Yesu eŋe seki koto waketkiso , ŋei yewa sogino asu qotkoinerop geke , eŋe Yesuerop arikeik wane sorinkake .
41005019	Ŋo , Yesu eŋe ŋei yewa ma kitatka rake , “ Ge zinge matŋono ari more nabok magak so weŋem sotawekopŋone , kine kine solaŋono Waomŋo mamaike so Anutu wane wet borik suaine geŋane solaŋono wakonmaike , ea wane donkisi edannom . ”
41005020	Yale olatkiso , ŋei yewa eŋe zinge ari more mat suaine mete etke , 10 , yaline yewao korop lolike ge more solaine Yesuŋo maulukkake , ea wane ra qelaŋane edane arike . Ŋei ŋerep eŋe dere more oŋaene qaeke . Kepe iwa eŋetine , Mat Suaine Mete Etke .
41005021	Pakiso , Yesu eŋine so dokoine , eŋe koso doku namuŋ ratoke erinat ariuso ŋei ŋerep magu suaine eŋe mo sari qalakko lewage metkoi .
41005022	Yairus eŋe mat yewa wane Yuda wane lewa lewaŋ urum wane ŋetne , oŋo sari more Yesu wane osino kino pese ket wawetine qe more
41005023	Yesu qesonka more zok arokke . “ Borasone nigatne mo bomitne seukeakane okanmaike . Ge sari more meteŋone kutno motnom , zoma yewa qeliŋkaki eŋe maine koso menageake . ”
41005024	Pakiso , Yesu eŋe ŋei yewa eŋerop ariukso ŋei ŋerep louloutne eŋe watke lolikka arikoi .
41005025	Pakiso , ŋerep mane eŋe ŋerep zoma weneŋ .
41005026	Zoma yewa naso baŋem metokangi , komaine 12 okangiso eŋe wesiine zoma yewa wane ra more mauluk mauluk eŋano biraki midakakae , ŋo , eŋe maine mi ma menaŋ kakoi . Eŋe wikile zok takotke manbi , zoma eaŋo sari suakake .
41005027	Pakiso , ŋerep yewa eŋe Yesu wane siron dere more sari ŋei ŋerep magu suaine yewa eŋane keueno Yesu maratka osino sari more iwa yale detke .
41005028	“ Na meteneŋo eŋano uakaikale me takotino maineka mosikale , pakiso nae koso menaŋgale . ”
41005029	Eso ŋerep yewa eŋe metine Yesu wane laplapko uaka more yewaka detki mo maine menaŋkake . Pakiso , ŋerep zoma yewa mo midakakae .
41005030	Yesu eŋe naso bomitne yemdaka detki zonomine natne ketki , ikop zinge eŋe qesononge . “ Maŋo metine naŋane takotko uakeke ? ”
41005031	Raki dokoine edo done mainge rakoi . “ Ŋei louloutne edo wonge maguk ganbi , ge onoka wane don yaline qesonŋonmaine ? Ŋene mi detmaine maŋo ŋei loutneŋo meteene laplap ŋono ua ganmami . ”
41005032	Yale rau , Yesu eŋe pore lolike onge , ea maŋo laplapino make ea maratkayakane okange .
41005033	Pakiso , ŋerep yewa eŋe Yesu takotino uakaki zomaine midakakae , yewa wane dere zok zonomine oreki kaetkake . Paki , eŋe Yesu wane osino sari pese wawetine qe ket more okange , yewa wane kine olatke .
41005034	Pakiso , Yesuŋo eŋe olatke , “ Borasone , malip malipŋoneŋo zomaŋone yewa ma ewek ganmaike . Ea wane ge maine ari more wet maepko gekene . Zomaŋone mo korop midawaremaike . ”
41005035	Yesu eŋe ŋerep don olale okoraki , naso yewaka ŋei natne eŋe Yairus wane matko ŋine mat qelige sari olale rakoi , “ Ge ! Borasoŋone nigatne mo seukmaike . Yesu mi iwenka sarikene yeine . Eŋe maine mi ma wirik kayake . ”
41005036	Ŋo , Yesu eŋe eŋane don wane ket mi more so , eŋe Yairus olatke , “ Ge misuk kaet gangep ! Ge mali malipŋone togolekep ! ”
41005037	Yesu eŋe yale ra more ŋei ŋerep mawaluk one more Petoro so Yakop , so eŋane ŋole Yohane , karewe edoka eŋerop Yairus wane matko weneŋ arikoi .
41005038	Eŋe mat yewao sari more Yesuŋo ongi , ukat suaine ma more zok manerop arokkoi .
41005039	Eŋe ari waket more magu edange . “ Ŋine mi arokeu so ukat suaine zok mi mau . Ŋerep ŋerep iwa eŋe mi seukike . Eŋe yaup kulu pamaike . ”
41005040	Yale ra edangi , eŋe wawaine don olale more bokaka Yesu kuroŋ kakoi . Pakiso , Yesu eŋe mat yewao ŋino osopone moreso eŋe medep nagamagaine , eŋine so dokoine karewe enŋeneka ari more medep mat aŋaine pake , yewao ari waket kakoi .
41005041	Pakiso , Yesu eŋe ŋerep ŋerep seuseune ea wane metino ma more Yuda dongoka olatke , “ Talita koumi ” . Don yewa iwa yale , “ Ŋerep nigatne na golatmaile . Ge wienom ! ”
41005042	Ŋerep ŋerep yewa eŋe ikopka wisikae wie arike . Ŋerep ŋerep komaine 12 . Ea wane ŋei ŋerep eŋe masi ea ka more zok oŋaene qaeke .
41005043	Pakiso , Yesuŋo nagamagaine yewa togole etange , “ Ŋire medep ŋara manbit nekep . Ŋo , ŋire kine kine iwa wane don kisi yauyaup misuk raut suayake . ”
41006001	Yesu eŋine so dokoine eŋe mat yewa qelige more eŋine matine Nasaret arikoi .
41006002	Pakiso qezarek naso okangiso eŋe ari ŋei ŋerep Yuda eŋane miti lewa lewaŋ urum kotino metkoi , yewa kito ebonge . Paki , magu suaine metkoi , eŋe detka more dereretinane oŋaene qaeki rakoi . “ Ei ! Ŋei yewa eŋe don yewa diao ŋine meke ? Dereret yewa maŋo manike ? Eŋe eŋine masi togole iwa dalino mamaike ?
41006003	Ŋei yewa eŋe matmama . Eŋe Maria wane gipole . Eŋane ŋolekoune Yakop , Yosep , Yuda so Simon so qakoune iwa ŋenerop weneŋ gemami . ” Eŋe yale ra more ŋadek kakoi .
41006004	Ea wane Yesuŋo iwa yale edange . “ Anutu wane qelit ŋei propet eŋe mat baŋem miti urata ma ge arimami , edo eŋane eŋetene zok mawaon okanmami . Ŋo , matkopene so weŋem sotak so matene kotino edo eŋane eŋetine maket biraon okanmami . ”
41006005	Eso yalinane Yesu matkoune ŋei ŋerep eŋane mali malipene mi pake . Ea wane Yesu eŋe pore ka more masi togogole eŋano zok mi make . Eŋe zoma ŋei ŋerep weku weku metine more ma menaŋonge .
41006006	Pakiso , Yesu eŋe Nasaret mat qelige ari , mat natne yewao lolike ge more , Anutu wane biŋek don ŋei ŋerep edange . Ŋo ŋei ŋerep ea eŋe wetŋo mi malipkakoi , eŋane yemo dere mezet okange .
41006007	Naso yewao Yesu eŋe dokoine 12 ea naso yewao qeduguone more etkeka etkeka , matko matko biraonge . So eŋe biŋek don ra qelaŋanikei wane so ŋei ŋerep eŋano asu qotkoine esopongei wane zonom takotonge .
41006008	Pakimo edange , “ Ŋine qesiŋine maine qesiŋ nagu kei wane makei , eso kine kine natne weneŋ mi ma arikei , ŋara so kite gerep me wesi kite mane misuk ma arikei , ea yeine ,
41006009	ŋine kie kulit so takot suaine weku bira arikei , takot etke eamo yeine . ”
41006010	Eŋe koso edange , “ Ŋo , ŋine mat maneo ari lotke more ŋei ŋerep qeson onbi edo raikei , maine iwa saket mere pa wie okanbi , mat yewa wane kotinoka mere pa wie okanikei .
41006011	Ŋo mat mane edo ŋinane don mi dere more , ŋinerop mi mesikei wane rauso , ŋine mat yewa qelige more , kie ŋino kepe nalek yewa sauke lakokeu ket metki , so eŋe masi ea ka more desikei , Anutuŋo ŋenerop ŋaba okanmaike . ”
41006012	Pakiso , dokoine eŋe matko matko ari more , mat louloutne eao biŋek don iwa yale edangoi , “ Ŋine masi tanik kine kine qotkoine ea korop qelige ŋadekka more wet mainge wareu ! ”
41006013	Pakiso , eŋe asu qotkoine louloutne zok ŋei ŋerep eŋano ŋine osop one moreso ŋei ŋerep zomaenerop ea kelok tau more , korop ebu ma menaŋ ongoi .
41006014	Naso yewao kepe wareware Herot eŋe Yesu wane donkisiŋo detki mo zok mat korop rokopkeke . Ŋei ŋerep natne eŋe rakoi , “ Yohane doku tautauŋo mo deŋesereo ŋine wisikae wieke . Ea wane eŋe masi tanik zonominerop togogole iwa mamaike . ”
41006015	Ŋo ŋei natne eŋe rakoi , “ Eŋe Elaiya ! ” Natne eŋe rakoi , “ Eŋe Anutu wane qelit ŋei propet mane , eŋe mo propet sogine gekoi , eŋe yaleka . ”
41006016	Kepe ware ware Herot eŋe ea dere more rake , “ Yohane doku tautau ea mo noŋo sogino ebine kitatkole . Eŋe koso yewa mo wisikae wie gemaike . ”
41006017	Mo sogino Yohane doku tau tau eŋe wisika ge more don togole Herot wano rake , “ Ge ŋonŋone Pilip wane ŋanomine ea kobu makone . Masi yewa mi kopkemaike . ” Sogine Herot eŋe zok Herodias ŋolane ŋanomine kobu make . Ea wane , Herot eŋe ŋei biraongi ari malipka mulap togoleŋo lukka masari more , mulap urumgo warage ari birakakoi .
41006018	
41006019	Ŋo Herodias eŋe Yohane wane dere worik okanka more qeki seukeakane okange , ŋo Herot eŋe Yohane maine warekake .
41006020	Herot eŋe Yohane ŋei koboine , Anutuŋo birakake , dere qeka okane more kaetkaki mauluke warekake . Herot eŋe naso natneo Yohane wane aŋaino ŋine don natne dere more naso baŋem qisemaŋke .
41006021	Paki , Herodias eŋe Yohane qeki seukeakane numaine iwa yale maratkake . Herot eŋe ŋara suaine maki zeki eŋine wakon wakon nasoino more edoraki ŋei loutne sarikoi . Pakiso , eŋe gavaman kepe ware ware suaine so kawali ŋei eŋane ware ware suaine so Galili kotino mat suaine mere arimaike , ea wane ŋei suaine suaine qeson onge .
41006022	Herodias borasine eŋe sari eŋet kito oreke . Ea wane Herot so ŋei ŋara nekoi , eŋe korop eŋane simin onge . Ea wane Herot eŋe ŋerep natawen yewa qesonka rake : “ Ge kine kine yewa me yewa wane ra more qeson nannom , na maine ginikale . ”
41006023	Eŋe atak loutne ra togoleke , “ Na ra togolemaile . Kine kine yewa me yewa maine ginikale . So naŋane kepe aboŋ suaine ea ginikalane ! Ranom na maine keuoka mapoke more ginikale . ”
41006024	Pakiso , ŋerep natewen yewa eŋe ari nagaine iwa yale qesonkake , “ Na Herot onoka wane qesonka rawe niniake ? ” Rakiso , Herodiasŋo olatke , “ Ge ari Yohane doku tau tau ebine kitasiakane qesonkaikene ! ”
41006025	Yale olatkiso , ŋerep yewa eŋe ikopka biririke Herot wano ari qesonka rake , “ Naŋane similene iwa yale . Ge ukudeka Yohane doku tautau wane ebine kitare more peletko more naŋano ma sari ninnom ! ”
41006026	Herot eŋe yewa dere more zok detki qomine umare lukke , ŋo mo ŋei suaine eŋane deeno atak loutne takorakot ra togole okange , ea wane eŋe dalino koso dereretine maingeki rap .
41006027	Ea wane ikopka kawali ŋei mane birakaki ari mulap urum koto Yohane wane ebine kitare more , lewetine ea make .
41006028	Pakiso , eŋe Yohane wane lewine ea pelet maneo more , so masari ŋerep natewen yewa mangi , so eŋe ma ari nagaine mange .
41006029	Pakiso , Yohane wane ŋadino dokoine gekoi , eŋe dere more sari Yohane pareŋine ea ma ari deŋesereo dukkakoi .
41006030	Ea wane Yesu eŋe dokoine mo etkeka etkeka , matko matko ari warekoi . Eŋe zinge sari koso Yesu wano lewage more , don kisi urata kine kine makoi , so biŋek don magu edangoi , ea olatwarekoi .
41006031	Pakiso , ŋei ŋerep louloutne Yesu wano ari sari okanbi , ea wane eŋe ŋara mire nene wane numaine mi wakonge . Ea wane Yesuŋo dokoine edane rake , “ Wieu , kepe ŋeiine midaino , ari more ŋenzeka nigatne mere zonom maŋem . ”
41006032	Rakiso , eŋe kieke seki mane nigatne ma more wie kepe mane ŋei midaino enŋeneka arikoi .
41006033	Ŋo ŋei ŋerep korop eŋe mo onbi ariuso , eŋe ikopka detone more ŋadeeno mogatone taganka biririke qalakko yewa Yesu eŋine so dokoine arikoi , yewao alakane ari lotkekoi . Matne matne ŋei ŋerep korop yewa sarikoi .
41006034	Yesu eŋe seki qeliŋka ket more ŋei ŋerep magu suaine yewa one more qom borik suaine eŋane okange . Eŋe ongi maine mi metlukkoi . Eŋe medep nigatne nagamagaene seuseune , wanap yale metpi , Yesu eŋe biŋek don loutne kito ebonge .
41006035	Kepe zinge kere qoeakane okangiso dokoine eŋe Yesu wano sari rakoi , “ Ge magu iwa edane bira onnom eŋe mat osop mere arimaike . Yewao ari more ŋara maratkau , kepe iwa ŋei midaine so ruo mo kereakane okanmaike . ”
41006036	
41006037	Pakiso , Yesuŋo iwa yale edange , “ Ŋido ŋara ebonikei . ” Eŋe rakoi , “ Ŋei nau ! Ŋene 500 wesi setne eaŋo eŋane ŋara maine mi qolekene . ”
41006038	Yesu eŋe koso qeson onge . “ Ŋara darap ŋenzo metmaike ? Ari ka more sari nolatpi ! ” Raki eŋe ari ka more sari olale rakoi , “ Bret nigatne mete mane so zawon etke . ”
41006039	Yale rauso Yesuŋo dokoine edane rake , “ Ŋine ŋei ŋerep maguine maguine mapoke bira onbi pese ket touk kutno metpi . ”
41006040	Rakiso , eŋe yale ŋei ŋerep mapok onbi magu mane 100 , magu mane 50 yale mere arikoi .
41006041	Metpiso , Yesuŋo bret mete mane so zawon etke ea ma more malipka okora qeliwo potki waki mosopka more bret so zawon ea mapoke more , dokoine ebongi , damo qe ŋei ŋerep magu yewa ebonwarekoi .
41006042	Paki , ŋei ŋerep magu yewa eŋe korop neu ŋatene qeki rokop onwareke .
41006043	Paki dokoine eŋe ŋara nekoi , ea wane tutule ea qedugu more rosa 12 yale rosakkoi .
41006044	Ŋei ŋara yewa nekoi , eŋe 5 , 000 yaline .
41006045	Ikopka , Yesuŋo dokoine qebin ongi eŋe sekiwo wa more doku namuŋ nat parom Betsaida oken alakane arikoi . Ŋo eŋine yemo yewa mere ŋei ŋerep magu yewa biraongi mateno ariwarekoi .
41006046	Yesu eŋe ŋei ŋerep bira ongi korop ariwareuso , eŋe bonaga mane nigatne eao wa more meŋenka metke .
41006047	Ŋo , ruoo dokoine eŋe seki kutno doku namuŋ kebago metpi so , Yesu eŋineka tagalo metke .
41006048	Yesu eŋe ruo panaman koto dokoine ongi momoŋo qebinongi , eŋe urata suaine zok pelekoi . Paki , kepe qae qae nasoo . Yesuŋo doku namuŋ kutnoka qesokma gesokma sari osoeno lotke more , yuanoniakane okange .
41006049	Dokoine eŋe Yesu doku namuŋ kutno gesokma gesokma sariki ka more , kuroge aroke rakoi , “ Ŋei seuseune eŋane oŋaeneŋo sarimaike . ”
41006050	Eŋe enŋenarek ka more kaet suaine okangoi , pakimo , Yesu eŋe yewaka done raki paki , edane rake , “ Ŋine togoleu iwa yemo noŋom sarimaile ! Ŋine misuk kaet ŋuniake ! ”
41006051	Yale ra edane more seki kutno wa metkiso momo doŋ mangi dokoine eŋe ea ka more , oŋaene qaeki metkoi .
41006052	Eŋe Yesu wane zonomine mi detlukkakoi . So Yesu eŋe ŋei ŋerep magu suaine ŋara ebonge , ea wane eŋe deretene mi qelaŋange , eŋe dereretene zok manerop siukki qelaŋ okangoi .
41006053	Yesu eŋine so dokoine , eŋe Galili doku namuŋ yuane more , ari Genesaret lotkekoi . Galili doku namuŋ nat paromino kere kito more seki qalakko lukkakoi .
41006054	Sekiwo ŋine qelige ketpi , so mat yewa wane ŋei ŋerep eŋe ikop mo Yesu ka more detkakoi .
41006055	Eŋe Yesu wane donkisi dere more ikopka ket biririke matko matko ari zoma ŋei ŋerep zuaŋone ebu sarikoi . Ŋo natne edom numa ari ari wane konap mi okangoiwo , ea teweo pise tewekone korop Yesu wano ebu sariwarekoi .
41006056	Yesu eŋe korop mat nigatne kotino me mat suaino ari lotkemaŋke , rokop eŋe zoma ŋei ŋerep ebu sari sobeŋ keuno biraone more Yesu meŋenka ramaŋkoi , “ Zoma ŋei ŋerep iwa eŋe maine geŋane takotŋone ea uakakei . ” Rau eŋe detongi , meteene takotino ua ka more menaŋonmaŋke .
41007001	Anutu wane papa togon welaine ŋei natne , Parisi , so Anutu papa togon welaine ŋei natne , Skribe , eŋe Yerusalem ŋine sari Yesu wano lewaŋgoi .
41007002	Eŋe Yesu dokoine onbi meteene mi saukeu libe qeke , eŋe yaup ŋara ma nekoi .
41007003	Parisi so Yuda ŋei ŋerep korop eŋe aso ŋabo eŋane masi ea mogare ge okanmaŋkoi . Eŋe ŋara nekeiwane okane more aso ŋabo ra rokop don yale rake , yalewaka eŋane rokoune ma more meteene sauke more maine ne okangoi .
41007004	So nalu qole qoleo ari more zinge sari ŋara nekeiwane okane more eŋe doku tau more ne okangoi . Eŋe kine kine natne aso ŋabo eŋane masi ea korop mogare okan waremaŋkoi . Eŋe lase , kap ŋara mire ne , so kulu papa wane kine kine korop sauke mauluke gemaŋkoi .
41007005	Eŋe Yesu qesonka rakoi , “ Onoka wane dokoŋone eŋe asoŋabo eŋane numa tego ea mi mogatmami . Eŋe meteene mi sauke more ŋara yaup ma nemami . ”
41007006	Rauso , eŋe iwa yale edange , “ Isaiaŋo ŋine isi ŋei zok ŋidorake , ŋinane kineŋine papiao iwa yale Anutu wane dongo qeke pamaike . ‘ Anutuŋo rake , Ŋei tego yewa eŋe pieneŋoka naŋane eŋetne nora bukeu waokanmaike . Ŋo , wet derereteneŋo yemo na qeliŋnane more , amaŋ okoramami .
41007007	Eŋe nae yaup eŋetneka nora bukeu waokanmaike . Eŋe aso ŋabo eŋane numa tego yewa kito ebone more raokanmami , iwa Anutu wane don . ’ ”
41007008	Yesu eŋe koso edane rake , “ Ŋine Anutu wane don masi koboboine mo qeligeu siuk ŋunmaike ? Pakimo , ŋine ŋei ŋinŋine aso ŋabo eŋane don eaka malipka gemami . ”
41007009	Yesu eŋe koso edange , “ Ŋine zok detluke more Anutu wane don koboboine ea matali qetali okane more ŋinŋine asoŋabo eŋane numa tego malipka gemami .
41007010	Moseŋo sogino qei bano mo rake , ‘ Ŋine nabok magak ere qesiŋore more geokanikei , Ŋo , ŋei mane eŋe nabok magak don borikine etaniakeo , eŋe qeu seukeake . ’
41007011	Ŋo , ŋine , Anutu wane papa togon welaine ŋei , ŋei ŋerep masi kine mane iwa yale edanmami . Ŋei mane eŋe wesiinerop nagamagaine qesiŋ osiakane okane , ŋo , siluŋ etane raokanmaike , na mo Anutu wane biŋek qile .
41007012	Ŋine yale edanbi , eŋe naga magaene mi qesiŋone more , qeliŋ onmaŋkei .
41007013	Ŋine ŋinŋine asoŋabo kito ebo ebon ŋei ŋerep ea edanmami , ŋine Anutu wane don zonomine mau kito okanmaike . Ŋine kine kine loutne yalewa ma okanmami . ”
41007014	Yesu eŋe koso ŋei ŋerep magu suaine edoraki sariu edange , “ Ŋine koropŋo naŋane don iwa dere more wetŋineŋo motpi so detlukkeu .
41007015	Ŋine detmami , kine kine iwa diinerop ŋadino pamaike , eaŋo ŋinane kotoŋine mi maki sigileake . Ŋo kine kine natne ŋinane wet dereretŋine kotino pamaike , eaŋo saket more maki wet dereretŋine korop sigile okanmaike .
41007016	Ŋei mane eŋe wetineropŋo don iwa detlukkeake .
41007017	Yale ra more eŋe ŋei ŋerep yewa qeliŋone more eŋine so dokoine eŋe ari mat maneo wa more don rokop rake yewa wane kine desikeiwane qesonkakoi . ”
41007018	Yesu eŋe iwa yale edange , “ Ŋinane dereretŋineŋo ŋei ŋerep natne eŋane dereret mi yuan onmaike . Ŋara kine kine korop pamaike , eaŋo ne more ŋei ŋerep mi sigilekene .
41007019	Ŋara yewa wet dereretŋine mi qeduguyake . Ŋara qomŋino ket more koso kaŋinoka saket ariake . ” Iwa yale Yesu eŋe ŋara kine kine yewa eŋe korop Anutu wane kaitko libekaka pamaike .
41007020	Pakiso , eŋe rake , “ Kine kine ŋei wet dereret kotino pamaike , eaŋo saket more maki ŋei ŋerep wet dereretŋine korop sigile okanmaike .
41007021	Ŋei ŋerep wet dereretko pa more saket maki ŋei ŋerep dirop okan okanmaine yemo iwa , edo dereret qotkoine detokanmami , so ŋei ŋerep natewen qaluwit wenip yauyaup ma okanmami , so ŋei naka pilaŋŋo engu mamami me kine kineŋo matalionbi seuke okanmami , kobu ma okanmami ,
41007022	ŋei mane eŋe ŋei mane wane ŋanomine kobu ma okanmaike , bailalaŋ okan okanmami . Ŋine masi tanik kine kine natne korop okan okanmami , isi kine kine ma okanmami , wawaine masi kine kine okan okanmami , bau wawa masi kine kine ma okanmami , qe baik ma baik don ra okanmami , wawaine don kine kine ra okanmami , doku togole ne more qelaŋ qelaŋine okan numa kine kine mau bori okanmaike .
41007023	Masi tanik kine kine qotkoine korop iwaŋo ŋei ŋerep wet dereretko pa more eaŋo saket maki ŋei ŋerep dienerop okan okanmami . ”
41007024	Yesu eŋe yewa qelige ea ŋine wie Tire matko ari lotke more , mat mane wane kotino ari waket siuke metke , onoka wane ŋei ŋerep edo esatka eŋano mi sari lewaŋgei wane . Ŋo siluŋ dalino siuke metkirap .
41007025	Mida ! Ŋerep mane mat yewa ŋine eŋe Yesu mo detkaki metke . Ŋerep yewa eŋe borasine asu qotkoineŋo matalikaki metke , ea wane ŋerep yewa eŋe ikopka sari Yesu wane osino kino ket pese wawetine qeke .
41007026	Ŋerep yewa eŋe tego maneo ŋine , qelaŋ ŋerep , eŋe Yuda wane tegooŋine mida . Eŋe Ponisia tegoo ŋine , kepe mat ea wane welaine , eamo Siria kepeo . Eŋe Yesu wano ari seleleine qe meŋenka more rake , “ Borasone asu qotkoineŋo matalikaki metmaike . Ge esopkanom ! ”
41007027	Yesu eŋe olale rake , “ Ŋene mikepka medep ŋara gumeonŋem . Ŋene medep eŋane ŋara maine mi biraŋem kasimde eŋano ariake . ”
41007028	Yale rakiso , ŋerep eŋe mainge rake , “ Waom , ge don wele ramaine , ŋo medep eŋe ŋara ne okanmami , naso yewao sisine kepo ketki kasi eŋe medep eŋane ŋara sisine ea ma ne okanmaŋkei . ”
41007029	Pakiso , Yesu eŋe ŋerep olatke , “ Ge yale ramaine , ea wane maine zinge arinom borasoŋone asu qotkoine ea mo qeliŋ kamaike . ”
41007030	Yale ra olatki , ŋerep eŋe zinge matko ari kaki borasine ea asu qotkoineŋo mo welekatne qeliŋka saket ariki eŋe maine papaino kulu pake .
41007031	Yesu eŋe wie Tire qelige more Sidon kepe so Mat Suaine Meteetke ( 10 ) kepe keuoka ratoke ari Galili doku namugo lotkeke .
41007032	Ŋei natne eŋe ŋei mane done mi raraine so ketine won wole ea Yesu wano iwenka sari oŋo metine more ma menaŋ kayakane olatkoi .
41007033	Pakiso , Yesu eŋe ŋei yewa maki eretneka ŋei ŋerep magu yewa qeliŋone amaŋ ari mere so Yesuŋo ŋei yewa wane ketino metine boineŋo qesikane more , mekatine boino sopotke belakamino motke .
41007034	More so qeliwo potki waki wetine aroke saki , rake , “ Epata ! ” Don ea wane kine iwa yale . “ Ketŋone so aŋaŋone lotkeuk ! ”
41007035	Yale raki ŋei yewa dereretine lotkeki korop detkake . So belakamine umareke , ea ewekki don maine rake .
41007036	Yesu eŋe sari ŋei ŋerep magu yewa rawetone more rake , “ Masi iwa mamaile , ea wane don sigi misuk rau sua ariake . ” Yale ra naso baŋem rawetone okanmaŋke , ŋo , eŋe soringe takotke eŋane don sigi rau sua arimaŋke .
