41007037	Ŋei ŋerep korop eŋe oŋaene qaeki rakoi , “ Urata kine kine natne welekatne wakonmaike . Ŋo , Yesu eŋe ŋei ketine won wole ea maki lotkeki don detlukmaike . So eŋe ŋei aŋaine umatne so mawon mawole , ea maki don ramaike . ”
41008001	Naso yewao ŋei ŋerep magu suaine natne eŋe Yesu wano koso lewaŋgoi , ŋo , ŋaraene mo korop midaonge , Yesu eŋe dokoine edoraki sariu edange ,
41008002	“ Na ŋei ŋerep magu suaine iwa eŋane qom borik suaine detmaile , eŋe zok kaiwe mama karewe naerop metpi ŋaraene mo midamaike .
41008003	Ŋo , eŋe ŋara mi nene yaup metpi , na biraonbe arikeiwo , natne eŋe ari more numao deene lolikki ket rasukei . Natne eŋe matene ameŋine sarikoi . ”
41008004	Dokoine eŋe eŋane don mainge rakoi , “ Kepe iwa ŋeiine midaine , ge detmaine ŋene ŋara diaoŋine ŋei ŋerep iwa ma ebonŋem neu rokoponiake ? ”
41008005	Yale rauso , Yesu eŋe qeson one rake , “ Ŋinano bret darap metmaike ? ” Raki , eŋe maratka more rakoi , “ Bret mete mane so mete natko zitne etke ( 7 ) metmaike . ”
41008006	Olatpiso , Yesu eŋe ŋei ŋerep edane rake , “ Ŋine korop pese ket kepo metpi . ” Raki eŋe korop pese metpiso , eŋine bret mete mane so mete natko zitne etke ( 7 ) , yewa ma more , Anutu wano bakom kito mosopka more mapoke dokoine ebongi edo damo qe ŋei ŋerep magu suaine yewa korop ebonwarekoi .
41008007	Ŋo , eŋe zawon nigatne karewe metke , ea weneŋ manbiso eŋe yalewaka Anutu bakom kito more mosopka dokoine ebongi , eŋe yale waka damo qe korop magu yewa ebonwarekoi .
41008008	Eŋe neu rokop ongiso , Yesu dokoine eŋe ŋara tutule yewa rosa 7 yale rosakkoi .
41008009	Ŋei ŋerep magu yewa eŋe 4 , 000ŋo metkoi .
41008010	Yesu eŋe ŋei ŋerep magu yewa biraongi , ariu , eŋine so dokoine ikopka sekiwo wa more Dalimanutia kepeo arikoi .
41008011	Ea ari lotkeuso Anutu wane papa togon welaine ŋei natne , Parisi , eŋe sari Yesu wano aŋa soraŋ don okane more Yesu qesonka rakoi , “ Ge masi togole mane ma sikanŋonnom kaŋem , ge Anutu wano ŋine sarimaine . ” Eŋe yale ra more dongo liwekkaikei wane okangoi .
41008012	Yesu eŋe rake , “ Oo yai ! Onoka wane ŋei ŋerep eŋe naso iwao noŋo masi togogole mane mawe kaikeiwane sari ramami ? Midakaka ! Naso iwa noŋo masi togogole mane koso ŋei ŋerep ŋinano mi ma sikan ŋunikale . ”
41008013	Yesu eŋe yale edane more eŋine so dokoine eŋe mat yewa qelige sekiwo wa more doku namuŋ kitare eri nat parom arikoi .
41008014	Yesu dokoine eŋe bret natne weneŋ mi makoi . Eŋe nigetongi yaup sekiwo wa arikoi . Bret weku seki kotino pake .
41008015	Yesu eŋe ea wane girem don togole edane rake , “ Ŋine Anutu wane papa togon welaine ŋei , Parisi eŋane tego so Herot eŋane masi kauluk onikei . Eŋe bret maki sua okanmaike . Eŋane masi eaŋo yalewa ŋei korop rokoponmaike . ”
41008016	Dokoine eŋe don yale dere more , eŋe enŋene auye rakoi , “ Bret eri nigetŋongi qelige sarine , eŋe ea wane mane ramaike . ”
41008017	Rau , Yesu eŋe don yewa dere more edange , “ Ŋine onoka wane ŋinŋine aumami , ŋene bret mida ? Oo , ŋine wet dereretŋine midaine ? Oo ŋine dereretŋine mo wongike .
41008018	Ŋine deŋine weneŋ , ŋine onoka wane kine kine mi kamami me ? Ŋine ketŋinerop onoka wane don yewa wane kine mi detkamami me ? Ŋine mo nigetŋunikei me ?
41008019	Naso na bret mete mane mapoke , 5 tausen ( 5,000 ) ŋei ŋerep eŋano ŋibonbe damo qekoi , naso yewao ŋado neu , wokitne metki ŋine rosa darap rosakkoi ? ” Eŋe rakoi , “ Rosa 12 ! ”
41008020	Eŋe yale raumo , Yesu eŋe koso qesononge , “ Ŋo ŋine na bret 7 mapoke , ŋei ŋerep 4 , 000 eŋano ŋibonbe , damo qe ebongoi , naso yewao eŋe neu , wokitne metki ŋine rosa darap rosakkoi ? ” Eŋe rakoi , “ Rosa sewen . ”
41008021	Rau , Yesu eŋe yewaka edange , “ Ŋine zok ea mi detlukkamami me ? ”
41008022	Pakiso , eŋe ari Betsaida lotkeu , ŋei mane deine pilik pilikine , eŋe Yesu wano ma sarikoi , ŋei ea eŋe Yesuŋo metine lewetino mosiakane .
41008023	Pakiso , Yesu eŋe ŋei de pilik yewa metino maki , ere mat ŋadino qeinat ket more , Yesuŋo ŋei yewa deino mekatine sopotke more , so metineŋo deino qesikane rake , “ Ge maine pore kine kine kamaine me ? ”
41008024	Rakiso , ŋei yewa eŋe pore lolike more rake , “ Na ŋei natne pore onmaile . Na onbe eki yale arimami . ”
41008025	Yesu eŋe metineŋo koso ŋei yewa wano motki , ŋei yewa eŋe deine togoleka pore kaki , deine mo maine wakongi , pore kine kine korop ka qelaŋange .
41008026	Pakiso , Yesu eŋe ŋei yewa olale biraka rake , “ Ge kere more eri mat suaino misuk wakesikene . Ge koboboine ari matŋono lotkekene . ”
41008027	Yesu eŋine so dokoine eŋe yewa ŋine wie arimage mat natne Sisaria Pilipai osino lotkekoi , numa keuno dokoine qesononge , “ Ŋei ŋerep eŋe na wamo ma noramami ? ”
41008028	Edo iwa yale olatkoi , “ Natne edo ge Yohane doku tau tau goramami . Ŋo , natne edo ge Elaiya goramami . Ŋo , natne edo ramami , ge Anutu wane qelit ŋei propet mane sogine gekoi , eŋano ŋine . ”
41008029	Yale rauso , koso enŋene qesonone rake , “ Ŋo , ŋidom yemo naŋane dalino ramami ? ” Rakiso Petoroŋo donine turuŋine mainge olale rake , “ Ge Mesia , Anutuŋo biragange . ”
41008030	Yale rakiso , eŋe togoleka ra wetone rake , “ Ŋine naŋane kine yewa ŋei mane misuk olasikei . ”
41008031	Yesu eŋe kieke more , eŋine solaino wikile wakoniake ea wane dokoine kito edane more rake , “ Ŋei Wawainane Gipole na wikile zok manerop peikkale . Ŋei ŋetne korop so Anutu wane mosop ŋei suaine so Anutu wane papa togon welaine ŋei , Skribe , eŋe korop ŋadeknane more , nekuwi seukkale , kaiwe mama karewe yale pa more , koso wisikae wiekale . ”
41008032	Yesu eŋe yale ra qelaŋane edangi , Petoro eŋe Yesu maki ere qeinat ket mere more Yesu rawetka rake , “ Ŋei eŋe ge mi gekukei . ”
41008033	Ŋo , Yesu eŋe zinge pore dokoine one more Petoro rawetka rake , “ Ŋei borikine , ge na ŋadeno arinom ! Goŋo weti Anutu wane wet dereret mi detmaine ! Midaka ! Ge kepe ŋei wet so dereret eaka dere gemaine ! ”
41008034	Yesu eŋe eŋine dokoine so ŋei ŋerep magu korop edoraki eŋane osino sariu , iwa yale edange , “ Ŋinano ŋine ŋei maneŋo na mogat naniakane raso , eŋine simileine ea korop maki ketwarekiso wikile desiakane eweke ariki eŋe na nekukei , yalewaka eŋe qekei .
41008035	Ŋei mane eŋe wikilane kaetkaki solaine mawalukayakeo , eŋe gege wane numaine korop siuklukkayake . Ŋo , ŋei mane eŋe biŋek don wane so nae wane wetkeake , paki gegeine korop qikka more , ea waneka ra more seukeake , ŋei yewa eŋe gege marat kayake .
41008036	Ŋo , ŋei mane eŋe kepe wane aboŋ kine kine korop magekeo , eŋe seuke more onoka maratkayake ? Midakaka !
41008037	Seuke more koso onokakaŋo gege wane lewine qeliŋgi sari maniake ?
41008038	Ukude naso iwao kepe iwa wane ŋei ŋerep korop masi qotkoine kine kineŋo mau watke rokopkemaike . So eŋe wawaine masi kine kine ea korop Anutu wane deo okanwaremami . Ŋei mane eŋe naso iwao ŋei ŋerep magu yewa eŋane keueno ŋine eŋe nae so naŋane biŋek don rayakane gamu gamu okane geakeo , na Ŋei Wawainane Gipoleŋo ramaile , na ŋado Anutuŋo eŋine tungo biranangi , aŋelo magu eŋerop qeli qeliŋka sarikene , naso yewao na ŋei yewa don koboine maine mi olasikale . ”
41009001	Yesu eŋe koso don takotke iwa yale edange , “ Na welekatne ŋidanmaile , ŋei natne ŋine iwa okoramami , mi seuke more wisika gekei , naso eao Anutuŋo ŋine korop wareŋunmaike , eao Anutuŋo qeli ewe zonominerop wakongi kaikei . ”
41009002	Kaiwe mama 6 qoikiso , Yesu eŋe Petoro , Yakop so Yohane ebuki enŋeneka bonaga mane kiroroine wetika weti yewao wakoi . Wa enŋeneka okorauso , eŋane deeno eaka Yesu wane kait sola tanikine qeinge more kine mane okange .
41009003	Laplap kine kine korop libe libe qe qelaŋane teine okange . Kepe ŋei maneŋo okangi , eŋane laplap yale libe libe qelaŋane teine mi okaniake , so sauki yalewa maine mi wakoniake .
41009004	Dokoine eŋe pore otpi ŋabotkine Elia so Mose ere wakone more Yesurop don auye okorakoi .
41009005	Petoro eŋe ea ka more ikopka Yesu olale rake , “ Kito ŋebon ŋebon ! Ŋene iwa metŋem wekumane zok okanmaike . Ŋene maine seli kise karewe ( 3 ) maikene ! Mane geŋane , mane Mose wane , mane Elia wane ! ”
41009006	Petoro eŋine so kimatkine eŋe kaet zok okangoi . Ea wane Petoro eŋe masi tanik yewa wane kine mi detluke more don qazaŋ rake .
41009007	Paki , eaka wakongi paki , kezoŋŋo ŋei karewe korop kawetongi so Anutu aŋaineŋo kezoŋ koto ŋine iwa yale rake , “ Yewa naŋane wemedep wekuku ! Na wetneŋo malipkamaile . Ŋine korop eŋane don desikei ! ”
41009008	Don yale wakongi dere more so dokoine eŋe ikopka deene pore lolike ŋei mane mi kakoi . Yesu eŋineka eŋerop okoraki , kakoi .
41009009	Eŋe bonaga qeliŋka ket more , Yesu eŋe dokoine togogole rawetone rake , “ Kine kine iwa wakongi kamami , ea wane ŋei ŋerep siron misuk ra qelaŋan onikei . Baŋ , na Ŋei Wawainane Gipoleŋo , deŋesereo ŋine wiekale , naso yewao maine ra qelaŋan onikei . ”
41009010	Eŋe don ea dere teweke more enŋene auye rakoi , “ Don yewa deŋesereo ŋine wie wie ea kine dalino wane ramaike . ”
41009011	Ra more eŋe koso Yesu qesonka rakoi , “ Dalino wane Anutu papa togon welaine ŋei , Skribe , eŋe ra okanmami , qelit ŋei , Elaiya eŋe alakane sari more , numa kine kine makoboeake ? ”
41009012	Yesu eŋe dokoine karewe eŋane don mainge rake , “ Na ŋidanmaile . Elia eŋe mo sariki , ŋei eŋe enŋene simileene mogare more masi tanik kine kine zok okankakoi . Yale Anutu wane papa togon donŋo mo rake .
41009013	Skribe eŋane don ea i welekatne . Elaiyaŋo mikep sari more , eŋine kine kine mo mauluk wareke . Ŋo , donba iwa yale onoka wane mo sogino Anutu wane papa togon dongo qekoi pamaike ? Eŋe ramaike Ŋei Wawainane Gipole eŋe wikile zok mayake , so ŋei edo manerop ma baikkaikei . ”
41009014	Eŋe ea ŋine ket sari dokoine natne metkoi , eŋe onbi ŋei ŋerep magu suaine edo eŋano lewage lolikone mere more Anutu papa togon welaine ŋei , Skribe , eŋe dokoine eŋerop don auye kitat okangoi .
41009015	Paki , ŋei ŋerep magu yewa eŋe kau , Yesu sariki eŋe korop qomene qise poradaŋgi biririke Yesu osino ari more kaiwe maine mangoi .
41009016	Yale rau , Yesu eŋe dokoine qesonone rake , “ Ŋine onoka wane don auye kitat okanmami ? ”
41009017	Yale qesonongi , ŋei ŋerep magu yewa eŋane keueno ŋine maneŋo wie rake , “ Kito ebon ebon na medepne mane asu qotkoineŋo kotino mere aŋaine ma won geki , ea wane na geŋano ma sarimaile .
41009018	Naso baŋem asu qotkoine yewaŋo medep iwa togoleka ma main qein ma birakaki kepo ket rasu paki , mekalekatine libeka aŋainoka saket qakki ŋetine paŋ kilipke more solaine korop togo togon qe okanmaike . Na , ea wane dokoŋone edanbe edo asu qotkoine yewa osop kaikei wane ŋaŋaemami . ”
41009019	Yesu eŋe don yewa dere more , ŋei ŋerep edane rake , “ Ŋei ŋerep magu iwa ŋine korop mali malip ŋine mida ! Na naso darap ŋinerop gekale ? Na naso baŋem yalewa ŋinerop ge more , umat kine kine ŋine qesiŋŋune okangale me ? Ayop ŋine medep yewa naŋano ma sariu ! ”
41009020	Eŋe medep yewa eŋano ma ariu asu qotkoine eŋe Yesu ka more medep yewa main qein ma birakaki kepo ket kito todi todiŋ ariki mekalekatine libeka aŋainoka saket qakke .
41009021	Yesu eŋe medep magaine qesonka rake , “ Naso darap eŋe iwa yale okankaki geke ? ” Magaine eŋe rake , “ Mo medepinoka yale okankaki naso kiroine gesake .
41009022	Naso louloutne asu qotkoine eaŋo qeakane ma birakaki ari gerep kutno wa okanmaŋke . Naso natno ma birakaki ari doku koto ket okanmaŋke . Ge ŋaŋaekamaine ? Ge ŋenane wet borik okane more ŋene qesiŋ ŋonikene . ”
41009023	Yesu eŋe olatke , “ Ge onoka wane qesonnane ramaine , ge ŋaŋaemaine ? Ŋei mane eŋe mali malip togole malipkayakeo , eŋano kine kine korop maine mawe wakonwarekei . ”
41009024	Medep magaine ikopka boka rake , “ Na ge malip ganmaile . Ŋo na mali malipne togole mida . Ge siluŋ maine mapitnanikene ! ”
41009025	Yesu eŋe ongi , ŋei ŋerep magu suaine eŋe sari lewaŋgoi . Ea wane eŋe asu qotkoine ea togoleka boka olatke , “ Asu qotkoine ket rasu aŋaŋone ma won genom , na ge golatmaile , ge medep yewa qeliŋkanom ! Ge ari more koso mi zinge sari eŋano wakesikene . ”
41009026	Yale ra olatki asu qotkoine ea eŋe togoleka boka aroke medep yewa togoleka rapapkaki , kepeo ket pakiso saket arike . Medep eŋe seuseune yale pake , ŋei ŋerep korop eŋe rakoi , “ Mo seukmaike . ”
41009027	Eŋe yale rau , Yesu eŋe medep yewa metino ma more buke qesiŋkaki eŋe wie maine okorake .
41009028	Yesu eŋe yale okane more matko waki , dokoine eŋe enŋeneka san qesonka rakoi , “ Ŋene dalino wane asu qotkoine ea esop kaikenane ŋaŋaine ? ”
41009029	Pakiso , Yesu eŋe edange , “ Kine kine natneŋo asu qotkoine ea maine mi esopkayake . Meŋe meŋen wekuŋo maine esopkayake . ”
41009030	Yesu eŋine so dokoine mat yewa qelige more Galili kepe keuoka rapoke arikoi . Ŋei ŋerep edo mi det kaikei wane eŋe sanka ket arikoi .
41009031	Eŋe enŋeneka ari mere more dokoine kito eboniake , ea wane . Pakiso , dokoine enŋeneka don iwa yale edange , “ Ŋei edo Ŋei Wawainane Gipole , ŋei ŋaba eŋane meteeno birakakei . Edo qeu seukeake . Eŋe seuke more kaiwe mama karewe yale pa more baŋ koso wisikae wieyake . ”
41009032	Yesu eŋe don yale ra edangi , eŋe don yewa wane kine detpi mi qelaŋanongi eŋe koso qesonka detlukkeiwane , kaetonge .
41009033	Eŋe ari Kaperneam mat suaino lotke more mat maneo wa mere Yesuŋo dokoine qesonone rake , “ Ŋine numao sari more onokaka don auye kitat nagu okanimi ? ”
41009034	Yale ra qesonongi , eŋe donene midaki metkoi . Onoka wane eŋe numao iwa yale ra auye sarikoi . Tego iwa ŋenano ŋine maŋo ŋetneze okanmaike .
41009035	Yesu eŋe ket pese mere more dokoine 12 ea edoraki sari osino metpi edane rake , “ Ŋei mane eŋe ŋetne okaniakane okane more , eŋe qei ŋado kito more ŋei korop eŋane qelit qeqe okaniake . ”
41009036	Yale ra more , medep mane nigatne ea ma sari qeki keueno okoraki , masatka okora edane rake ,
41009037	“ Ŋei mane eŋe naŋane tungo medep nigatne iwa yale mapitkayakeo , eŋe na mapitnanmaike okanmaike . Ŋei mane eŋe na mapitnaniakeo , eŋe magak biranangi ketkole , eŋe weneŋ mapitkamaike okanmaike . ”
41009038	Pakiso , Yohaneŋo olale rake , “ Kito ŋebo ŋebon ! Ŋene kaŋem ŋei maneŋo geŋane eŋetko ra asu qotkoine esopkamaike . Pakimo , eŋe ŋenane ŋadezo mi mogatŋone sarikimo ŋene ra wetkamaine . ”
41009039	Yesuŋo Yohane olatke , “ Ŋine mi rawetkau ! Ŋei mane eŋe naŋane eŋetko masi mane togogole mayakeo , eŋe don borikine naŋane ikopka maine ŋei ŋerep mi edaniake .
41009040	Ŋei mane eŋe ŋene mi ŋabaŋonmaike , ea eŋe ŋenane kimaze okanmaike .
41009041	Naso ŋine doku wane seukeu , ŋei mane eŋe ŋine ŋune more detŋuniake , Yesu wane dokoine , yale dere more doku ore ŋibongi nekeiwo , na welegatne ŋidanmaile . Ŋei yewa eŋe lewine manikale .
41009042	“ Medep nigatne iwa eŋe mali malipine naŋano pamaike . Ea ŋei maneŋo mataliakeo , Anutuŋo ŋei yewa wikile suaine maniake .
41009043	Ŋo , meteŋoneŋo qe isigangi , mali malipŋone matalikeneo , ge meteŋone nat kitare biranom ariki , meteŋone natka qeliwo wa gege maratkaikene . Ŋo , ge meteŋone nat mi kitare more etkeka gekeneo , ge sola so oŋaoŋa weneŋ gerep sora qoiqoine midaine yewao kesikene .
41009044	Gerep ea wane koma komaineŋo ŋei ŋerep edore more mi seukkei . So gerep yewa ŋei ŋerep ezo more mi komayake . So ŋei ŋerep mi seukkei , eŋane wikile pa wayake .
41009045	Ŋo ge kieŋoneŋo isigangi , mali malipŋone matalikeneo , ge kieŋone nat kitare biranom ariake , ge kieŋone natka qeliwo wa gege maratkaikene . Ŋo , ge kieŋone nat mi kitare more etkeka gekeneo , ge sola so oŋaoŋa weneŋ gerep sora qoiqoine midaine yewao kesikene .
41009046	Gerep ea wane koma komaineŋo ŋei ŋerep edore more mi seukkei . So gerep yewa ŋei ŋerep ezo more mi komayake . So ŋei ŋerep mi seukkei eŋane wikile pa wayake .
41009047	Ŋo , deŋoneŋo isigangi , mali malipŋone matalikeneo , ge maine deŋone nat qe koko porike biranom ariake , ge deŋone natka maine Anutuŋo wareŋoniake kepe yewa maratkaikene . Ŋo , ge deŋone nat mi qe koko porike more etkeka gekeneo , ge sola so oŋaoŋa weneŋ gerep sora qoiqoine midaine yewao kesikene .
41009048	Gerep ea wane koma komaineŋo ŋei ŋerep edore more mi seukkei . So gerep yewa ŋei ŋerep ezo more mi komayake . So ŋei ŋerep mi seukkei , eŋane wikile pa wayake .
41009049	“ Sogino Yuda ŋei ŋerep eŋe Anutu wane bakom soep korop kiwetŋo kutno mot okangoi . Yalewaka , Anutu eŋe gerepŋo ŋei ŋerep korop kuteno motki ezoyake .
41009050	“ Kiwet wekumane . Ŋo , eŋane zonomine midayakeo , ge maine koso mi manom zonominerop okaniake . “ Kotoŋine peamine pakep . Peamŋo gegeze maki togole pakep . Ge ŋei ŋerep korop eŋerop kima geokanikene . ”
41010001	Yesu eŋe wie ea qelige more , Yuda kepe wane nat paromino ari more Yordan doku kitare arike . Ŋei ŋerep magu suaine eŋe koso sari eŋano lewageuso eŋe okane okanmageake yale mogare Anutu wane biŋek don edange .
41010002	Edangiso , Anutu papa togon welaine ŋei , Parisi , eŋe sari Yesu liwekkaikei wane rakoi , “ Ge ranom ! Ŋenze ra rokop donze eaŋo ramaike , ŋei mane eŋe maine ŋanomine esopkayake , me mida ? ”
41010003	Yesu eŋe donene mainge qesonone rake , “ Sogino , Moseŋo ra rokop don daleo ŋibonge . ”
41010004	Eŋe mainge rakoi , “ Mose eŋe rake , ŋei mane eŋe ŋanomine esopkayakane okane more , maine kibi mane qe more kibi yewa kot ŋei eŋano more , maine ŋanomine esopkayake . ”
41010005	Yesuŋo edane rake , “ Ŋine so ŋinane aso ŋabokopŋine ŋinŋine wawaine ŋinane Mose eŋe ŋinane ra rokop don yewa qeke .
41010006	Moka sogino Anutu eŋe kine kine ma wakonwareke , naso yewao yale mi rake . Anutu papa togon don iwa yale qeke paki , ‘ Anutuŋo ŋei so ŋerep ma wakonore more biraotke . ’
41010007	So , ‘ Ŋei eŋe ŋerep mayakane okane more eŋe nagamagaine qeliŋore more ŋanominerop qeturage more , weku okangeik .
41010008	Ere ŋao ŋanom okane more , solaetne qeduguwik , weku okangi gekeik . ’
41010009	Anutuŋo don yale ra more ŋaoŋanom maturaŋ otke . Ŋeiŋo maine mi mapokosikei . ”
41010010	Matko zinge ari more , dokoine eŋe koso ea wane qesonkakoi .
41010011	Eŋe iwa yale edange , “ Ŋei mane eŋe ŋanomine qeliŋka more ŋerep mane mayakeo , eŋe ŋanomine qeliŋka more , sot maratkayake , so ŋei ea bailalaŋ urata mayake .
41010012	Ŋo ŋerep eŋe yaleka ŋaone qeliŋka more , ari ŋei mane mayakeo , eŋe ŋaonano qeliŋka more , sot maratkayake , so ŋerep ea eŋe yaleka bailalaŋ urata mayake . ”
41010013	Ŋei ŋerep eŋe dokoene Yesuŋo metineŋo kuteno more mosop oniakane ra more eŋano ebu sariu , dokoine edo don okanongoi .
41010014	Yesu eŋe dokoine edo masi yale okanbi one more wet gerep okane more edane rake , “ Ŋine misuk ma walukonbi ! Qeliŋonbi ! Medep nigatne ea naŋane osono maine sariu ! Anutu eŋe ŋei ŋerep medep nigatne iwa yaline eŋane rokopko wareoniakane siminkamaike .
41010015	Na welekatne ŋidane ramaile . Medep nigatne eŋe Anutuŋo wareoniakane siminonmaike . Ŋo ŋei natne eŋe Anutuŋo wareoniakane mi siminonmaikeo , eŋe Anutu wane ware ware kepeo mi wakesikei . ”
41010016	Yale ra more medep nigatne yewa edoka ebu okora metine kuteno more mosoponge .
41010017	Yesu eŋe wie yewa qelige ariki numao ŋei mane eŋe biririke sari Yesu wane osino pese ket kino wawetine qe more qesonka rake , “ Kito ŋebo ŋebon , maepne . Na dalino okane more naso baŋem gege togon maratka geokanikale ? ”
41010018	Yale raki , Yesuŋo olatke , “ Ge na mayakatne onoka wane noramaine ? Anutu wekuŋo mayakatne so eŋe wekuŋo koboboine .
41010019	Ge Anutu wane papa togon don detmaine . Ge ŋei mane mi qenom seukeake . Ŋire ŋaoŋanom mi biranagukeik so ŋei me ŋerep mane misuk maikeik . Ge kobu mi maikene . Ge ŋei mane mi ma baikkaikene . Ge ŋei mane mi isikaikene . Ge nabok magak erane bango ge more erane don dereretkoka ge okanikene . ”
41010020	Ŋei yewa eŋe rake , “ Kito ŋebo ŋebon , na mo medepnoka tego yewa mane mi yuankakole . Mo korop okane gesakole gemaile iwa . ”
41010021	Yesu eŋe ka more eŋane simile dere more olatke , “ Ge kine kine weku mi okanine . Ea makoboenom , ge ari more wesi aboŋŋone korop ea ma more ŋei aboŋene midaine eŋe sunonikene . Sunone more yalinane baŋ gege togon mat marat kaikene . Pakiso geŋone sari ŋadeno mogatnane sarikene . ”
41010022	don yale dere more , ŋei yewa eŋe kaitine bori more zok manerop zoileke , so qomine umareki , qelige arike , onoka wane , ŋo eŋe aboŋine zok manerop umatne pamangane , eŋe yale okane so eŋe yeine qelige arike .
41010023	Ŋei yewa eŋe ariki , Yesuŋo zinge pore lolike dokoine one edane rake , “ Ŋei yaline wesi aboŋene suaine , eŋe Anutu wane qeli ewe zonom koto wakesikei wane rau , eŋe zok umareake , so eŋe zok urata suaine ma more aboŋene qeliŋkamami . ”
41010024	Dokoine eŋe don yale raki dere poradageu , Yesu eŋe koso edane rake , “ Oo dokone , ŋei ŋerep eŋe Anutu wane qeli ewe zonom kotino wakesikei wane rau paki , eŋe urata suaine maikei !
41010025	Kamel eŋe samap wane aŋaone wakesikei wane ea urata suaine zok mi okaniake . Ŋo , baliŋa ŋei eŋe Anutu wane qeli ewe zonom koto wake waket , eŋe urata suaine zok manerop ma more aboŋine qeliŋkamaike . ”
41010026	Dokoine eŋe eŋane don dere more oŋaene qaeki enŋeneka auye qesonnagu rakoi , “ Ge ramaine , Anutuŋo baliŋa ŋei mi wareoniake , yale okangi , ŋei ŋerep ketkele gemami , eŋe Anutuŋo mi wareoniake . ”
41010027	Eŋe yale rauso , Yesu eŋe deenoka pore one okora rake , “ Kepeo ŋei ŋerep ŋine ŋaŋaemami . Ŋo Anutu wekuŋo eŋe mi ŋaŋaemaike . Anutu eŋe kine kine korop mawareakane , eŋe maine mi qekayake . ”
41010028	Petoro eŋe don mane Yesu olale rake , “ Detmaine ! Ŋene kine kine kakize mo korop qeliŋkaware more ge mogatgangone , ge ŋene detŋonmaine . ”
41010029	Yesuŋo rake , “ Na don wele ŋidanmaile . Ŋei mane eŋe naŋane dere more biŋek don qesiŋnane rasuakeiwane ra more matene , me tarekop , ŋon , qa , kiaro , me nabok , magak , kepe , medep , qeliŋkawareone sari na mogatnaniakeo ,
41010030	Ea wane turuŋine Anutuŋo zok manerop makoke maniake . Naso iwa yaleo yemo eŋe kepe , mat , ŋon , qa , tarekop , kiaro , me nabok , magak , medep , korop maratkayake . Ŋei edo ŋei yewa wikile wakile takotke maratkaikei . Baŋ naso kutno eŋe gege togon maratka geake .
41010031	Ŋei loutne ukude tego lewine okoramami . Eŋe naso kutno mawe tego ŋadino kesikei . Ŋo ŋei loutne ukude tego ŋadino okoramami , eŋe naso kutno mawe tego lewine waikei . ”
41010032	Yesu eŋine so dokoine Yerusalem arikei wane arikoi . Yesu eŋe alakane ariki dokoine eŋe dere mezet okangoi . So ŋei ŋerep magu ŋadeeno arikoi . Eŋe kaetonge , Yesu eŋe dokoine 12 yewa koso ebu qeduguone more , eŋine ariki masi tanik kine kine solaino wakonkayake ea wane kieke edange .
41010033	Eŋe rake , “ Detmami ! Ukude ŋene wa Yerusalem lotkeŋem . Ŋei maneŋo Ŋei Wawainane Gipole ea Anutu wane mosop ŋei so Anutu papa togon welaine ŋei , Skribe , eŋane meteeno birakaki edo seukeakane ra togole more lobo ŋei eŋano birakaikei .
41010034	Edo wawaine don olale more , sopotka kiŋ quŋ qe more , qeu seuke more deŋesereo payake , paki kaiwe mama karewe qoeki koso wisikae wieyake . ”
41010035	Zebedi wane gipoletkine Yakop so Yohane ere Yesu wane osino sari more rakoik , “ Kito ŋebon ŋebon , ŋere kine kine mane wane qeson ganiketane sarimaite . Ge kine kine yewa ŋerano weneŋ maikenane ŋotmaike . ”
41010036	Raukso , eŋe qesonore rake , “ Na onokaka ŋirano weneŋ maikalane ? ramamik ! ”
41010037	Ere rakoik , “ Ge dere , ŋere ma wakone bira ŋotnom . Naso ge ŋei waom met metko mesikene , yewao ŋere weneŋ wazaŋone nat nat mesikete . ”
41010038	Yesu eŋe etane rake , “ Ŋire ea wane kine mi detlukkeuk paki , na qeson nanmamik . Na dere umat wikile kine kine zok manerop maikale . Ŋire ea maine okanikeik me ? ”
41010039	Ere rakoik , “ Oo , ea ŋere maine okanwarekete ! ” Raukso , Yesuŋo etane rake , “ Ŋire naŋane wikile nat parom welekatne desikeik .
41010040	Ea wane maine ŋitanikale . Ŋo wazane nat nat met met ea wane noŋo maine mi ŋitanikale . Anutu oŋomka met met yewa ŋei maŋane maulukke , ea eŋe ŋine maniake . ”
41010041	Dokoine mete etke eŋe yale dere more Yakop so Yohane erane zok sotene osike .
41010042	Yesu eŋe edoraki , dokoine korop sariu edange , “ Ŋine detmami lobo ŋei ŋerep eŋane ware ware biraka okanmami , ŋei yewa eŋe ŋei ŋerep zonomene togogoleŋo magu ma pese one more eŋane ware ware togogole wareonmami .
41010043	Masi yewa koso ŋinane keuo mane misuk wakoniake ! Midakaka togogole ! Ŋei ŋinane keuo ŋine ware wareŋine okorayakane , ra more eŋe ŋei magu eŋane qelit qeqe okaniake .
41010044	Ŋei ŋinane keuo ŋine ŋetneŋine okorayakane , ramore eŋe ŋei magu eŋane qelit qeqe okaniake .
41010045	Na , Ŋei Wawainane Gipoleŋo sarikole , na ŋei ŋerep korop eŋane qelit qeqe okane more qesiŋ ŋunmaile . Ŋei ŋerep edo na mi qesiŋ nanmami . Na , ŋei ŋerep qesiŋone more solane qikkawe ŋei ŋerep ma menaŋ oniakane sarikole . ”
41010046	Eŋe ari Yeriko matko lotke more ea yuane arikoi , eŋine dokoine so ŋei ŋerep magu suaine weneŋ arikoi . Ŋei mane deine pilik pilikine eŋe numa wazaino metke . Eŋetine Bartimeus . Eŋe Timeus wane gipole . Eŋe mere ŋei ŋerep edo kine kine natne qesiŋ kaikeiwane boka woka metmaŋke .
41010047	Eŋe mere detki rakoi , Yesu Nazaret ŋei , eŋe done mo sarimaike , pakimo , ŋei yewa eŋe kieke togogoleka boka rake , “ Oo , Yesu , ge Dawit wane ŋaboine , ge ŋetne bira ganiakane Anutuŋo mo rake . Ge naŋane wetŋone borikep ! ”
41010048	Ŋei ŋerep magu yewa edo kuroŋka rakoi , “ Ge aŋaŋone ma wonge metnom ! ” Rau eŋe soringe togoleka koso boka rake , “ Dawit ŋaboine ge siluŋ naŋane wetŋone borikep ! ”
41010049	Yale ra bokaki , Yesu eŋe dere more paŋ lalipke okora edane rake , “ Orau ! Wie iwa sarikep ! ” Eŋe de pilik yewa ora more olale rakoi , “ Wet pesek suaine dere more wie sa arinom . Yesuŋo eŋano arikenane goramaike . ”
41010050	Eŋe dere esatka kaŋzaŋ wie more , momo takotine kiroine yewa makoke more , Yesu wane osino arike .
41010051	Yesuŋo olatke , “ Na dalino okanganikalane ramaine ? ” Ŋei deine pilik pilikine eŋe rake , “ Kito ŋebon ŋebon na dene koso posikalane ramaile . ”
41010052	Yesuŋo olatke , “ Ge maine koso arinom . Mali malipŋoneŋo maki deŋone potmaine . ” Yale raki , ikopka deine lotkeki pore ka more , Yesu ŋadino mogare arike .
41011001	Eŋe ari Yerusalem mat osino lotkekoi paki , ari mat etke metkoik , Betpage so Betani ere Oliwa bonaga wane wazaino metkoik . Yewa okorau so Yesu eŋe medewetkine etke matokotke .
41011002	Matok ore more iwa yale etane rake , “ Ŋire ari Betani mat eriwa meuno tingo pamaike . Ea wa more pore kauk horsi nigatne mane medeune mulapko lukkau okorayake . Horsi ea ŋei maneŋo kutno wa mi metmele , ea ka more mulap siloke so ma sarikeik .
41011003	Ŋo , ŋei maneŋo qesonŋure rayake , ‘ ŋire ea onoka wane okanmamik ? ’ Rakiso , ŋire iwa yale olale raikeik . Suaineŋo raki sari mamaite . Urata qoekimo koso ikop birakaki sariake . ”
41011004	Yale ra etane biraotki ere ari yewaka pore kauk mat mane numa meuno pake yewao horsi nigatne medeune mane mulapko luo okoraki , ere ka more silokkakoik .
41011005	Ŋei natne eŋe yewa osoetno okorakoi , eŋe ore more rakoi , “ Ei , ŋire dalino okangeik wane , horsi medeune ea silokkamamik ? ”
41011006	Rauso ere Yesuŋo don etange yale edanbik eŋe detpi qoeki oŋ rau , so ere ma sarikoik .
41011007	Ere horsi medeune ea Yesu wano ma sari more , eretne momo takot suaine eaŋo kutno motpik , so Yesu ea wane kutno wa metke .
41011008	Pakiso , ŋei ŋerep korop eŋe momo takotene kito qoke numao horsi kine gesoke ariakane lameke arikoi . Ŋei ŋerep natne eŋe zariŋ awak so eki metine eaŋo rutupke lamekkoi .
41011009	Yesu eŋine keuo kitoki ŋei magu natne ŋado kitou magu natne eŋe alakane more , iwa yale boka ra pezoŋka bakom kito arikoi , “ Ŋene Anutu wane oraŋem ! Ŋei iwa Waomŋo eŋine tungo birakaki sarimaike ! Anutuŋo mosopkakep !
41011010	Ŋaboze Dawit ŋaboine sari ware ŋoniake ! Aŋelo eŋe qeliwo Anutu wano orau ! ”
41011011	Eŋe yale okankau , Yesu eŋe Yerusalem lotke more Anutu Wane Bakom Urum koto waket more kine kine kotino pake ea korop kawareke . Kepe mo qoeakane okangi , Yesu eŋe dokoine 12 yewa ebuki , Betani ari pakoi .
41011012	Kepe qaeki sakoka eŋe wie more Betani mat qeliŋka sari numa keuo Yesu eŋe ŋara wane seukke .
41011013	Seuke more deine potki ariki kaki fik mane metine loutneŋo supakaki qei amaŋ okorake Yesu eŋe wele natne mayakane okane ari fik eki kino okora pore kaki wele mane mi metke . Midaka togole . Onoka wane , wele qeqe nasoino mida wane , eŋe pore metineka kake .
41011014	Paki , Yesu eŋe fik yewa olatke , “ Ge koso ŋado wele mane mi qekene ! Midakaka togogole ! ” Dokoine eŋe ea detkakoi .
41011015	Eŋe ari Yerusalem lotke more , Yesu eŋe ari Anutu Wane Bakom Urum kotino waket more ŋei ŋerep nalu qole qole urata ea wane kotino ma metkoi , ea kieke more osoponge . Ŋei eŋe zake yewa kutno mere wesi setne maingekoi , so met met kutno mere naŋi qole qole urata ma metkoi , ea korop kito surubage qakki ketke .
41011016	Paki , eŋe kine kine koso Anutu Wane Bakom Urum wane sen koto mi ma waket saket okangei wane ra togoleke .
41011017	Ra togole more iwa yale edange , “ Anutu wane papaiŋo iwa yale ramaike , ‘ Urumne ea eŋe ŋei ŋerep kepe baŋem ŋine maguine maguine sarikei , eŋane meŋe meŋen urum okaniake . ’ Ŋine yale okanbimo , kobu ŋei eŋane mat okanmaike . ”
41011018	Yesu eŋe yale raki , Anutu wane papa togon welaine ŋei , Parisi , so Anutu wane mosop ŋei , Pris , eŋe dere more auye rakoi , “ Ŋene dalino okane more qeŋem seukeake . ” Ŋo , ŋei ŋerep eŋe korop Yesu wane kito ebo eboninane zonomineŋo detkau , zok manerop ewinerop okange , ea wane Parisi so Pris eŋe kaetongi , qeliŋkakoi .
41011019	Ruo kereki naso yewao Yesu eŋine so dokoine eŋe Yerusalem qelige so ket arikoi .
41011020	Qaeki sakoka , eŋe ari kau , fik eki wele midaine yewa mo toroge okorake . Metine so ŋodine kaki korop marapke okorake .
41011021	Petoro eŋe Yesuŋo okange , ea detsoroke more Yesu olatke , “ Kito ŋebo ŋebon , ge fik iwa kanom ! Ge yatne soakkene , eŋe mo marapke okoramaike . ”
41011022	Yesu eŋe mainge rake , “ Ŋine Anutu malipkau .
41011023	Ŋine maine bonaga iwa olale raikei , Ge wie more sontake ari kiwetko ketnom ! Ŋine wet etkeka mi okane more , wet weku okane raikeiwo , welekatne donŋine welerop okaniake . Ea wane na ŋidanmaile . Kine kine ŋine yewaŋo raikei , rokop mawe wakoniake .
41011024	Ŋo , ŋine kine kine natne Anutuŋo ŋiboniakane meŋenkaikei , naso yewao ŋine Anutuŋo kine kine mo ŋibonge ea togoleka dere malipka more meŋenkaikei . Na welekatne ŋidanmaile . Ŋine yale malipka more meŋenkaikeiwo , Anutuŋo kine kine ea ŋiboniake .
41011025	Naso ŋine meŋen meŋen more okora more , ŋei maneŋo umat mane mo ŋinano make ea detsoroke more eŋane turuŋ yewa qeliŋkawarekei . Yalewaka magaŋine weti qeliwo metmaike , eŋe ŋinane turuŋŋine yewa qeliŋgi nigetkayake .
41011026	Ŋo , ŋine ŋei ŋerep eŋane sot turuŋene mi qeliŋkau niget ŋuniakeo , magaŋine weti qeliwo metmaike eŋe yalewaka ŋinane sot turuŋŋine ea mi qeliŋgi nigetkayake . ”
41011027	Yesu eŋine so dokoine eŋe zinge ari Yerusalem lotke more Yesuŋo Anutu Wane Bakom Urum kotino ari waket lolike geki Anutu papa togon welaine ŋei so Anutu wane mosop ŋei ŋetne so Yuda ŋei ŋetne eŋe Yesu wano sarikoi .
41011028	Sari olale rakoi , “ Ge eŋet biŋek so zonom ea diao ŋine manom paki , kine kine ea korop okan waremaine ? Maŋo eŋet biŋek suaine ea gingane , ge urata ea ma okanmaine ? Ge yatne Anutu wane Bakom Urum koto ŋine kine kine ea ma qakenom , korop saket warike , zonom eamo maŋo gingi , ge okanine ? ”
41011029	Yesu eŋe mainge edange , “ Na yaleka ŋine qeso qeson weku qeson ŋunbe , naŋane qeso qeson yewa mainge nolatpiso na masi kine kine ea maŋane dereretko mamaile ea wane kine rawe desikei .
41011030	Yohane wane doku tau tau urata ea qeliwo ŋine wakonge , me ŋeiwo ŋine wakonge ? Ea ŋido mainge nolatpi detpe . ”
41011031	Eŋe yale ra qeson ongi eŋe dere more enŋene auye rakoi , “ Ŋene raikene ea qeliwo ŋine wakonge , yale ra olatŋem eŋe rayake , pakimo ŋine onoka wane ea mi dere malipkamami ?
41011032	Me ŋene raikene , ŋeiwo ŋine wakonge , ea raŋem maine mi konapkeake . ” Ŋei ŋerep eŋe Yohane wane detkakoi , eŋe Anutu wane qelit ŋei wele , ea wane Pris eŋe dere more kaetongi ,
41011033	don iwa yale mainge Yesu olale rakoi , “ Ŋene mi detmaine . ” Eŋe yale rauso , Yesuŋo edange , “ Na yaleka , na maine mi maŋo qeli ewe zonom ningi , urata ea mamaile , eamo mi ŋidanikale . ”
41012001	Yesu eŋe don rokop natne iwa yale more edane rake , “ Ŋei maneŋo wain eu ebore more sen pise qeare more , lom yaso taŋ eaŋo wain woune lapelekeake , ea wane mauluke more mat bosiŋine kiroine wetika weti maki yewa waki eu yewa warelukkake . Eŋe ŋei natne eŋane meteeno motki edo urata yewa ware ma geu eŋine qelige lobo kepe yewao ari geke .
41012002	Eŋe yewa geki wain wele mena menaŋ nasoine okangi mo qelit medepine mane birakaki eu ware ware eŋano wele natne manbi ma sariakane arike .
41012003	Pakimo , eu ware ware eŋe wie qelit medep yewa malipka more kiŋ quŋ kito osopkau , eŋe metineka zinge arike .
41012004	Ariki , eu welaine eŋe koso qelit medep mane birakaki ariki eŋe yalewaka qe lewine rasipoke manerop matalikakoi .
41012005	Eŋe soringe koso qelit medep mane birakaki ariki , ea yemo komu komune qeu seukke . Eu welaine eŋe ŋei loutne biraongi ariu eu ware ware edo kawali ma wakone more ŋei natne ziwem engukoi ŋo , natne komu komune seuseune engukoi .
41012006	Pakimo , eŋe eŋine gipole wemedep wekuku wetineŋo malipka geke . Ea wane eu welaine eŋe iwa yale detke . ‘ Ŋine nae medep iwa wane aŋaine teweke more ewine kitokei . ’ Yale dere more eu ware ware eŋano birakake .
41012007	Pakimo eu wane ware ware ŋei eŋe medep yewa ka more auye rakoi , ‘ Medep yewa eŋe gemage magainane eu so kine kine eu koto pamaike , iwa ŋebu ma more ea wane welaine okane wareoniake . Ea wane ŋene qeŋem seukkiso ŋedo eu iwa welaine okane warekene . ’
41012008	Yale rau paki ma more qeu seukki pareŋine ea eu ŋadino birakau ketke .
41012009	“ Pakimo , eu welaine eŋe dalino okaniake ? Eŋe sari eu ware ware yewa engu , rasu pelekki eŋe korop seuke midakei . Midau mo eŋe koso eu ware ware musele ma wakone biraoniake .
41012010	Na iwa don rokop ra qelaŋanmaile . Ŋine don nat paromine mane Anutu wane papiao mi dapore det okanmami mane ? ‘ Mat mama urata ŋei eŋe mat wane bosiŋ mane ea eki pelekine ra more qikka yeine birakei . Wane ŋado eŋe koso kau mat wane banega bosiŋ togogole okange .
41012011	Waom eŋe ŋado yale okangi , ŋene kaŋem wekumane okaniake . ’ ”
41012012	Yale ra edangi , Yuda ŋetne eŋe detpi Yesuŋo don rokop ea qeki , korop eŋanoka ariki rawaeke . Pakimo , eŋe Yesu malipka wokomkaikei wane wetkekoi ŋo eŋe ŋei eŋane kaetonge , yalinane eŋe yeine qeliŋka arikoi . Ŋei ŋerep ene Yesu wane don dere siminonge yewa wane Yuda ŋetne eŋe kaetongi , Yesu qeliŋka arikoi .
41012013	Yuda ŋetne eŋe Anutu papa togon welaine ŋei , Parisi , so Herot wane tego natne biraonbi Yesu wano arikoi . Ŋei yewa eŋe Yesu dongo qe isikau , don mataliki , don uratao birakakei wane arikoi .
41012014	Eŋe ari more Yesu olale rakoi , “ Kito ebo ebon , ŋene ge detluk ganmaine . Ge isi don mane mi raraŋone , ge don wele rara wane ŋei . Ge ŋei mane wane mi kaetgan okanmaike . Ge ŋei ŋerep natne don mane edane more koso ŋei ŋerep magu natne don mane mi edane okanmaine . Midakaka ! Ge don wele so Anutu wane masi koboboine kito , ŋei ŋerep iwa korop sikan ŋone okanmaine . Ŋenze ra rokop donze ea wane ge dalino detmaine ? Maine ŋene takis Roma kepe ware ware suaine manikene me mida ? ”
41012015	Ŋo , Yesu eŋe isisienane kine ea mo detone more edane rake , “ Onoka wane ŋine na liwek nanmami ? Eso , yale wane ŋine wesi yewa mane ma sariu kawe . ”
41012016	Yale raki , eŋe wesi mane ma more , Yesu wane osino ma sariu , eŋe qeson one rake , “ Oŋaoŋa iwa so eŋet iwa maŋane ? ” Eŋe rakoi , “ Roma kepe ware ware suaine eŋane eŋet so oŋa oŋa . ”
41012017	Pakimo , Yesu eŋe donene mainge rake , “ Roma kepe ware ware suainane biŋek kine kine ea maine eŋine manikei , ŋo Anutu wane biŋek kine kine ea eŋe eŋine Anutu manikei . ” Yale raki , ŋei magu yewa eŋe Yesu wane don dere oŋaene qaeke , qiselukkoi , so dereret siuke .
41012018	Yuda ŋei ŋetne , Sadusi natne , eŋe Yesu wano sarikoi . Magu yewa eŋe yale raokangoi ŋei seuseune eŋe koso mi wiekei . Ea wane eŋe Yesu qesonka rakoi ,
41012019	“ Kito ebo ebon , sogino , Moseŋo ŋenze don mane iwa yale qeke . ‘ Ŋei mane eŋe seukeake , eŋe medeune midaine , ŋo , ŋanomine eŋe yeka geake , pakimo ŋei seukke eŋane ŋole eŋe tatine qesiŋka more ŋerep yewa oŋo koso ma more medep mane ma wakoniake . ’
41012020	Ŋenane donkisi detnom . Donkisi iwa eŋe tati ŋon sewen ( 7 ) yale gekoi . Wane tatene suaine eŋe ŋerep ma ge more medep mane mi ma wakone eŋe yaup seukke .
41012021	Pakimo , ŋole kebaŋine oŋo tatinane mala ea make . Eŋe yaleka medep mane mi ma wakone more eŋe seukki , ŋole ŋorikine eŋe yalewaka okange .
41012022	Yalewaka tati ŋon sewen ( 7 ) yewa eŋe ŋerep wekuka makoi , ŋo , medep mane mi ma wakone more , eŋe yaup seukwarekoi . Pakimo ŋerep yewa eŋe yaleka ŋado baŋ seukke .
41012023	Boaŋ naso ŋei seuseune eŋe wisikae wiekei , yewao ŋerep yewa eŋe maŋane ŋerep biŋek okaniake ? Ge detmaine . Ŋei tati ŋon sewen eŋe ŋanomene weku yewa makoi . ”
41012024	Yesu eŋe mainge rake , “ Ŋine Anutu wane papiao don pamaike , ea ŋine mi detlukmami . So ŋine Anutu wane zonomine ea ŋaŋaeka more ea wane don yewa qeyau ramami .
41012025	Ŋei seuseune eŋe deŋesereo ŋine wisikae wiekei , naso yewao eŋe koso ŋao ŋanom mi okanikei . Midakaka ! Eŋe qeliwo aŋelo yale gekei .
41012026	Ŋei seuseune eŋe wisikae wiekei , eŋane don yewa Moseŋo kibi qeke . Ŋine yewa mi dapotkoi me ? Naso yewao eki nigatnane kutno gerep zeke , eao yewa wane donkisi Anutuŋo Mose olatke , ‘ Na Abraham wane Anutu , so Isak wane Anutu so Yakop wane Anutu okanmaile . ’
41012027	Anutu eŋe ŋei wisika gemami eŋane Anutu . Don ea wane kine iwa yale , Abraham , Isak , Yakop kepe solaŋo seukoi , ŋo oŋaoŋaeneŋo naso yewao wisika gemami ! Anutu eŋe ŋei seuseune eŋane Anutu midakaka ! Ŋine don yewa qeyau rawaremami ! ”
41012028	Yesu eŋe yale raki , eŋe don auye kitat metpi , Anutu papa togon welaine ŋei mane eŋe sari detkaki , Yesu eŋe don koboboine mainge edangi , eŋe Yesu qesonka rake , “ Ge ranom ! Anutu wane ra rokop don eŋano ŋine diawaŋo ŋetne okanmaike ? ”
41012029	Yesu eŋe donine mainge rake , “ Iwa yaleŋo Anutu wane ra rokop don ŋetne okanmaike . ‘ Israel ŋei ŋerep detpi ! Waom eŋe ŋenane Anutu okanmaike ! Eŋe waom wekuku !
41012030	Ŋine wet dereretŋine , so oŋa oŋa ŋine so zonomŋine korop Waom ŋine Anutu eŋane siminŋungi ma qotkau ! ’
41012031	Anutu wane ra rokop don ŋetne yewa wane bano , koso mane etke okanmamik yemo , ‘ Ŋine wetŋineŋo ŋidomka ma qot nagugekei ! Yalewaka ŋei ŋerepkopŋine korop wetŋineŋo ma qotonikei . ’ Anutu wane ra rokop etke yewa koso maneŋo etke iwa mi yuan otmaike . ”
41012032	Anutu papa togon welaine ŋei yewa eŋe Yesu olale rake , “ Kito ŋebon ŋebon ge don maine ramaine ! Oo welekatne ! Waom eŋe wekuŋo Anutu okanmaike . Koso mane mi gemaike .
41012033	Ŋene wet dereretze so oŋaoŋaze so zonomze korop Anutu wane siminŋongi , ma qotkaŋem ! So ŋenze wetzeŋo ma qotnagukene . Yalewaka ŋei ŋerep korop ma qotonikene . Ŋene ra rokop don etke iwa mogasikeneo , masi etke eaŋo Anutu wane bakom natne lama bulamakaŋo mire okanmami , ea korop yuan onikeik . ”
41012034	Yesu eŋe ŋei yewa don raraine detkaki weku mane koboboine ŋei dereret koropŋo ramami , yale mainge raki , detka more ŋei yewa olale rake , “ Ge Anutuŋo ŋei ŋerep wareŋuniakane kine daleo ea detkenane qou qou okanmaine . ” Yesu eŋe don yale raki , ŋei ŋerep natne eŋe don natne Yesu qeson kaikeiwane kaetongi , koso don mane mi qesonkakoi .
41012035	Yesu eŋe Anutu Wane Bakom Urum koto mere ŋei ŋerep kito ebone more iwa yale rake , “ Ŋo onoka wane Anutu wane papa togon welaine ŋei , Skribe , eŋe Mesia wane ramami , eŋe eŋineka Dawit wane ŋaboine , kepe ŋei eŋineka .
41012036	Mesiaŋo ŋei ŋerep ma menaŋ oniakane , Anutuŋo ma wakonkake . Anutu wane Asu Koboboineŋo Dawit dereret mange , pakimo , Dawit oŋom rake , ‘ Magak Suaineŋo naŋane suaine Mesia iwa yale olatke , “ Ge naŋane wonnoken mesikene , pakimo , noŋo ŋabakopŋone , eŋe biraonbe , geŋane banŋono mesikei . ” ’
41012037	Dawit oŋom Mesia wane eŋe suainene rake , wane mo eŋe daleo wane Dawit wane ŋaboine ? ” Yesuŋo Anutu Wane Papa Togon Welaine Skribe Ŋei Eŋane Girem Don Ŋei Ŋerep Edange . Ŋei ŋerep magu suaine eŋe Yesu wane don dere more , siminongi bakom kitokoi .
41012038	Yesu eŋe iwa yale kito ebonge , “ Ŋine Anutu wane papa togon welaine ŋei eŋane kaulukonikei ! Eŋe takot kiroine kibinerop bira more arikei wane siminone okanmaike . So eŋe lewalewaŋ sobego taŋ tuŋ zarak zurak geu ŋei ŋerep edo one ma wa one more eweene kitou geokanmami .
41012039	Eŋe Yuda lewa lewaŋ urum koto so epa kebu eao met met ŋetno mesikeiwane okan okanmami .
41012040	Eŋe yale okane more ŋerep mala eŋane mat oma one okanmaŋkei . Omakone more eŋe sari Yuda lewa lewaŋ urum koto ŋei ŋerep eŋane deo okora Anutu wano meŋe meŋen kiroroine meŋenka okanmaŋkei . Ŋei yaline yewa eŋe gemage ŋado Anutuŋo wikile suaine eboniake . ”
41012041	Yesu eŋe Anutu Wane Bakom Urum wane wesi katapa osino metke . Mere ŋei ŋerep one metki ari wesi katapa koto birau ketke . Ŋei wesi aboŋene suaine loutne eŋe wesi suaine motkoi .
41012042	Paki mo , ŋerep mala wesi aboŋine nigatnemde eŋe sari toea etke biraki ketke .
41012043	Ea wane Yesu eŋe dokoine edoraki sariu edange , “ Na welekatne ŋidanmaile , ŋerep mala ŋaone mo seu seune , aboŋine nigatnemde eaŋo wesi manerop motmaike , eŋe ŋei ŋerep wesi aboŋene suaine eŋane bakom wane wesi motmami , ea yuanonmaike .
41012044	Ŋei ŋerep wesi aboŋene suaine pake , ea ŋine nigatnemde so natka Bakom Urum wane laseo motkoi , ŋo ŋerep mala iwa eŋe zok wesi wane ziaŋ lulukke , ŋo eŋe koropka birawareke , eŋe wesiine mane doku ŋara qoleakane maune mi motki metke . ”
41013001	Yesu eŋe Anutu Wane Bakom Urum Suaine qeliŋka more ket ariki , dokoine eŋano ŋine maneŋo olale rake , “ Kito ŋebo ŋebon , ge so Anutu Wane Bakom Urum , so eŋane urum ketkele weku mane , weku mane iwa onnom ! ”
41013002	Yale raki , Yesuŋo mainge rake , “ Ŋine kau mat iwa zok suaine okanmaike me ? Naso kutno ŋei ŋinane ŋei ŋaba eŋe mat iwa matalikeiwo , eŋe wesi mane mi qeligeu weti kutno mesiake , midakaka ! Eŋe koropŋo saket din bun kitopoke qakeu ket ari wareake . ”
41013003	Yesu eŋe Oliwa bonagao mere pore kaki Anutu Wane Bakom Urum nat metke . Yesu so Petoro so Yakop so Yohane so Andrea enŋeneka metkoi .
41013004	Mere more eŋe Yesu qesonka rakoi , “ Ge ranom detŋem , naso dango Anutu Bakom Urum ea poripkeake ? Onokaka kine kine maneŋo mikep wakone sikanŋongi , ŋene ea ka more raikene , Anutu Wane Bakom Urum mo wiriakane nasoine bomilemaike ? ”
41013005	Yesu eŋe edane rake , “ Ŋei loutne eŋe sari isi ŋunikeiwane ŋine kaulukkei !
41013006	Ŋei loutne eŋe sari more naŋane eŋetne nora more raikei , ‘ Na Kristo . ’ Yale ra more ŋei ŋerep loutne isi onikei .
41013007	Ŋine baŋ kawali suain suaine ea ukatneka desikei , so momo don , kawali natne kepe nat parom ramaike , ea dere mo qomŋine misuk umareake ! Kine kine yaline korop wakoniake . Ŋo , qeli so kepe nasoine yemo ikop mi qoeake .
41013008	Mat mane eŋe wie ari mat mane eŋerop kawali yaku matali okanikei . Ŋei kepe maneo ŋine eŋane ŋei waom eŋe ari kepe mane wane ŋei waom eŋerop yaku matali qetali okanikei . Kepe loutne memea suaine ma paki , ŋara wane bodi wakoniake . Ŋerep edo medep ebukeiwane gae kieke ebumaike . Naso yewao wikile yaline kieke wakoniake .
41013009	Ŋei edo sari ŋibu ari kaunsol eŋano dongo bira ŋunikeiwane kauluk nagukei . Eŋe ŋine Anutu wane lewa lewaŋ urum koto zinge more , ŋibu ari biraŋunbi kepe ware ware eŋane deo okorakei . Yewa ŋine biŋek don ra edanikei .
41013010	Alakan , ŋine kepe baŋem ŋei ŋerep korop eŋane biŋek don ra qelaŋane edanikei . Pakiso , kepe qeli naso etne qoeake .
41013011	Ŋei edo ŋibu ari kaunsol eŋano dongo bira ŋunikei , naso yewao ŋine dere mezet mi okane raikei , ‘ Ŋene kaunsol dalino edanikene ? ’ Ea mida ! Ŋine eŋane deo okorau , naso yewaka Anutuŋo dereret ŋino don mosiake , yewa ŋine ra qelaŋanikei , eamo ŋidom mi raikei , yemo Asu Koboboineŋo rayake . Anutu wane Asu eŋe weneŋ ŋinerop okora ŋidangi edanikei .
41013012	Naso yewao ŋei mane eŋe tatine me ŋole ma ari kaunsol eŋano dongo birakaki qeu seukeake . Yalewaka magak eŋe dokoene ebu ari kaunsol eŋane dongo biraonbi enguwi seukkei . Yalewaka dokoetne eŋe naga magaene epu ari kaunsol eŋano dongo biraotpi etkuwi seukkeik .
41013013	Naŋane eŋetneŋo ŋinano pamaike ea wane ŋei ŋerep korop eŋe ŋinane dere worik okanŋunikei . Ŋo , ŋei eŋe togole biŋek don malipka okorayakeo , Anutu eŋe qeli kepe qoiqoi nasoo ŋei yewa mayake . ”
41013014	Yesuŋo iwa yale rake , “ Ŋine Ŋei Madoŋ Madoŋine so Matali Matali Kaetinerop kau Mat Kobekine , yewao wakone okorayake . Eŋe Anutu wane tun ma more isisine okorayake . ” ( Ŋei mane eŋe kibi iwa dapore kine detlukeake . ) “ Naso yewao ŋei ŋerep Yuda kepeo ŋine kaet okane biririke bonagao arikei .
41013015	Ŋei mane eŋe mat sekaino mesiake , eŋe mat koto mi wa more kine kine natne mayake , eŋe yeine qelige kaet ariake .
41013016	Ŋei mane eŋe euo geakeo ŋine , eŋe koso mi zinge ari matko momo takotine mayake , eŋe yeine qelige kaet ariake .
41013017	Ŋerep medep ŋat korop so medep abuburop , eŋe wikile suaine zok manerop desikei .
41013018	Ŋine Anutu meŋenka olatpi , ‘ Kine kine yewa koya momo naso misuk wakoniake . ’
41013019	Naso yewao umat kakapa suaine wakoniake . Anutuŋo qeli so kepe mat ma wakonge naso yewa so naso iwa gemaine , ea wane keuno umat kine kine wakonge ea korop umat iwaŋo yuanka more wakoniake . Umat iwa qoeki ŋadino umat mane yaline mi wakoniake .
41013020	Ŋo Waom eŋe naso yewa wane umatine korop mi ma bomilemaikeo , yemo ŋei ŋerep korop mida lele warekene , Waom eŋe eŋine ŋei ŋerewekoune biraonge , ea wane naso iwa ma bomilemaike .
41013021	“ Naso yewao ŋei maneŋo ŋidaniake , ‘ Ŋeiwa Waomŋo ŋei ŋerewekoune ŋebuyakane , ea iwa kau , Kristo iwa metmaike ! ’ me ‘ Kau ! Eriwa metmaike ! ’ Ŋine misuk dere malipkakei .
41013022	Ŋei natne eŋe sari isiŋune more , iwa yale raikei , ‘ Na iwa Waomŋo ŋei ŋerewekoune ŋibukalane biranange ’ , me raikei , ‘ Na propet mane , ’ yale ra , masi tanik kine kine , tanikine kine mane kine mane maikei , so isiŋunikei . Ea welekakatne , eŋe maine ŋei ŋerep Anutuŋo mo eŋine biŋek biraonge , ea isionikei .
41013023	Ea wane ŋine kaulukkei ! Na don kine kine mo korop ŋidanwarile . ”
41013024	Yesu eŋe koso iwa yale rake , “ Umat kine kine suaine yewa midaki , naso yewao kepe deine mupkeki meso eŋe yaleka mi qelaŋaniake .
41013025	Serekin eŋe qeliwo ŋine buratke ketpi , kine kine togole qeliwo eŋe korop qise warekei .
41013026	Naso yewao kau . Na Ŋei Wawainane Gipoleŋo kezoŋ kutno qelaŋanne suaine so zonominerop wakone sarikale .
41013027	Naso yewao na Ŋei Wawainane Gipoleŋo aŋelokopne biraonbe , qeli so kepe wazaino ŋine nat nat qei so weti ŋei ŋerep Anutuŋo mo ma wakone biraonge , ea aŋelokopne edo korop ebu sari qeturaŋ ŋonikei .
41013028	“ Na eki fik wane kine kito ŋidanbe desikei . Eŋane metine posi qake more musele yabiki ŋine ka more raikei kaiwe naso okanmaike .
41013029	Yalewaka ŋine fik kine kine qotkoine ea wakongi ŋine yale desikei , Ŋei Wawainane Gipole nasoine mo bomile osop osop madetko sarimaike .
41013030	Na welekatne ŋidanmaile , naso sariake , naso eao ŋei ŋerep naso iwao wane biŋek eŋe mi seukeu , kine kine ea korop wakon wareake .
41013031	Kepe so qeli ere midakeik , ŋo , naŋane don yemo mi midayake . ”
41013032	Yesu eŋe koso manerop rake , “ Ŋei maneŋo ea wane nasoine mi detkamaike . So qeliwo aŋelo magu so Anutu wane Gipole eŋe yaleka mi detkamami . Magak Anutu oŋomka detmaike .
41013033	Ea wane , ŋine kauluke more ware gekei ! Ŋine naso mi detkamami . Ma nasoo yewa wakoniake .
41013034	Masi tanik iwa yemo nasoo baŋ yalewa wakoniake . Ŋei mane eŋe matine qeliŋka more mat maneo ariakane okane more eŋe mat ware ware matokone biraongi edo eŋane kine kine warekei . Paki eŋe urata bonep bonep matoke biraone more ŋei mane aŋap wake waketko metke , yewa olale rake , ‘ Ŋine diam togogole ma warekaikei ! ’
41013035	Yalewa wane ŋine siluŋ warelukkei ! Ŋine mi detmami , ma naso mat wane welaine sariake . Ŋine mi detlukkamami . Eŋe ruo kereake nasoo me ruo keuno me kaiwe wetemaike naso eao me kepe qaeqaewo sariake . Ea ŋine mi detlukkamami .
41013036	Mat welaine eŋe gege ikop sariki , qisekeiwane ŋine wisika mesikei .
41013037	Na don iwa ŋidanmaile eamo ŋine ŋei ŋerep korop ŋinane biŋek . Ŋine koropŋo warekalukkei ! ”
41014001	Kaiwe etke qoeki , aŋelo loloŋon loloŋon peada naso so bret patpale peada naso okange . Anutu mosop ŋei natne so Anutu wane papa togon welaine , ŋei eŋe auye rakoi , “ Ŋene dalino okane more Yesu sanka ma more qeŋem seukeake ?
41014002	Eŋe rakoi , ea peada naso suaino mi maikene . Ŋei ŋerep eŋe dere worik okane more kawali ma wakonikei . ”
41014003	Yesu eŋe Betani matko Saimon wane matko metke . Saimon eŋe sogino ŋei kubetine weneŋ mere mo menaŋge . Yesu eŋe Saimon wane zakeo ŋara ne metki , ŋerep mane eŋe kelok qoune simlerop lewine suaine ea beloŋ gorop ma sa more beloŋ rasipoke more kelok qounerop Yesu wane lewetino qakke .
41014004	Ŋei ŋerep natne metkoi , eŋe sotene osiki auye rakoi , “ Onoka wane kelok qounerop sanda iwa matalimaike ?
41014005	Ŋei maneŋo kelok yewa qoleakeo wesi setne 300 yaline ma more , ŋei aboŋene midaine eboniake . ” Ra more ŋerep yewa dere worik okankakoi so don manerop rakoi .
41014006	Yale rau , Yesu eŋe rake , “ Qeliŋkau ! Onoka wane ŋine umat suaine mane ŋerep yewa don okankamami ? Eŋe masi iwa weku mane naŋano mamaike .
41014007	Ŋei aboŋene midaine eŋe naso baŋem ŋinerop gekei , ŋine naso natneo eŋe mapikonbe ra ma okanikei , ŋo na yemo ŋinerop zok naso kiroine mi gekale .
41014008	Ŋerep eŋe kine kine mawe ra more maine mayake . Eŋe kelok qounerop solano motmaike eŋe deŋesereo wane ma ewek nanmaike .
41014009	Na welekatne ŋidanmaile . Kepe baŋem korop eŋe Anutu wane biŋek don ra qelaŋane more ŋerep iwa wane don kisi edane eŋetine detsorokka more bukeu wayake . ”
41014010	Naso yewao dokoine 12 eŋane keueno ŋine Yudas Iskariot eŋe mosop ŋei ŋetne eŋane meteeno Yesu bira kayakane arike .
41014011	Eŋe dere more bakom kito more eŋerop tako rakot don au more wesi manikeiwane olatkoi . Yudas eŋe dere more yewaka kieke Yesu ma wakon kayakane so meteeno mosiakane numaine mane dere maulukke .
41014012	Bret patpalane soda weku kaiwe mane eao Yesu wane dokoine eŋe qesonka rakoi , “ Ge detnom ! Ŋene diawao ari mere Aŋelo Loloŋon Loloŋon Naso wane ŋara maulukkene ? ” Kaiwe yewa ŋei ŋerep eŋe Aŋelo Loloŋon Loloŋon Naso lama medeune koma baŋem qe nemaŋkoi .
41014013	Yesuŋo dere more dokoine etke biraore etange , “ Ŋire ari Yerusalem matko waket more ŋei mane kauk doku kap teweke sari numao marat ŋusiake . Yewa mogatka ariuk ,
41014014	eŋe ari mat wakesiake , yewa ŋire ari waket more mat welaine iwa yale olasikeik , ‘ Kito ŋebo ŋebonze ramaike , naŋane mat aŋaone diawao Aŋelo Loloŋon Loloŋon Naso na mere dokone eŋerop ŋara nekene . ’
41014015	Yale ra qesonkauk , eŋe urum ea aŋaone mane suaine kutno weti met met so zake kine kine mo mauluk maulukine , ea sikanŋutkiso , yewao ŋire ŋaraze maulukkeik . ”
41014016	Medewetkine etke ere qelige mat suaino ari lotke more Yesuŋo etange yale maratka more ere Aŋelo Loloŋon Loloŋon Naso wane ŋara kine kine maulukkoik .
41014017	Rarapko , Yesu eŋe dokoine 12 ea weneŋ sarikoi .
41014018	Eŋe zakeo ŋara ne metpi , Yesu eŋe edange , “ Na welekatne ŋidanmaile . Ŋei mane ŋinane keuoŋineŋo na ma wakonnane more , ŋabakopne eŋane meteeno bira naniake . Ŋei ea eŋe weneŋ iwa narop mere ŋara nemaine . ”
41014019	Dokoine eŋe dere umare more weku weku Yesu qesonka rakoi , “ Maŋo ? Noŋo me ? ”
41014020	Yesuŋo mainge rake , “ Medep 12 ŋinane keuoŋine eŋe iwa narop weneŋ mere metine biraki pletko ketki ŋara ma nemaike .
41014021	Na Ŋei Wawainane Gipole seukkalane mo Anutu wane papiaŋo mo eŋe seukeake ramaike , Welekatne , ŋo ŋei yewa eŋe Ŋei Wawainane Gipole na ma wakonnane ŋaba eŋane meteeno birananiake , eŋe yemo wet borik zok umat manerop marat kayake . Ŋei yewa eŋe nabokŋo siluŋ mi makirap , paki eŋe umatine mi wakon mangirap . ”
41014022	Eŋe ŋara ne metpi paki , Yesu eŋe bret nat parom ma more Anutu wane bakom kito more mapoke dokoine ebone more rake , “ Ŋine mau ! Iwa nae bikumne . ”
41014023	Paki , eŋe wain lase ma more Anutu wane bakom kito more ebongi eŋe korop newarekoi .
41014024	Eŋe neu Yesuŋo edane rake , “ Iwa mo nae weŋemne , eaŋo tako rakot muselane biŋek na korop qesiŋ ŋuniakane qakkale . Anutuŋo weŋemne ea wane ra more ŋinerop tako rakot geake .
41014025	Na welekakatne ŋidanbe , na koso wain mane ŋinerop mi nene gemage , naso kutno Anutu wane qeli ewe zonom sariake , naso yewao wain musele kine mane nekale . ”
41014026	Yale edangi qoekiso , eŋe Anutu wane bakom eŋet mane kito more Oliwa bonagao arikoi .
41014027	Yesu eŋe edange , “ Ŋine korop mali malip ŋine qororoŋgi , na qeliŋnane ariwarekei . Eamo Anutu wane papiaŋo iwa yale ramaike , ‘ Anutuŋo lama ware ware qeki seukki naso yewao eŋane lama korop ket giŋ qiririŋ yauyaup ariwarekei . ’
41014028	Ŋo , na koso wisikae wie more Galili ari alakane ŋibonikale . ”
41014029	Petoroŋo olatke , “ Natne eŋe korop ge qeliŋ ganwareke , ŋo na yemo ge mi qeliŋ ganikale ! ”
41014030	Yesuŋo Petoro olatke , “ Na welekatne golatmaile . Ukude ruo iwao tiak eŋe atak etke bokaki mi qoeki goŋo atak karewe bisop nanikene . ”
41014031	Petoro eŋe koso togogole mainge rake , “ Geŋone gekuwi seukkenom , na nekukeiwane okanbi , na ge mi bisopganikale . ” Dokoine natne korop eŋe yalewaka rakoi .
41014032	Eŋe Getsemane sauromoo ari lotke more , Yesuŋo dokoine edange , “ Ŋine iwa metpi , na ari meŋenkaikale . ”
41014033	Eŋe Petoro so Yakop so Yohane eŋerop edangi arikoi . Ari numao Yesuŋo wet borik so umat kakapa suaine dere more
41014034	dokoine edange , “ Wetne zok boriki , seukkalane okanmaile . Ŋine iwa diam metpi ! ”
41014035	Eŋe eri eri kere more kepeo ket quruŋ rasu pa more , meŋenkake . Eŋe wikile suaine ea maine yuankayake , ea wane dere more meŋenkake .
41014036	Eŋe meŋenka rake , “ Oo magak ! Ge wikile lase iwa korop maine omak nanikene ? Kine kine korop , ge maine mi ŋaŋaekene . Ge siluŋ naŋane simile mi mogasikene . Midaka . Ge geŋone simileŋone mogare mawarekene . ”
41014037	Yale meŋenkaki qoeki , eŋe koso zinge ari dokoine karewe ongi kulu pau Petoro olale rake , “ Saimon ! Ge kulu pamaine me ? Ge naso nigatne wet wisika maine mi gekene me ? ”
41014038	Eŋe edane rake , “ Ŋine sot mi marat kakeiwane kauluk nagu more meŋenkaikei . Oŋaoŋaŋo meŋen meŋen wane togole ewekmaike . Ŋo , solaŋo pelekmaike . ”
41014039	Eŋe yale ra edane more zinge koso ari mikep ra more meŋenkake yalewaka meŋenkake .
41014040	Paki koso zinge sari ongi dokoine eŋe kulu ka pakoi ea wane wie more deene umareki , gamuongi , Yesu wane don daleo olasikei ra dere umareu paki , mi mainge olatkoi .
41014041	Yesu eŋe koso atak karewe zinge sari more edange , “ Ŋine yeka kulu pa zonom mamami me ? Moya maine ! Naŋane naso mo lotkemaike . Kau ! Eŋe Ŋei Wawainane Gipole iwa mo ŋei sotenerop eŋane meteeno biranangei .
41014042	Ŋine wieu ! Ariŋem ! Kau , ŋei ma wakon naniake , mo iwa sari lotkemaike ! ”
41014043	Yesu eŋe yeka ra okoraki , dokoine 12 eŋane keuo ŋine Yudas eŋe magu suaine eŋerop lotkeke . Mosop ŋei ŋetne so Anutu papa togon welaine ŋei so Yuda ware ware suaineŋo ŋei yauwine biraongi koak , soba ma more sarikoi .
41014044	Ŋei Yesu ma wakonkayake , eŋe magu yewa don masi mane edane rake , “ Na ari ŋei yewa ka more lulukiwe ka more raikei , Yesu mo yewa raso malipka more ma arikei . ”
41014045	Yudas eŋe sari more ikopka Yesu wano ari more rake , “ Kito ŋebo ŋebon . ” Ra more lulukike .
41014046	Lulukiki so ŋaba eŋe ka more metino malipkakoi .
41014047	Eŋane keueno ŋine ŋei maneŋo Mosop Ŋei Ŋetne Suaine eŋane qelit ŋei mane osoeno okoraki , ea sobaŋo qe more ketine rasu qakki ketke .
41014048	Yesuŋo edane rake , “ Na kobu ŋei midakaka ! Onoka wane ŋine koak , so sobarop luknanikei wane sarimami ?
41014049	Na kaiwe baŋem Anutu Wane Bakom Urum kotino kito ŋibone okanmaŋkole . Naso yewao ŋine mi malipnane luknangoi . Ŋo , kine kine iwa wakongi Anutu wane papiao don ea wane wele wakongep ! ”
41014050	Pakiso , Yesu dokoine eŋe qeliŋka more , ket giŋ qiririŋ ariwarekoi .
41014051	Ŋei qaluwit mane eŋe laplapineka Yesu mogare arike . Eŋe ma more lukkaikei wane okanbiso ,
41014052	laplap libeka ea qelige solaineka biririke arike .
41014053	Eŋe Yesu Mosop Ŋei Ŋetne Suaine eŋane matko iwenka ariu ŋei ŋetne suaine korop sari lewaŋgoi . Mosop ŋei ŋetne , Yuda ware ware so Anutu papa togon welaine ŋei .
41014054	Petoro eŋe Yesu ŋadino mogare , amaŋ ari Mosop Ŋei Ŋetne Suaine eŋane mat wane sen koto waket more , tebe ŋei eŋerop gerep qenagare metkoi .
41014055	Mosop ŋei ŋetne natne so ŋei ŋetne korop eŋe gube qesat ŋei natne maratka more Yesu dongo biraka more qeu seukeakane auye detokangoi . Ŋo , don mane wele koboine mi maratkakoi .
41014056	Qesat ŋei loutne Yesu wano zok don isi qesat okankakoi . Ŋo , doneene eŋe rau numaineŋo wele so weku mi okange .
41014057	Paki , ŋei natneŋo okora , don isi Yesu wane iwa yale solaino qe rakoi ,
41014058	“ Ŋene detkaŋem , iwa yale rake , ‘ Eŋe Anutu Wane Bakom Urum iwa meteŋo makoi , yewa rasupoke qakewe ariki , na kaiwe mama karewe yewaoka mane musele maikale . Ŋo , meteŋo mi maikale . ’ ”
41014059	Ŋei eŋe don yewa rakoi , eamo numainoka mi rakoi , eŋe rau qebetneŋo mi kopkeke .
41014060	Mosop Ŋei Ŋetne Suaine eŋe keuo wie okora more Yesu qesonka rakoi , “ Ge eŋane don turuŋine mi mainge edanikene me ? ”
41014061	Yesu eŋe donine midaki okora eŋane don turuŋine mi maingeke . Mosop Ŋei Ŋetne Suaine eŋe koso qesonka rake , “ Ŋei ŋerep eŋe Anutu ewine kitomami . Ge welekatne Kristo , Anutu yewa wane Medep me mida ? ”
41014062	Yesuŋo mainge rake , “ Oo , na yewa ! Ŋine korop Ŋei Wawainane Gipole , Anutu Zonomine Kakapa Suaine , eŋane metine nat wonino mere more qeliwo kezoŋ kutno sariwe kaikei ! ”
41014063	Mosop Ŋei Ŋetne Suaine eŋe qise qomine wieki takot kitopoke ma barake rake , “ Ŋene koso qesat ŋei natne edoraŋem sari eŋane kine mi raikei , yeine !
41014064	Ŋine detkau , eŋe Anutu ma baikkamaike , ea wane ŋine dalino detmami , ŋene ŋei iwa daleo okankaikene ? ” Paki , eŋe koropŋo Yesu wane iwa yale ra togolekoi , “ Eŋe sotinerop , eŋe maine seukeake . ”
41014065	Ŋei natne eŋe Yesu kieke sopotka more deine laplapŋo piseka qe more rakoi , “ Ge ra qelaŋanikene ! Maŋo gekumaike ? ” Yale olale more tebe ŋei edo mete tabeŋo qekoi .
41014066	Petoro eŋe qei mat wane sen koto metki , Mosop Ŋei Ŋetne Suaine eŋane qelit ŋerep eŋe sari more
41014067	Petoro kaki gerep qenagare metki deinoka olale rake , “ Ge weneŋ sogino Yesu Nazaret ŋine eŋerop gekone ! ”
41014068	Ŋo , Petoro eŋe bisopka rake , “ Na mi detmaile ! Na geŋane don mi dere qelaŋanmaile . ” Yale mainge ra more eŋe mat wane sen ea wane madetino ari wakesiakane okangi tiak mane bokake .
41014069	Qelit ŋerep yewa eŋe ka more ŋei osino okorakoi edane rake , “ Ŋei iwa eŋe Yesu wane tego eŋerop geke ! ”
41014070	Ŋo , Petoroŋo koso bisopkake . Naso nigatne azongi , ŋei osino okorakoi , eŋe koso Petoro wane rakoi , “ Welekakatne , ge Yesu wane tego gekone . Ge weneŋ Galili ŋei ge yewa ŋine . ”
41014071	Rauso , Petoro eŋe togogole bisopka rake , “ Welekatne weti qeliwo na ŋidanmaile . Na ŋei ea mi detkamaile . Na don welekatne mi ŋidanikaleo , Anutu eŋe na wikile niniake ! Ŋei yewa mi detkamaile . ”
41014072	Eŋe yalewa rakiso , yewaka tiak eŋe atak etke bokake , pakimo , Petoro eŋe Yesuŋo don rake , yewa detsorokke . Yesuŋo iwa yale rake , “ Tiak atak etke bokaki mi qoeki goŋo na atak karewe bisop nanikene . ” Don yewa detsoroke more , Petoro eŋe zok manerop aro suaine aroke .
41015001	Kepe qae qaewo mosop ŋei ŋetne so Anutu papa togon welaine ŋei , Skribe , so Yuda ware ware ŋei so kaunsol korop eŋe ikopka lewage more don ma togolekoi . Eŋe Yesu metine mulap togoleŋo lukka more iwenka ari Pilat wane meteo birakakoi .
41015002	Pilat eŋe Yesu qesonkake , “ Ge Yuda wane kepe wareware suaine me mida ? ” Yesu eŋe mainge rake , “ Oo , mo yewa goŋom ramaine yale . ”
41015003	Mosop ŋei ŋetne eŋe don qesat manerop qesatkakoi .
41015004	Ea wane Pilat eŋe koso qesonkake , “ Ge don mane mi mainge raikene me ? Ge detnom ! Eŋe don qesat loutne rau geŋano sarimaike ! ”
41015005	Yesu eŋe eŋane don dere more koso mi mainge rake , Pilat eŋe oŋaine qaeke .
41015006	Aŋelo Loloŋon Loloŋon wane Naso , Pilat eŋe mulap ŋei mane qeliŋkamaŋke . Eŋe ŋei ŋerep edom Pilat eŋe mulap ŋei mane eŋetine oramaŋkoi , rokop qesonka eŋe simileene mogare so qeliŋkamaŋke .
41015007	Naso yewao , ŋei mane mulap urumgo metke , eŋetine Barabas . Eŋe ŋei kawali qe more kepe ware ware yuanka more , ŋei natne enguwi seukkoi , eŋerop mulap urumgo waketkoi . Ŋei magu yewa eŋano ŋine mane eŋetine Barabas .
41015008	Naso yewao ŋei ŋerep magu eŋe sari Pilat qesonka more , naso baŋem okanmaŋke , yale mulap ŋei mane qeliŋkayakane olatkoi .
41015009	Pilat eŋe qesonone rake , “ Maine na Yuda wane kepe ware ware suaine iwa qeliŋkawe ŋinano sariake me mida ? ”
41015010	Eŋe detke , mosop ŋei ŋetne eŋe Yesu wane umat mane suaine mida , eŋe yaup dere worik okane more eŋane kaitko kine midaine ma wakone dongo birakakoi .
41015011	Mosop ŋei ŋetne , pris , eŋe ŋei ŋerep magu wetko ketket okane taleone more , Pilat wano rau , Barabas qeliŋkaki , eŋano sariakane rakoi .
41015012	Pilat eŋe ŋei ŋerep magu koso qesonone rake , “ Ŋine ŋei iwa Yuda kepe ware ware oramami , ea wane na dalino okanikale ? ”
41015013	Eŋe mainge boka rakoi , “ Eŋe kibego qeu ! ”
41015014	Pilatŋo qesononge , “ Onoka sotwane ? Eŋe umat dalino okange ? ” Eŋe zok manerop togoleka rakoi , “ Eŋe kibeŋ qabego qeu ! ”
41015015	Pilatŋo ŋei ŋerep wetene ma peseakane Barabas qeliŋkaki eŋano ariki Yesu kawali ŋei magu eŋane meteo bira kaki edo qe rasu qolok qe qolok mau paki , kumunam seleineŋo dime more , masi kine kine korop okanka more ŋado kibego ma ari qekoi .
41015016	Kawali ŋei edo Yesu kepe ware ware wane mat wane sen koto iwenka ari more eŋane magu kawali ŋei korop edorau arikoi .
41015017	Eŋe Yesu kepe ware ware takot birakakoi . Eŋe takot weŋemka so marok okolerop ea lewino motkoi .
41015018	Eŋe Yesu wano isi bela qebela okanka ewine kito rakoi , “ Oo ! Ge Yuda kepe ware ware suaine naso kiroroine ge waikene ! ”
41015019	Eŋe zoroŋŋo lewine qe more , sotkau pakiso wawetene qe more bakom isisine kitokoi .
41015020	Eŋe eŋane isi bela qebela don olatpi qoeki , takot weŋemka yewa kitoqokka more eŋine takot eaŋo biraka more kibego qekei wane iwenka arikoi .
41015021	Eŋe dumao ari ŋei mane eŋetne Saimon , eŋe mat suaino wayakane sariki , eŋe maratka more sorinkau Yesu wane kibeŋ qesiŋka tewekki arikoi . Saimon eŋe Sairini matko ŋine sarike , eŋane gipoletkine Alekzander so Rupus . Saimon eŋe , kawali ŋei edo ma more , qebinkau Yesu wane kibeŋ tewekke .
41015022	Eŋe Yesu ma more kepe mane eŋetne Golgota yewa ma arikoi . Kepe eŋetne ea wane kine iwa yale , ‘ Lewet Setnenane Kepe . ’
41015023	Eŋe yewao Yesu qelaŋ qeakane ra more wain so qelaŋ qeqe wane kinin yewarop maingekoi . Ea manbi , Yesu eŋe mi neke .
41015024	Pakimo , eŋe kibego qe more takotine , laplapine so maloine yewa wezu qe more yuane damo qe amanagukoi .
41015025	Sakoka , 9 kilok , eŋe Yesu kibego qekoi .
41015026	Eŋe kibeŋ kutno kibi isi qesat don qe motkoi , “ Yuda Wane Ware Ware Suaine . ”
41015027	Eŋe kobu ŋei etke Yesu wane wazaino nat nat weneŋ kibego etkukoi .
41015028	Anutu wane papiao don mane iwa yale pamaike , ea wele wakonge , ‘ Eŋe kobu ŋei eŋerop qekei . ’
41015029	Ŋei ŋerep ari sari okane ka more , ebeene bonepke isi bela qebela okanka rakoi , “ Ge Anutu Wane Bakom Urum kitopoke more , kaiwe karewe koso mane musele maikenane rakone .
41015030	Ea wane ge geŋone qesiŋnagu more kibego ŋine qelige qoe ket arinom ! ”
41015031	Mosop ŋei ŋetne so Anutu papa togon welaine ŋei eŋe yalewaka Yesu wano isi bela qebela don okanka more auye rakoi , “ Eŋe ŋei ŋerep natne maine qesiŋonge , ŋo , eŋine maine mi qesiŋnagumaike !
41015032	Eŋe , Kristo , Israel wane kepe ware ware suaine . Eŋe kibego ŋine maine qoe ketki ŋene ka more malipkaikene . ” Kobu ŋei etke ere weneŋ Yesurop etkukoi , ere yalewaka Yesu don qotkoine olatkoik .
41015033	Oŋabango kepe korop panamane paki , ari kepe deine zingeki rarapwano 3 kilok okange .
41015034	Okangi , Yesu eŋe togoleka boka rake , “ Eloi , Eloi , lema sabaktani ? ” Don kine iwa yale , “ Anutune , Anutune ge onoka wane qeliŋnanmaine ? ”
41015035	Ŋei ŋerep natne osino okorakoi , eŋe yewa dere more rakoi , “ Detkau ! Eŋe Elaiya oramaike . ”
41015036	Ŋei mane eŋe biririke ari more wain dokune tabainerop ea laplapŋo qe muruge more kudupko pise more piino neakane qe dege more rake , “ Tomaka kaŋem ! Elaiya eŋe sari more makokka birakaki kesiake me mida ! ”
41015037	Yesu eŋe koso manerop togoleka boka more asuine saki , seukke .
41015038	Seukki laplap suaine Anutu Wane Bakom Urum kotino okorake , ea keuoka buntuk wiri sari ketki qela qoeke .
41015039	Kawali ŋei eŋane ware ware eŋe Yesu wane osino okorake , eŋe kaki seukki mo rake , “ Welekakatne , iwa eŋe Anutu wane Gipole okanmaike . ”
41015040	Ŋerep natne eŋe amaŋ okora kakoi . Eŋane keuo Maria Magdalena , so Salome so Maria mane , Yakobo ketkele orakoi , so Yosep erane nagaetne .
41015041	Sogino Yesu eŋe Galili metke , naso yewao ŋerep yewa ere Yesu qesiŋkakoik . So ŋerep natne eŋe Yesu weneŋ Yerusalem matko wakoi .
41015042	Rarapwano Yosep , Arimatea ŋine , eŋe sari more mi kaet okange , eŋe Pilat wano ari more Yesu wane pareŋine mayakane qesonkake . Yosep eŋe Yuda wane ware ware mane ewinerop . Eŋe Anutu wane qeli ewe zonom wakongi kayakane , ware ware gege tomaka geokange . Kaiwe yewao eŋe Qezareko met met wane bano nagapko kaiwe yewao ŋei ŋerep eŋe Qezareko met met ea wane kine kine maulukkoi . Eŋe qezareko urata mi makoi ea wane Yosep eŋe Pilat wano ari qesonkake .
41015043	
41015044	Pilat eŋe ikke wie waki kito qokkaki , kawali ŋei ŋetne oraki sariki qesonka rake , “ Welekatne Yesu mo seukike me mida ? ”
41015045	Eŋe kawali ŋei ŋetne eŋano ŋine dere more Yosep olale rake , “ Ge maine pareŋine maikene . ”
41015046	Yosep eŋe laplap mane libeka qoleke , yewao Yesu wane pareŋine makoke ket more kawetka more deŋesereo kezem koto motke . Lom yewa mo wesi weku suaine ea wano mau okorake . Paki , wesi suaine mane rodiŋkaki , ari aŋaone yewa kito won geke .
41015047	Maria Magdalena so Maria , Yosep wane nagaine ere ka more wareka metpik , Yosep eŋe Yesu deŋesereo dukkake .
41016001	Sodao Yuda ŋei qezarek naso qoeki , Maria Magdalena so Salome so Maria , Yakop nagaine , eŋe kelok kine kine qounerop qolekoi , ea ma more Yesu wane pareŋine tau kaikeiwane arikoi .
41016002	Kepe qae qaewo Sodao ruoropka eŋe deŋesereo arikoi .
41016003	Eŋe dumao ari more enŋene auye rakoi , “ Maŋo qesiŋŋone more wesi suaine yewa deŋesere aŋaine kito wonge metmaike ea ma biraki saket ariki ŋene wakesikene ? ” Wesi yewa kakapa suaine , eŋe yale ra more ari pore kau , wesi suaine yewa mo rodigeu saket arike .
41016004	
41016005	Eŋe deŋesereo ari waket more kau ŋei qaluwit mane wongoken laplapine libekaka bira more metke . Eŋe ŋei yewa kaikei wane zok kaetonge .
41016006	Pakimo , ŋei yewaŋo edange , “ Ŋine mi kaet ŋungep ! Na detmaile . Ŋine Yesu Nazaret ŋine , eŋe mo kibego qimi , eŋe marat kaikei wane sarimami . Eŋe iwa mi pamaike . Mo wisikae wiike ! Kau ! Iwa motkoi , eŋane papaine iwa .
41016007	Ŋine ari Petoro so dokoine natne edanbi , ‘ Yesu mo alakan ŋiboniakane Galili arimaike . Ŋine ari more eŋe kaikei . Yesu eŋe mo rake . ’ ”
41016008	Ŋerep eŋe dere saket more , deŋesere qeliŋka more , qomene tiŋ taŋ qe zonomene okoraki , kaet okane more , ŋei mane mi olatkoi .
41016009	Yesu eŋe Sodao sakoka wie more alakane Maria Magdalena wakonkake . Sogino Yesuŋo eŋano ŋine asu qotkoine 7 esoponge .
41016010	Maria eŋe ari Yesu dokoine yewa edange , eŋe mo wisikae wieke . Eŋe wet borik ma more aroke metkoi .
41016011	Eŋe edane rake , “ Yesu eŋe mo wisikae wieke , na mo maratkele . ” Ŋo , eŋe Maria wane don dere more mi malipkakoi .
41016012	Boaŋ Yesu eŋe ŋei kuneŋine so kait kine mane okane more ari Yesu eŋine medep etke erano wakonotke . Ere mat suaine qelige more arikoik .
41016013	Naso yewao ere zinge ari more dokoine natne ea edane rakoik , “ Ŋere Yesu maratkamaite . ” Ŋo , eŋe erane don yewa dere more mi malipkakoi .
41016014	Qoiqoiwo Yesu eŋe dokoine 11 , eŋe ŋara ne metpi ari wakononge . Eŋe ari wakonone more don gereune okanone edane rake , “ Maria so medep etke na maratnanbi , na mo wisikae wiile . Yale ra ŋidanbi ŋine onoka wane eŋane don mi dere malipkemi ? Ŋine dereret ŋine mo mau siukke . ”
41016015	Eŋe koso edane rake , “ Ŋine korop kepe baŋem ari more biŋek don ŋei ŋerep maguine maguine eŋano ra qelaŋanikei .
41016016	Ŋei mane eŋe dere malipka more biŋek don wane doku tauyakeo , ea Anutuŋo maki geake . Ŋo , ŋei mane eŋe mi malipkayakeo , eŋe Anutuŋo eŋane sot dere matalikayake .
41016017	Ŋei ŋerep malipka gekei , Anutu eŋe eŋane meteeno masi togogole eboniake . Eŋe asu qotkoine eŋane eŋetko osopka more eŋe don kine mane raikei .
41016018	Eŋe koma suabit so qaru ea meteeneŋo malipkaikei me doku suŋainerop nekeiwo , eŋe mi seukkei . Eŋe maine gekei . Eŋe meteene zoma ŋei ŋerep eŋano more ebuwi menaŋoniake . ”
41016019	Boaŋ Yesu eŋe don edangi qoeke , Anutuŋo eŋe qeliwo ma wa more birakake , birakaki , Anutu eŋine wonino metke .
41016020	Pakimo , dokoine eŋe korop kepe baŋem ari more eŋane biŋek donine ra qelaŋane arikoi . Waom eŋe weneŋ mapitone more masi togogoleŋo ŋei ŋerep sikanone more , donene ea ma togoleke . Yesu Wane Tanik Manik Don Kisi Iwa Qoemaike Mareko 16 , 9-10 Ŋerep eŋe kine kine korop ka detokangoi , ea Petoro eŋine so kimakoune edangoi . Pakiso , Yesu eŋe dokoine biŋek don ebone more biraongi , kepe baŋem ra qelaŋane arikoi , Anutu eŋe biŋek don qoiqoine midaine iwa motke . Ŋei mane dere malipkayakeo , eŋe gege togon marat kayake .
42001001	O , Teopilus suainene . Mokaka ŋei loutne eŋe Anutuŋo kine kine wele maki keuno wakonge , ea wane don kisi tegoke more qekoi .
42001002	Don kisi yewa mo ŋei weneŋ osop ge more , deene qomineŋo alakan wakongi , kinerop ka detka okangoi , eŋe ŋedangoi . Ŋei eao kine kine one more , Anutu wane biŋek don ra qelaŋangoi .
42001003	Pakimo noŋo yalewaka mo kino ŋineka kine kine wakone sarike , ea wane bororom ra qeson okane , kine dere detluk kawarewe , pakimo koso ge iwa sorok sorok qetitike qe ginmaile .
42001004	Pakimo , ge iwa dapore more , iwa yale detnom qoeake . Eŋe kito gingoi , yewa mo kine kine wele !
42001005	Naso Herot eŋe Yuda kepeo ŋei waom geke , yewao mosop ŋei mane geke , eŋetine Zekaraia , eŋe mosop ŋei Abiya wane tegoo ŋine . Ŋanominane eŋetne Elizabet , eŋe yalewaka mosop ŋei tego eŋano ŋine .
42001006	Ere Anutu wane kaitko gegeetne koboboine geuk paki , Waom wane ra rokop donine koropka tewekkoik .
42001007	Elizabet eŋe qaton gekane ere medewekopetne midaine ge mage , ŋei ŋerep sele okangoik .
42001008	Naso maneo , Zekaraia wane nasoo , eŋe Anutu wane Bakom Urumgo urataine mayakane sarike .
42001009	Sarikiso , mosop ŋei korop urataine welaine welaine maikei wane okane weneŋ sarikoi , pakiso , Zekaraia eŋe kopu qounerop kiwakeakane rakauso Anutu Wane Bakom Urum kotino waketke .
42001010	Waket more , kopu qounerop kiwakki , so ŋei ŋerep magu eŋe ŋadino Anutu meŋenka gekoi .
42001011	Pakiso , Waom wane aŋelo maneŋo wakone more , kopu qounerop kiwa kiwak , ea wane zake nat paromino wongoken yewa okorake .
42001012	Okorakiso , Zekaraiaŋo kaki paki qise more , ikki kito qokkake .
42001013	Yale okangimo , aŋeloŋo iwa yale olatke , “ Zekaraia , ge mi kaetgangep ! Anutuŋo meŋe meŋenŋone mo detke , ea wane mo ŋanomŋone Elizabetŋo medep ŋatke more mayake , eŋane eŋetine Yohane orakene .
42001014	Ge eŋane wet pesek dere more bakom kitokene , so ŋei ŋerep korop eŋe yalewaka wakongi dere more simile oniake !
42001015	Eŋe Waom wane kaitko ŋei suaine okane geake , eŋe wain so doku togole mi neake . Eŋe medep abubuka paki Asu Koboboineŋo eŋane kotino ket more geake .
42001016	Pakimo , eŋe Israel ŋei ŋerep korop mainongi , koso zinge more Waomene Anutu , kaitno kitokei .
42001017	Anutu wane don saeŋine rara ŋei , Elaiya wano Asu so zonom pake , rokop yalewaka pa mangi , eŋe Waom alakane geake , pakimo , ŋei ŋerep suaine so medep nigatne eŋane wetene maton tolaki weku okaniake , so wet togon ŋei eŋe mainongi , koboboine eŋane numao waketkei . Yale okangimo , eŋe Waom wane ŋei ŋerep korop maki eweke more gekei . ”
42001018	Rakimo , Zekaraiaŋo aŋelo olale rake , “ Na daleo don iwa ramaine , ea detpe wele okaniake ? Na mo ŋei sele okanmaile , so ŋanomne eŋe yalewaka sele okanmaike . ”
42001019	Rakimo , aŋeloŋo iwa yale olatke , “ Na Gabriel , na Anutu wane kaitko ge okanmaile , oŋo talenangi sari , qom menaŋ don iwa golatmaile .
42001020	Pakimo , ge naŋane don detnom wele mi okangi , detlukmaine , ea wane turuŋine ge qelaŋ okane more , don raraŋone midaine genom , don golatmaile , iwa wele wakoniake . ”
42001021	Zekaraia eŋe Anutu wane Bakom Urumgo yale okane geki , ŋei ŋerep eŋe naso kiroine tomaka more kinane ŋaŋaekoi .
42001022	Zakaria eŋe Anutu wane Bakom Urumgo ŋine saket more don edaniakane ŋaŋaeke , ea wane eŋe mo wetke rakoi , eŋe tanik mane Anutu wane Bakom Urumgo wakongi kake . Pakiso , eŋe don edaniakane ŋaŋaeso metineŋoka kait masi ma okanonge .
42001023	Yale okane geki urumgo urata mama nasoine qoekiso , Zakariaŋo matino zinge arike .
42001024	Pakiso ŋado ŋanomine Elizabet eŋe medep ŋatkeke . Ŋatke more , siu siuko geki , meso mete mane qoekiso rake ,
42001025	“ Waomŋo naso motke , yewa bomileki qesiŋnane more , gamune yewa ŋei ŋerep eŋane kaiteno ŋine ma biraki ariake ! ”
42001026	Meso 6 qoekiso , Anutuŋo aŋelo Gabriel talekaki , Galili kepeo Nazaret matko arike .
42001027	Eŋe ari more ŋerep natewen mane eŋetne Maria , ŋei mane eŋetne Yosep , eŋane biŋek qeu geke , eŋano lotkeke , Yosep eŋe ŋei waom Dawit wane tutule .
42001028	Pakimo , aŋeloŋo Maria wano wakone more rake , “ Peamŋo gerop payake ! Waomŋo gerop gemaike so suaineka mosop ganmaike ! ”
42001029	Aŋeloŋo don yale rakimo , Mariaŋo detki qekaki wetneŋo iwa yale wetkeke , “ Don iwa onoka wane nolatmaike ? ”
42001030	Pakimo , aŋeloŋo olale rake , “ Maria ge misuk kaet gangep , Anutuŋo gangi menaŋmaike .
42001031	Detmaine , ge medep ŋatke more manom paki , eŋetne Yesu orakene .
42001032	Eŋe baŋ ŋei kakapa suaine okaniake , pakimo , eŋe baŋ eŋetine qeliwo Anutu Wawaine eŋane Medep orakei . Pakimo , baŋ Waom Anutuŋo ŋaboine Dawit yale , ŋei waom birakaki geake .
42001033	Ge more , Yakop wane ŋosa wili wiliine eŋane ŋei waom okane , qoi qoine midaine wareone tako rakot ge ari more geake ! ”
42001034	Rakimo , Mariaŋo aŋelo iwa yale olatke , “ Na natewen , ŋeirop mane mi gemaile , yalinanemo ge don ramaine , yewa daleo wele mosiake ? ”
42001035	Aŋeloŋo done turuŋine mainge rake , “ Asu Koboboineŋo geŋane kutko kesiake , so Anutu wane zonomŋo geŋano ket more qesiŋ ganiake , kine yalewa wane medep koboboine maikene , eŋane eŋetne baŋ Anutu wane Medep orakei .
42001036	Detmaine , kimaŋone Elizabet eŋe ŋerep seleŋo medep ŋatke geki , meso 6 okanmaike . Eŋe ŋerep qaton , yale ora ra okanmami , ŋo eŋe siluŋ medep ŋatkemaike .
42001037	Anutuŋo kine kine mane okaniakane mi qekayake . ”
42001038	Rakiso , Mariaŋo rake , “ Na waom wane qelit ŋerep , ea wane ge don ramaine , yale okannaniake . ” Yale rakiso , aŋeloŋo arike .
42001039	Maria eŋe geki , mi azongi ikopka eweke more , Yuda kepe bonagaino mat mane metke , yewa arike .
42001040	Ari lotke more , Zekaraia wane matko wa more , so Elizabet kaki pakiso , oi bakom okankake .
42001041	Elizabetŋo Maria wane oi bakom yewa dere metkiso , medepŋo yewaka moea ŋatino uŋap make , pakiso Asu Koboboineŋo Elizabet wane kotino watkeke .
42001042	Pakiso , Elizabetŋo mawaka so don iwa yale rake , “ Ŋerep kimaze , geŋane mosop korop yewaŋo ŋerep natne eŋe yuan onwaremaike , so medep ŋatŋono metmaike , eŋe yalewaka mosop korop .
42001043	Onoka maepnane , Waomnane nagaineŋo nanikenane sarimaine ?
42001044	Oi bakom okan nannom , ketno ketki ŋatno medepŋo uŋap mamaike , so bakom kitomaike .
42001045	Ge wet pesek suaine okanmaine , ge Waom wane biŋek don golatke , yewa detnom wele okange , ea wane wele geŋano wakoniake . ”
42001046	Mariaŋo rake , “ Qomneŋo Waom mawa kamaike ,
42001047	Anutuŋo mauluk nanmaike , eŋe qelit ŋerep meine ket qeqine naŋane wetkemaike , ea wane oŋa oŋaneŋo wet pesek okanmaike . Togole welaine Anutuŋo masi kakapa naŋano mamaike , ea wane ukude so baŋ ŋado ŋei ŋerep kepe korop maguine maguine noramaŋkei , ‘ Anutuŋo mosop gange . ’ Anutu ea eŋane eŋetine koboboine .
42001048	
42001049	
42001050	Ŋei ŋerep eŋe Anutu ewino kito okanmami , eŋe eŋano so eŋane doko ŋosa wili wiliene wet maep ebon mageake .
42001051	Eŋe kabirimine togogoleka bira more , ŋei wawaine ge okanmami , esopongi yau yaup ari okanmami .
42001052	Eŋe ŋei waom togogole met meteno ŋine maket biraone more , ŋei ketlele gemami , eŋe ebu wa meŋo biraon okanmaike .
42001053	Bodi so aboŋene midaine ge okanmami , eŋe kine kine mayakatne qe watke ebon okanmaike . Ŋo riwe morian so aboŋenerop ge okanmami , eŋe yemo esopongi , eŋe meteenoka qeliŋka ari okanmami .
42001054	Eŋe ra rokop donine ŋabokopze eŋano ra togoleke , yewa ware kamaike , eŋe qelit ŋeiine Israel qesiŋ kamaike .
42001055	Eŋe ŋaboze Abraham so eŋane doko ŋosa wili wilikoune , eŋano wet maep ebone ariake . ”
42001056	Maria eŋe meso karewe Elizabet korop geki , pakiso koso zinge matino arike .
42001057	Elizabet eŋe nasoine bomilekiso , medep ŋei make .
42001058	Pakiso , Elizabet matkoune so weŋem sotawekoune eŋe kisiine ea dere so Waomŋo wet maepinane kine eŋano ma wakonge , ea wane dere so eŋerop weneŋ bakom kitokoi .
42001059	Kaiwe urata mama 8 qoekiso , eŋe lewageu , medepinane yaine solaine kitatkoi , pakiso , medep wane eŋetne magaine Zekaraia wasekakei wane rakoi .
42001060	Rauso , nagaineŋo kitatone more rake , “ Mida ! Eŋetine Yohane orakene . ”
42001061	Yale rakiso , eŋe olale rakoi , “ Mame asokopŋone eŋane wase wase eŋet mane yale mi pamaike ! ”
42001062	Ra kito qok yale okanmage , so magaine meteŋoka kait masi okanka more , medep eŋetne orayakane qesonkakoi .
42001063	Pakiso , Zekaraia eŋe tape wane raki manbiso , iwa yale qeke , “ Eŋetine Yohane . ” Pakiso , eŋe korop qise nagukoi !
42001064	Mi azongiso , Zekaraia maine mo menaŋge , paki don raraine wakongiso , Anutu eŋetine ma wakake .
42001065	Pakiso , mat loli lolik ŋei ŋerep gekoi , eŋe don kisi yewa detpi kaetonge . So Yuda kepe meŋoino mat mere arike , yewao don kisi yewa weneŋ aŋaŋo aŋa auye okan warekoi .
42001066	Don kisi detkoi , ŋei ŋerep yewa eŋe don kisi yewa wetke ge more qesone rakoi , “ Medep yaline sua more daleo okaniake ? ” Eŋe mo detkoi , Waom wane zonomŋo mo kutno wa pake .
42001067	Asu Koboboineŋo Yohane magaine Zekaraia wane kotino ket watkeke , paki eŋe Anutu ma waka more , iwa yale rake ,
42001068	“ Ŋene Waom ma wakaŋem , Israel wane Anutu ! Eŋe sariki paki , ŋei ŋerewekoune qesiŋ onmaike , eŋe koso siwot onmaike .
42001069	Qelit medeune Dawit wane ŋabokoune ŋenane keuo ŋine , ŋei togogole mane ma wakonkaki , oŋo baŋ maulukoniake .
42001070	Eŋe mokaka qelit ŋeikoune koboboine edangi , don ŋenzo ra gekoi ,
42001071	baŋ ŋabokopze eŋane meteeno ŋine koso mainŋongi zingekene , so qaisikŋon okanmami , eŋane meteeno ŋine makok ŋoniake .
42001072	Ŋabokopze eŋerop tako rakot togon koboboine okaniakane detongi , paki masi wet maep mayakatne eŋano okanoniake .
42001073	Eŋe ŋaboze Abraham ra togole mangane , ŋabakopze eŋano ŋine makok ŋoniake .
42001074	So detŋongi , kaetze midaine qelitine qekene .
42001075	Paki , eŋane kaitko kepeo gekene , rokop naso baŋem sot turuŋze midaine koboboine gekene .
42001076	Medepne , ge eŋe baŋ Anutu Wawainane qelit ŋei gorakei , goŋo baŋ Waom wane ŋetne kisage alakangene , eŋane numaine lapongenane .
42001077	Goŋo baŋ ŋei ŋerewekoune kito ebon okannom . ‘ Anutuŋo eŋane sotene nigetkaki qeliŋoniake , yale okane more mauluk ŋuniake . ’
42001078	Anutuze eŋe wet maepine suaine pa maikane baŋ raki , wet maepine ea kepe qae qae yale qelaŋan ŋoniake , so wet maepine eaŋo eŋe mauluk ŋongi menaŋgene .
42001079	Anutuŋo qeliwo ŋine qelaŋanine maki sirike , seu seu wane panaman ruwitko gemami , yewa qelaŋanoniake , pakimo , sikanŋongi , peam wane numa wakongi , maine gesoke arikene . ”
